CompanyNameEn: DESMA RUBBER INJECTION MACHINERY (WUXI) CO. LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 无锡德士马注射机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 無錫德士馬注射機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 德士马工业 4.0 以现代信息技术为基础，实现更加灵活高效、节约资源的生产流程。现有和未来数据源和分析结果的智能联网让我们得以开发新产品、新服务以及新的业务模型，也开辟了更高效的运营流程。 生产工厂可以提高它们的价值创造和竞争力。 基于大数据的新业务模型使可变或量化型生产成为可能。 网络兼容性简易化，允许自主学习、自动优化和自动控制生产流。 新设备和新系统实现更长的工厂和机器正常运行时间，产品质量透明并提升。 工作场所现代且符合人体工程学，员工在这样的环境中愉悦并充满热情地为公司的成功贡献力量。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 德士馬工業 4.0 以現代信息技術為基礎，實現更加靈活高效、節約資源的生產流程。現有和未來資料來源和分析結果的智慧聯網讓我們得以開發新產品、新服務以及新的業務模型，也開闢了更高效的運營流程。 生產工廠可以提高它們的價值創造和競爭力。 基於大資料的新業務模型使可變或量化型生產成為可能。 網路相容性簡易化，允許自主學習、自動優化和自動控制生產流。 新設備和新系統實現更長的工廠和機器正常執行時間，產品品質透明並提升。 工作場所現代且符合人體工程學，員工在這樣的環境中愉悅並充滿熱情地為公司的成功貢獻力量。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: DESMA SmartConnect 4.U is based on modern information technologies and aims at even more flexible, efficient and resource-conserving production processes. The intelligent networking of existing and future data sources and analysis results permits us to develop new products, services and business models and also to blaze the trail for more effi cient operational processes. Our customers capitalize on it in various ways: Production plants can raise their value creation and competitiveness. New business models based on big data enable a variable or quantity-oriented production. The ease of network compatibility allows self-learning, self-optimizing and self-controlling production fl ows. New devices and systems realize a higher plant and machine uptime with a more transparent and improved product quality. Employees at modern and ergonomically workplaces make their contribution to the company success with joy and enthusiasm.

CompanyNameSc: 兆邑实业有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 兆邑實業有限公司
TechNameSc: 顶部调节双出口高效风环
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 顶部调节风环可在不停止押出机的情况下进行微调或换线的调整，为整个吹膜生产线带来更高的效率。 特殊的内部结构与双出口设计，出风时提供高速而平整的强势冷却风，冷却同时也兼顾稳定膜泡。 此风环特别适用于HDPE、LDPE、LLDPE、多层膜、薄膜与厚膜。
TechNameTc: 頂部調節雙出口高效風環
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 頂部調節風環可在不停止押出機的情況下進行微調或換線的調整，為整個吹膜生產線帶來更高的效率。 特殊的內部結構與雙出口設計，出風時提供高速而平整的強勢冷卻風，冷卻同時也兼顧穩定膜泡。 此風環特別適用於HDPE、LDPE、LLDPE、多層膜、薄膜與厚膜。
TechNameEn: Top Handle Adjustable Dual-lip Air Ring
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Top Handle Adjustable Air Ring can adjusting continuous and easily without stoping extruder.  All of fine tuning or producing line changing can be more efficient. Special inner maze & dual-lip design can output cooling air strongly and keep bubble stabilizing.  This air ring is suitable for HDPE, LDPE, LLDPE multi-layer, thin film and also thick film.

CompanyNameEn: FU CHUN SHIN MACHINERY MANUFACTURE CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 富强鑫精密工业股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 富強鑫精密工業股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 模内贴标生产系统(CT-e 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionSc: FCS全新发表之机种，整合奥地利高阶控制器与意大利伺服马达，打造高射速、长保压的全伺服动力驱动技术，计量精准，可开模、顶出、加料多轴同动，利于生产较短成型周期与长保压之成型需求。并兼具耐荷重、低阻抗，低耗能与低噪音等优势，适用于食品包装、光学、医疗等产业。更可搭载智能制造系统，实现无人化监控管理。
TechNameTc: 模內貼標生產系統(CT-e 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionTc: FCS全新發表之機種，整合奧地利高階控制器與義大利伺服馬達，打造高射速、長保壓的全伺服動力驅動技術，計量精準，可開模、頂出、加料多軸同動，利於生產較短成型週期與長保壓之成型需求。並兼具耐荷重、低阻抗，低耗能與低噪音等優勢，適用於食品包裝、光學、醫療等產業。更可搭載智慧製造系統，實現無人化監控管理。
TechNameEn: In Mold Labeling Molding System (CT-e Series)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: CT-e series is a newly released model of All-Electric IMM in combination of Austrias controller and Italys servo motor (PHASE) which increase the injection velocity, holding time and shot volume accuracy. The mold opening, ejecting, and plasticizing processes can operate simultaneously, reducing the machine cycle time. And, this series adopting Japans injection screw (NSK) and linear ball slider in injection base moving unit enhances the smooth operation and energy saving. It is suitable for some product requirements such as 3C, medical or optical products. Moreover, it is capable of Intelligent ManuFactory (iMF 4.0) that uses mold cavity flow balance module for monitoring and automatic compensation and screening of defective products. It could achieve unmanned production monitoring and satisfy the demand of customization.

CompanyNameEn: FU CHUN SHIN MACHINERY MANUFACTURE CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 富强鑫精密工业股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 富強鑫精密工業股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 新世代智慧成型系統 (FA 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 富强鑫新一代高效节能注塑机，是集合性能、效能与智能于一体的全新机种， 将射出单元与夹模单元全面升级，可创造出多样性产品及稳定的性能质量，车壁结构强度提升30%、伺服节能油泵达GB一级节能验证，使得射出精度与稳定度大幅提升并延长设备寿命，更整合高阶电控系统优势，提供模块化规格选型及差异化技术整合与服务，满足汽车、3C、食品包装、薄壁容器等各式产业需求。
TechNameTc: 新世代智慧成型系統 (FA 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 富強鑫新一代高效節能注塑機，是集合性能、效能與智慧於一體的全新機種， 將射出單元與夾模單元全面升級，可創造出多樣性產品及穩定的性能品質，車壁結構強度提升30%、伺服節能油泵達GB一級節能驗證，使得射出精度與穩定度大幅提升並延長設備壽命，更整合高階電控系統優勢，提供模組化規格選型及差異化技術整合與服務，滿足汽車、3C、食品包裝、薄壁容器等各式產業需求。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: FA series is advanced toggle hydraulic and servo energy-saving IMM that possess power-saving, clean and high efficient in response to the trend of intelligent production. Not only injection unit and the clamping unit are upgraded, also with human ergonomics concept and aesthetics. Its fast and beautiful mold open-close smoothness and low noise performance that being a leading machine of FCS. The Platen strength improvement that increase by 30% to improve the mold lifetime, and adopted linear guide for making the injection control precise and stable. Moreover, FCS provide optional modular specification to meet the requirement such as food packaging, thin-walled container, 3C industries.

CompanyNameEn: FU CHUN SHIN MACHINERY MANUFACTURE CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 富强鑫精密工业股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 富強鑫精密工業股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 多組分成型系統 (FB 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 富强鑫为业界最早研发双色机之厂商，在多组分成型工艺超过35年的技术发展与经验，历经消费者需求不断提升，所发展的FB系列精密双色机也持续进化，具有转盘、转轴、夹层混色、共射设计，最多可搭配4组射出单元及提供高达19组配置形式。闭回路伺服阀、单缸射出结构，以及专利转盘定位夹具，使高速成型时定位精准又稳定，适用于医疗器材、按键、车灯等精细双色制品之生产。
TechNameTc: 多組分成型系統 (FB 系列)
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 富強鑫為業界最早研發雙色機之廠商，在多組分成型工藝超過35年的技術發展與經驗，歷經消費者需求不斷提升，所發展的FB系列精密雙色機也持續進化，具有轉盤、轉軸、夾層混色、共射設計，最多可搭配4組射出單元及提供高達19組配置形式。閉迴路伺服閥、單缸射出結構，以及專利轉盤定位夾具，使高速成型時定位精準又穩定，適用於醫療器材、按鍵、車燈等精細雙色製品之生產。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: FCS being a leading position of multi-component field which successfully research and develop dual color injection molding over 35 years. With designs of Rotary table, Rotary shaft, Sandwich/Interval that is able to allocate 4 sets of injection unit, and has 19 types of multi-component configuration, and the maximum clamping force of 1,900 tons. FB series equipped by PRO/ENGINEER computer aid designed clamping system, the clamp stroke and distance between tie bars have been enlarged for versatile usage. And the high efficiency injection unit, two isolated barrel sets inject at the same time which reduce the cycle time to get more profit. Concentrating on safety design, FB series apply multiple protection devices. Enlarged skates and adjustable screws help guide the moving platen and ensure the mold position to be precise, to protect the molds. It suitable for multi-color and multi-component, and has been widely applied to cell phones, pen-making, automobiles, handworking tools.

Gear box is cooling with forced lubrication, and keep long life. -Screw design according to different material, and a special treatment, long life and high efficiency. -Barrel design uses uses degassing vent unit., but it can be installed vacuum degassing vent according. -Cooling method:air-cooled

TechnologyDescriptionSc: MDO可以使工艺人员根据最终用户的 特定用途，来修改塑料制品的性能， 例如收缩性，耐撕裂能力和密度等。 改善了的消费品包装，定向性的抗撕 裂，包装食品的新鲜度，延长包装肉 和乳络的仓储时间，改进了视觉观感 等都是MDO强化薄膜的优点。

TechnologyDescriptionEn: MDO enables processors to modify properties such as shrinkage, tear, and density for their specific end-use application. Improved consumer packaging, directed tearing, freshness of packaged goods, longer shelf life of packaged meats and cheese, and improved organoleptics, are all benefits of MDO enhanced films.

CompanyNameEn: SHANTOU YICHY PACKING MACHINERY CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 汕头市艺诚包装机械有限公司

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.全伺服自动制杯机，是我司研制的新一代设备，主要适用于生产加工物料为 PP、PS、PE、PET、PVC 等各种杯、盒、碗等薄壁容器。 2.本设备为全伺服驱动。 3.驱动系统使用的偏心轮加五支点结构为制杯成型行业首次使用 4.堆叠系统配套全伺服机械手，更加节能环保，省人优效，为生产厂家节约生产成本。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.全伺服自動制杯機，是我司研製的新一代設備，主要適用於生產加工物料為 PP、PS、PE、PET、PVC 等各種杯、盒、碗等薄壁容器。 2.本設備為全伺服驅動。 3.驅動系統使用的偏心輪加五支點結構為制杯成型行業首次使用 4.堆疊系統配套全伺服機械手，更加節能環保，省人優效，為生產廠家節約生產成本。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. Full-servo automatic forming machine is a new generation of equipment developed by our company which is mainly suitable for producing of thin-walled disposible products such as PP, PE, PS, HIPS, PET, PVC  cups, containers , bowls and so on. 2.This equipment is driven by full servo motor. 3.The eccentric wheel plus five fulcrum structure used in the driven system which is the first time used in the cup forming industry. 4.The stacking system is equipped with a full servo manipulator which saves energy and labor, improves production efficiency to saves the production costs for manufacturers.

CompanyNameSc: 温州强拓机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 溫州強拓機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 卫星式柔版印刷机， 有时又称为共用压印滚筒式柔版印刷机。各印刷单元围绕着一个共用压印滚筒安装在两个墙板之间。承印材料围绕在共用压印滚筒上进行套色印刷。因为齿轮直接传动，所以不论是纸张或薄膜，即使没有加装特别的控制装置，仍然可以套印的很准确，而且印刷工艺稳定，常用来印刷彩色产品
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 衛星式柔版印刷機， 有時又稱為共用壓印滾筒式柔版印刷機。各印刷單元圍繞著一個共用壓印滾筒安裝在兩個牆板之間。承印材料圍繞在共用壓印滾筒上進行套色印刷。因為齒輪直接傳動，所以不論是紙張或薄膜，即使沒有加裝特別的控制裝置，仍然可以套印的很準確，而且印刷工藝穩定，常用來印刷彩色產品

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 管材粉碎机,主要用于PVC、PE塑料管材、型材等异型材直接破碎造料,更适用于较长塑料管材、型材破碎,配置抽料风机、旋风分离器等组成塑料粉碎回收系统可更加充分发挥破碎机回收效率.    机器特点  1.分体式机体,使更换刀具简单快捷  2. 特有的片刀结构,剪刀原理,减轻马达负荷,配合强悍的高转速马达,可轻松破碎各类塑料.  3.刀具间隙可调节,用钝后可重复卸下刃磨,经久耐用  4. 外置轴承座,防止粉尘进入轴承,延长机器的使用寿命  5.进料斗与上箱的开启采用电动式开启,平稳且省力
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 管材粉碎機,主要用於PVC、PE塑料管材、型材等異型材直接破碎造料,更適用於較長塑料管材、型材破碎,配置抽料風機、旋風分離器等組成塑料粉碎回收系統可更加充分發揮破碎機回收效率.    機器特點  1.分體式機體,使更換刀具簡單快捷  2. 特有的片刀結構,剪刀原理,減輕馬達負荷,配合強悍的高轉速馬達,可輕鬆破碎各類塑料.  3.刀具間隙可調節,用鈍後可重複卸下刃磨,經久耐用  4. 外置軸承座,防止粉塵進入軸承,延長機器的使用壽命  5.進料斗與上箱的開啟採用電動式開啟,平穩且省力
TechNameEn: Plastic Pipe Granulators Are Mainly Used to Directly Granulate The PVC and Pe Tubings,PVC Sectional and Profiled Bar.
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The characters of Pipe Crushers of Recycling Series(Crushers for Plastic Pipes Lines)  >Outside bearing seat design,in order to avoid the dust entering into the bearing ,long time using life. >Separation design for machine body,convenient for replacing the screen blades. >Separation design for machine body,convenient for replacing the screen blades. >Overloading protector for motor and interlock device,double protection for the safety of personnel and motor. >Special knife blade structure adopting shear principle,nade of high contented chromium steel,shred the various in an easy way. >Knives gap adjustment is available,and the knives can be resharpened numerous time,long time using life. >Optimized auto-feeding device,make the feeding to be more smooth. >Modern design,nice appearance. >Equipped with shock-proof feet,reduce the noise of vibration.

CompanyNameSc: 广东星联科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣東星聯科技有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 拉伸流变挤出技术颠覆了传统的剪切流变技术原理，同时兼备了传统“双螺杆”混合混炼及“单螺杆”直接成型的功能，比螺杆挤出方案具有分散混合能力强、分子量降解少、能耗低等优势，可应用加工领域广泛，尤其在不同极性材料的相容挤出、纳米分散、热敏性材料、超高粘度材料挤出、聚合物非相容合金改性、橡胶连续密炼、多项无机材料共混挤出等方面具有突破性优势，为高分子材料加工工艺优化提供了全新的解决方案。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 拉伸流變擠出技術顛覆了傳統的剪切流變技術原理，同時兼備了傳統“雙螺杆”混合混煉及“單螺杆”直接成型的功能，比螺杆擠出方案具有分散混合能力強、分子量降解少、能耗低等優勢，可應用加工領域廣泛，尤其在不同極性材料的相容擠出、納米分散、熱敏性材料、超高粘度材料擠出、聚合物非相容合金改性、橡膠連續密煉、多項無機材料共混擠出等方面具有突破性優勢，為高分子材料加工工藝優化提供了全新的解決方案。
TechNameEn: Elongational Rheology Extruding Production Line (ERE Production Line)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The revolutionary extruder, Elongational Rheology Extruder (ERE), has overturned polymer plasticizing and transporting process based on shearing rheology. Compared with conventional screw extruder, ERE has characteristics as follows: -  Weak Shearing Force -  Strong Elongational Force -  High Efficiency of Tansportation -  Less Molecular Weight Reduction -  Homogeneous Mixing and Dispersion -  Narrow Distribution of Residence Time -  Obvious Compatibilization Effect by Physical Means The ERE technology effectively solves the problem of molecular weight degradation of polymer materials during processing and difficult of processing extreme rheological behavior materials regarded as the worldwide problem. Whats more, it will greatly expands the application field of polymer materials, and promote the birth of a large number of new polymer materials & products with special functions. The application scope covers various industries from packing to automotive related to polymer materials.

TechNameEn: Blow Molding Machine for Medical industry
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The hydraulic system of the blow molding machine is driven by a servo speed variable pump, which has higher energy efficiency and saves 40% of energy compared with ordinary oil circuits.The hydraulic valve adopts the German Bosch Rexroth brand, which is stable and reliable, with fast response and high accuracy.Embedded 100-point parison control system, materials can be well-distributed to save cost.The system runs smoothly and the oil temperature is automatically controlled by PLC.

CompanyNameSc: 妙抗保国际（亚洲）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 妙抗保國際（亞洲）有限公司
TechNameSc: 抗菌技术 – 打造更洁净、清新、可持续性的塑料产品
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 妙抗保抗菌保护可有效抑制塑料产品表面上细菌和霉菌的滋生。我们创新的配方已被证明可减少肠炎沙门氏菌、大肠杆菌等有害微生物的数量高达99.9。妙抗保技术透过延长塑料制品的使用寿命，为可持续产品开发做出了重大贡献。通过抑制塑料表面上有害微生物的滋生，妙抗保有助于防止产品过早变质、产生污渍和异味。我们客制化的添加剂适用于多种聚合物材料。常见的行业应用包括食品服务、建筑材料、消费品和医疗保健。内建过程是安全、简单且无缝的，不会破坏现有的制造流程。所有妙抗保技术均已在美国EPA及欧盟BPR注册。
TechNameTc: 抗菌技術 – 打造更潔淨、清新、可持續性的塑料產品
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 妙抗保抗菌保護可有效抑制塑料產品表面上細菌和黴菌的滋生。我們創新的配方已被證明可減少腸炎沙門氏菌、大腸桿菌等有害微生物的數量高達99.9。妙抗保技術透過延長塑料製品的使用壽命，為可持續產品開發做出了重大貢獻。通過抑制塑料表面上有害微生物的滋生，妙抗保有助於防止產品過早變質、產生污漬和異味。我們客制化的添加劑適用於多種聚合物材料。常見的行業應用包括食品服務、建築材料、消費品和醫療保健。內建過程是安全、簡單且無縫的，不會破壞現有的製造流程。所有妙抗保技術均已在美國EPA及歐盟BPR註冊。
TechNameEn: Microban Antimicrobial Technologies for Cleaner, Fresher & More Sustainable Plastic Products
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Microban antimicrobial protection works to eliminate bacteria, mould and mildew growth on plastic products and surfaces. Our innovative formulations have been proven to reduce the presence of Salmonella enterica, E. coli, MRSA and VRE by up to 99.9%. Microban technologies heavily contribute to sustainable product development by extending the lifespan of plastic articles. Through the inhibition of damaging microbes on a plastic surface, Microban helps to prevent premature product deterioration, visual discoloration and odours. Our customised additives are suitable for use in a range of polymers such as ABS, PP, PS, PE, LDPE, PVC and PC. Typical industry applications include food service, construction, consumer, and healthcare. Additive integration is safe, simple and seamless, and will not disrupt existing manufacturing processes. All Microban technologies have EPA registrations and are notified with the EU BPR. Specific formulations are also registered with the FDA and listed on EFSA.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 透明成核劑3非常適用於共聚和均聚聚丙烯，能有效的降低製品的霧度。產品符合ROHS、歐盟REACH以及美國的FDA法規，可應用於食品、醫藥等包裝產品。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Synclear-3 is an efficient nucleating agent for polyolefins used in homopolymer and copolymer polypropylene and LLDPE films, as well as super high molecular weight polyethylene. The results show that the haze is decreased from 37% to about 10% by adding 0.3% Synclear-3 in homopolymer polypropylene injection molded piece of 2mm thickness, and that of polypropylene random copolymer injection molded piece with the same thickness is decreased to about 6%.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1002/5000热塑性聚酰亚胺（Therplim） 具有优异耐热性的新型热塑性聚酰亚胺 Therplim是一种高性能的高性能热塑性聚酰亚胺，与超级工程塑料（PEEK）相比，Tg和Tm平衡，并且兼具高强度，耐热性，优异的耐化学性和易成型性。 产品：颗粒，粉 应用;齿轮/垫片，滑动零件，机械零件，电子零件，复合，CFRP矩阵树脂，薄膜和片材等。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1002/5000熱塑性聚醯亞胺（Therplim） 具有優異耐熱性的新型熱塑性聚醯亞胺 Therplim是一種高性能的高性能熱塑性聚醯亞胺，與超級工程塑料（PEEK）相比，Tg和Tm平衡，並且兼具高強度，耐熱性，優異的耐化學性和易成型性。 產品：顆粒，粉 應用;齒輪/墊片，滑動零件，機械零件，電子零件，複合，CFRP矩陣樹脂，薄膜和片材等。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Thermoplastic polyimide (Therplim) New thermoplastic polyimide which has excellent heat resistance Therplim is high total performance thermoplastic polyimide which has well-balanced Tg and Tm compared with super engineering plastic (PEEK), and has both of high-strength, heat durability, excellent chemical resistance and easy formability. Products:pellet, powder Application; Gear/Gasket, Sliding Parts, Machine parts, Electronic Parts, Compounding, CFRP Matrix resin, film and sheet, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 越南日辉集团
CompanyNameTc: 越南日輝集團
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 越南日辉填充母料是一种以纯原料PE、PP或苯乙烯树脂为载体的白色微米级碳酸钙母料，碳酸钙目数由用户使用效果确定，具有良好的物性，分散性，稳定性，高添加比例并不影响加工机器螺杆的精密度。此类母料能广泛使用于PE、PP、PS、ABS等各项塑胶制品中，如：PE塑胶袋，注塑，挤塑等产品，特别是可以焚化处理的环保塑胶制品，使得达到降低成本的目的。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 越南日輝填充母料是一種以純原料PE、PP或苯乙烯樹脂為載體的白色微米級碳酸鈣母料，碳酸鈣目數由用戶使用效果確定，具有良好的物性，分散性，穩定性，高添加比例並不影響加工機器螺杆的精密度。此類母料能廣泛使用於PE、PP、PS、ABS等各項塑料製品中，如：PE塑料袋，注塑，擠塑等產品，特別是可以焚化處理的環保塑料製品，使得達到降低成本的目的。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Filler Masterbatch is widely used in plastics industry for many economic benefits. Filler Masterbatch (or Calcium carbonate CaCO3 Filler Master batch) is compound of calcium carbonate powder and other additives, based on polymer carrier resin. This raw material normally is used for filling in plastics to replace a part of virgin polymer that is very expensive. It is the reason that Filler master batch brings cost savings solution to plastic manufacturers. Filler Masterbatch not only benefits to plastic manufacturers by keeping production costs down by replacing a part of the virgin polymer , but also improves production conditions, increases output. It increases calcium carbonate loading, make easier pelletization, cleaner manufacturing environment as well as many other physical and chemical properties of ended plastic products.

CompanyNameSc: 优褅股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 優褅股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 抗蓝光剂(主要吸收可见光中蓝光的部份)
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1. Eusorb UV-390：针对370-430nm蓝光部分吸收，适用于PMMA、PC、PET等产品 2. Eusorb BLA-4200M：吸收280-430nm的波长，具有良好的抗蓝光及抗UV光的效果，适用于PMMA制品 3. Eusorb BLA-4400：吸收250-470nm的波长，耐温性高，适用于PC及PET制品 4.Eusorb UV-1990：于 370nm-440nm 波段范围有强吸收，高效红移紫外线吸收剂及蓝光吸收剂，用于塑料, 纤维, 贴合胶和涂料 等相关产品

TechNameEn: Anti-Blue Light Agent (Mainly Absorbing Part of Blue Light in Visible Light)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Anti-blue light agent (mainly absorbing part of blue light in visible light) 1. Eusorb uv-390: for blue light absorption of 370-430nm, suitable for PMMA, PC, PET and other products. 2. Eusorb bla-4200m: absorbs 280-430nm wavelength, has good anti-blue light and anti-uv effect, suitable for PMMA products. 3. Eusorb bla-4400: absorbs the wavelength of 250-470nm, has good anti-blue and anti-uv light effects, high temperature resistance, suitable for PC and PET products. 4. Eusorb bla-4990: absorbs wavelength of 250-430nm, has good anti-blue and anti-uv light effect, high temperature resistance, suitable for PC and PET products. 5. Eusorb UV-1990Red-shifted UV absorber, up to 440nm Highly Efficient, Red-shifted UV-absorber designed for Solvent-borne Coatings & Various Organic Polymers for UVA & Visible Light Protection 6. Eusorb UV-1995Red-shifted UV absorber, up to 475nmHighly Efficient, Red-shifted UV-absorber designed for Solvent-borne Coatings & Various Organic Polymers for UVA

CompanyNameSc: 德国艾伦巴赫机电设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 德國艾倫巴赫機電設備有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 在一些生产车间里，既有Erlenbach 成型设备也有第三方设备，导致一些厂商经常不得不受模具适用性的制约。Erlenbach 团队认识到了这个问题，并一直在研究 EMMotion Flex机型。这种成型设备，在模具适用性方面不会给您带来任何限制，并为您提供高度的灵活性。 优势: - 通过使用单块模具和第三方设备上的模具，提高灵活性和效率 - 同时使用伺服电机驱动 - 由于从控制面板侧进气距离较短，因此可进行精准的吹风控制 - 使用艾伦巴赫汽室系统时，通过EM快速换模系统可节省时间 - 循环时间
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 在一些生產車間裡，既有Erlenbach 成型設備也有協力廠商設備，導致一些廠商經常不得不受模具適用性的制約。Erlenbach 團隊認識到了這個問題，並一直在研究 EMMotion Flex機型。這種成型設備，在模具適用性方面不會給您帶來任何限制，並為您提供高度的靈活性。 優勢: - 通過使用單塊模具和協力廠商設備上的模具，提高靈活性和效率 - 同時使用伺服電機驅動 - 由於從控制台側進氣距離較短，因此可進行精准的吹風控制 - 使用艾倫巴赫汽室系統時，通過EM快速換模系統可節省時間 - 迴圈時間
TechnologyDescriptionEn: There is a mix of Erlenbach systems and third-party products in some production halls leading to the fact that some processors often had to accept a restriction with the mould assembly. The Erlenbach team recognised the problem and has since been working on the EMMotion Flex - a particle foam shape moulding machine that does not restrict you in terms of moulds and offers you a high degree of flexibility. Advantages: - more flexibility and efficiency through uncomplicated use of monoblock moulds and third-party products - at simultaneous use of the servo-electric drive! - precise blowing air control due to shorter distance of the air inlet at the control panel side - time saving via EM quick mould change system when using an Erlenbach steam chamber system - short cycle times - highest precision - energy efficiency

CompanyNameSc: WEICON GMBH & CO. KG
CompanyNameTc: WEICON GMBH & CO. KG
TechNameSc: 橡胶与塑料的专用粘接材料
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 致力于橡胶与塑料的粘接工况，WEICON研发出一款专属胶水氰基丙烯酸酯粘合剂 VA 250 Black。该款胶水粘稠度较高，固化后具残余弹性，因而尤其适用于不断变化的天气环境。它的耐温范围为 -50C 至 +135C，可粘接不同种类的橡胶（如硬质橡胶、泡沫橡胶等）及各种塑料；剥离强度高、耐冲击。该胶水为常温固化的粘合剂，通过空气中的水分及人工按压达到快速粘接。该款胶水不仅能够在数秒内粘接各种材料，它甚至能够胜任平滑表面的粘合。由于固化迅速，该粘合剂可广泛使用于汽车制造、模型模具制造等的生产线。
TechNameTc: 橡膠與塑料的專用粘接材料
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 致力於橡膠與塑料的粘接工況，WEICON研發出一款專屬膠水氰基丙烯酸酯粘合劑 VA 250 Black。該款膠水粘稠度較高，固化後具殘餘彈性，因而尤其適用於不斷變化的天氣環境。它的耐溫範圍為 -50C 至 +135C，可粘接不同種類的橡膠（如硬質橡膠、泡沫橡膠等）及各種塑料；剝離強度高、耐衝擊。該膠水為常溫固化的粘合劑，通過空氣中的水分及人工按壓達到快速粘接。該款膠水不僅能夠在數秒內粘接各種材料，它甚至能夠勝任平滑表面的粘合。由於固化迅速，該粘合劑可廣泛使用於汽車製造、模型模具製造等的生產線。
TechNameEn: Adhesive for plastics and rubber  WEICON VA 250 Black
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Adhesive for plastics and rubber  WEICON VA 250 Black  WEICON developed an adhesive for bonding plastics and rubber  the Contact Cyanoacrylate VA 250 Black.  The adhesive has a high viscosity and shows a residual elasticity after curing, therefore it is particularly suitable in ever changing climates. It is temperature resistant from -50C to +135C, ideal for bonding numerous rubber materials (e.g. solid rubber or cellular rubber), plastics as well as metal to plastic and shows an excellent peel and shock resistance.  Cyanoacrylates are cold-curing one-component adhesives that cure very quickly under the influence of humidity and pressure. They adhere very well even to smooth surfaces and bond almost all materials with and among each other within seconds. Due to their fast curing, cyanoacrylates are perfect adhesives for series production  be it in the automotive industry, consumer goods or in the manufacture of tools.

TechNameEn: Full Automatic High Speed T-Shirt Bag Making Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: It is applied to produce and print the double-colored or uncolored vest bags, using HDPE, LDPE roll film. It adopts PLC control, double step (servo) motor fixed length and the liquid crystal touch screen actual display to finish the feeding, sealing, cutting, punching holes and transporting only in one process, which can save man-power greatly and yield good economic result. The use of sophisticated and seamlessly integrated proven processes enables an efficient production.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 该机适用于原材料为无纺布，覆膜无纺布，专业生产一次成型覆膜的立体袋（免翻），设备生产稳定，袋子热合部位牢固，美观，高档、大方，可反复利用，主要用于生产无纺布烟、酒包装袋，无纺布饮料包装袋，礼品袋，酒店广告袋等高档无纺布袋，该机集机电为一体，运用LCD触摸屏操作。配以步进步式定长，光电跟踪，电脑自动定位，电脑自动纠边，准确，平稳，自动计数，即可设定计数报警，自动烫把手，自动叠袋等工控装置。

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 該機適用於原材料為無紡布，覆膜無紡布，專業生產一次成型覆膜的立體袋（免翻），設備生產穩定，袋子熱合部位牢固，美觀，高檔、大方，可反復利用，主要用於生產無紡布煙、酒包裝袋，無紡布飲料包裝袋，禮品袋，酒店廣告袋等高檔無紡布袋，該機集機電為一體，運用LCD觸控式螢幕操作。配以步進步式定長，光電跟蹤，電腦自動定位，電腦自動糾邊，準確，平穩，自動計數，即可設定計數報警，自動燙把手，自動疊袋等工控裝置。

CompanyNameSc: 德商博锐仪器（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 德商博锐仪器（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: 全自动弹性体硬度测试器
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 医疗行业中涉及管状材料，大多数的管壁厚度不会超过 6mm。此类材料进行研发或量产过程中有效的质量控制最好的方式之一就是硬度测试。博锐 digi test II 为软管提供 IRHD M 模式；硬管使用博锐仪器自主研发的Micro Shore D 模式测试，可测的管壁厚度下限均约为 0.5mm。
TechNameTc: 全自动弹性体硬度测试器
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 醫療行業中涉及管狀材料，大多數的管壁厚度不會超過 6mm。此類材料進行研發或量產過程中有效的品質控制最好的方式之一就是硬度測試。博銳 digi test II 為軟管提供 IRHD M 模式；硬管使用博銳儀器自主研發的Micro Shore D 模式測試，可測的管壁厚度下限均約為 0.5mm。
TechNameEn: Digi Test II - A Modularized Tester for Shore, IRHD and VLRH
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The medical industry involves tubular materials, most of which are no more than 6mm thick. One of the best ways toachieve effective quality control in the development or mass production of such materials is hardness testing. Bareissdigi test II provides the IRHD M mode for hoses; the hard tube was tested by Micro Shore D mode independentlydeveloped by Bareiss, and the lower limit of tube wall thickness that could be measured is about 0.5mm.

CompanyNameSc: 海宁宜利贸易有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 海寧宜利貿易有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 利用IC-RDK系列，ILLIG开发了一种成型和冲压技术，适用于实现射线和铰链包装的卓越零件质量和再现性，用于运输过程中保护食品和作为销售包装。机器具有高可用性和易操作性。加热材料由预拉伸器和压缩空气形成，产品在同一周期内由材料冲压而成。该方法使产品在成型过程中不会出现边缘冲孔失配现象，从而提高了包装加工的自动化程度。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 利用IC-RDK系列，ILLIG開發了一種成型和衝壓技術，適用於實現射線和鉸鏈包裝的卓越零件品質和再現性，用於運輸過程中保護食品和作為銷售包裝。機器具有高可用性和易操作性。加熱材料由預拉伸器和壓縮空氣形成，產品在同一週期內由材料衝壓而成。該方法使產品在成型過程中不會出現邊緣沖孔失配現象，從而提高了包裝加工的自動化程度。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The ILLIG IC-RDK 80 automatic pressure forming machine with IC process control and forming/punching technology has a forming area of 756 mm x 565 mm. The ILLIG RDK series machine has become the industry standard. Forming the heated material film with a pre-stretcher and forming air, and in the same cycle separating the formed part from the material web enables the production of formed parts with high-precision trimmed edges, and thus ideal for the automated processing of packaging.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 本机组在材料的应用上有广泛的选择性，可充分体现不同层次的功能，具有高强度，高韧性，开口性，防潮性，透明性等性能；广泛应用于化工原料，粮食，化肥等大宗产品的包装，适用于各种重包装袋，提袋的制作，也可用作印刷复合基本材料。
TechNameTc: 具有高強度，高韌性，開口性，防潮性，透明性等性能
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 本機組在材料的應用上有廣泛的選擇性，可充分體現不同層次的功能，具有高強度，高韌性，開口性，防潮性，透明性等性能；廣泛應用於化工原料，糧食，化肥等大宗產品的包裝，適用於各種重包裝袋，提袋的製作，也可用作印刷複合基本材料。
TechNameEn: The Line Can Provide Multi Kinds of Choices On Material'S Application and Fully Embody Functions of Different Levels. with Performance of High Strength, High Tenacious, Opening, Moisture Resistance
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The line can provide multi kinds of choices on material's application and fully embody functions of different levels. With performance of high strength, high tenacious, opening, moisture resistance, transparency, it is widely used in packing of staple products (chemical materials, food, chemical fertilizer), heavy packing bags, totes and basic material for printing and recombination.

CompanyNameEn: HAN KING PLASTIC MACHINERY CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 汉王塑胶机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 漢王塑膠機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 三层重包装袋膜共挤吹膜生产线联机内压花和四色印刷机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1. 节能、省电, 高性价比，能快速投入量产。 2. 每小时最高产量可达350kg/hr、宽度稳定、厚薄公差4%以内,从吹膜,表面处理,印刷,压花到收卷,一条龙完成,减少占地空间 及人力成本。 3. 良好的厚薄平均度,易于后续的印刷、装填及封袋等加工; 内压花让包装的货物易于堆栈。 4. 适合生产用于包装原料、谷物、饲料及种子等重包装袋。
TechNameTc: 三層重包裝袋膜共擠吹膜生產線連線內壓花和四色印刷機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1. 節能、省電, 高性價比，能快速投入量產。 2. 每小時最高產量可達350kg/hr、寬度穩定、厚薄公差4%以內,從吹膜,表面處理,印刷,壓花到收捲,一條龍完成,減少佔地空間 及人力成本。 3. 良好的厚薄平均度,易於後續的印刷、裝填及封袋等加工; 內壓花讓包裝的貨物易於堆疊。 4. 適合生產用於包裝原料、穀物、飼料及種子等重包裝袋。
TechNameEn: Three-Layer Ffs Heavy Duty Bag Co-Extrusion Line with inner Embossing Device and 4 Colors Printer Online
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. It assists you to saving more sources and energies.  From assemble starting until put into mess production can be completed in a short time.  To be provided with high quality-price ratio. 2. Increasing the output up to 350kg/hr, steady film width, and the thickness tolerance can reach within  4%.  One-stop design, from the blown film, surface treating, printing, embossing to final rewinding can be completed at same time.  It reduces floor space and related costs effectively. 3. Reducing the thickness tolerance leads to easy follow-up printing, filling and sealing bags and other processing, inner embossing lets the packaged goods to be easily stacked. 4. Suitable to manufacture the heavy duty bags that can be used to packing the resin materials, cereals, fodders, seeds and so on.

CompanyNameSc: 阿博格机械 （上海 ） 有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 阿柏格機械 （上海 ） 有限公司
TechNameSc: ALLROUNDER 470 E金色电子：用于汽车
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 为了可重复生产高质量的液态组件，ARBURG首次展示了液态版本的GOLDEN ELECTRIC系列电气ALLROUNDER。展览会生产自动且经济的液态光学器件，每个光学器件具有33个光导，并配备了两个机械手：线性MULTILIFT SELECT 可以从工具上取下透镜并将其放在冷却台上。六轴机械手将注塑件送入激光站，并在其中应用DM代码。这使每个部件100可追溯。液态镜头例如在汽车的矩阵大灯中，用于根据情况打开和关闭LED远光灯。
TechNameTc: ALLROUNDER 470 E金色電子：用於汽車
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 為了可重複生產高品質的液態組件，ARBURG首次展示了液態版本的GOLDEN ELECTRIC系列電氣ALLROUNDER。展覽會生產自動且經濟的液態光學器件，每個光學器件具有33個光導，並配備了兩個機械手：線性MULTILIFT SELECT 可以從工具上取下透鏡並將其放在冷卻臺上。六軸機械手將注塑件送入鐳射站，並在其中應用DM代碼。這使每個部件100可追溯。液態鏡頭例如在汽車的矩陣大燈中，用於根據情況打開和關閉LED遠光燈。
TechNameEn: ALLROUNDER 470 E GOLDEN ELECTRIC: LSR Lens for Car Headlights
TechnologyDescriptionEn: To demonstrate the reproducible production of high-quality LSR components, ARBURG is showcasing an electric ALLROUNDER from the GOLDEN ELECTRIC series in an LSR version for the first time. The exhibit produces LSR lenses, each containing 33 optical fibres, in an automated and cost-effective manner and is equipped with two robotic systems: a linear MULTILIFT SELECT removes the lenses from the mould and places them on a cooling station. A six-axis robot delivers the injection moulded parts to a laser station where a DM code is applied. Every part is therefore 100 per cent traceable. LSR lenses are used, for example, in matrix headlights for cars to switch the LED main beam lights on and off depending on the situation. ARBURG's primary focus is on digitalisation and circular economy  the company is a leader in the industry in these fields thanks to its arburgXworld and arburgGREENworld programs. All machines exhibited at the stand are networked with the ARBURG host computer system ALS.

CompanyNameSc: 威猛巴顿菲尔机械设备（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 威猛巴顿菲尔机械设备（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: 微型注塑机 MicroPower 15/10 生产单元在医疗方面的应用
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 威猛巴顿菲尔微型注塑机 MicroPower 可配置洁净室空间生产医疗产品。本次展会将会展出一台锁模力为15T的MicroPower 15/10注塑机，用于生产医疗微型管的卡环，该卡环重量仅仅2mg。该注塑机配置了转盘，并集成了威猛W8VS2机械手和视觉检测系统。生产出来的产品经视觉检测后，将被机械手区别（良品/不良品）放置在特殊容器中。
TechNameTc: 微型注塑机 MicroPower 15/10 生产单元在医疗方面的应用
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 威猛巴頓菲爾微型注塑機 MicroPower 可配置潔淨室空間生產醫療產品。本次展會將會展出一台鎖模力為15T的MicroPower 15/10注塑機，用於生產醫療微型管的卡環，該卡環重量僅僅2mg。該注塑機配置了轉盤，並集成了威猛W8VS2機械手和視覺檢測系統。生產出來的產品經視覺檢測後，將被機械手區別（良品/不良品）放置在特殊容器中。
TechNameEn: Medical Application on Micropower 15/10 Production Cell
TechnologyDescriptionEn: MicroPower series from WITTMANN BATTENFELD designed for the production of micro parts in the clean-room version. Using a MicroPower 15/10 with 150 kN clamping force, a micro retaining ring for medical miniature tubes will be produced. This product has a part weight of only 2 mg.The machine comes with a rotary unit, an integrated WITTMANN W8VS2 robot and a camera for complete parts inspection. Following removal and camera inspection, the parts are transferred to transport containers, separated according to individual cavities.

CompanyNameEn: MAAG AUTOMATIK PLASTICS MACHINERY (SHANGHAI) CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 马格澳迈塑料机械（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 馬格澳邁塑料機械（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: BAOLI?-3 拉条造粒机生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: BAOLI-3配备德国制造的核心部件，专门用于硬质和软质造粒材料。对于此次重新设计的型号，最值得关注的亮点是BAOLI-3采用紧凑的设计，具有高度调节，左侧/右侧控制功能，它可操作灵活性更强，并降低了生产过程中的噪音。同时，它的内腔易于清洁，从而更便于维护，更换配方和更换颜色。BAOLI-3也符合所有德国安全标准，这使它成为国内极为可靠和安全的拉条造粒机。MAAG 利用其六十多年的经验和在中国将近 800台宝粒造粒机运转数量，开发了全新的强化版设备，提供高度可靠性、改进的操作和优化的成本/收
TechNameTc: BAOLI?-3 拉條造粒機生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: BAOLI-3配備德國製造的核心部件，專門用於硬質和軟質造粒材料。對於此次重新設計的型號，最值得關注的亮點是BAOLI-3採用緊湊的設計，具有高度調節，左側/右側控制功能，它可操作靈活性更強，並降低了生產過程中的噪音。同時，它的內腔易於清潔，從而更便於維護，更換配方和更換顏色。BAOLI-3也符合所有德國安全標準，這使它成為國內極為可靠和安全的拉條造粒機。MAAG 利用其六十多年的經驗和在中國將近 800台寶粒造粒機運轉數量，開發了全新的強化版設備，提供高度可靠性、改進的操作和優化的成本/收
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The BAOLI-3 is outfitted with German-made core components and has been designed for use with both hard and soft pelletizing materials. The most noteworthy highlights of this redesign are the BAOLI- 3s compact design that features height-adjustment, left-side/right-side control capabilities that provide greater operational flexibility, and reduced noise generation during operation. At the same time it offers easy access for cleaning making it easy for maintenance, material changes, and color changes. The BAOLI- 3 also meets all German regulatory standards for safety, which makes it a most reliable and safe strand pelletizer manufactured in China. MAAG Group capitalized on its more than six decades of experience and an installed base of nearly 800 BAOLI pelletizers in China to develop a new and enhanced version which provides high reliability, improved handling, and an optimized cost/benefit ratio.

CompanyNameSc: 埃特林格-亚太区
CompanyNameTc: 埃特林格-亞太區
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Ettlinger 生产的所有过滤器均采用旋转式多孔滤鼓，可进行自清洁，熔体不断从外向内流入滤鼓。刮除器清除残留在表面上的杂质并将其送至排出系统。因此实现了全自动无间断运转，有时数周甚至数月无需更换滤网  熔体损失最小，熔体可更好地混合及均化。
TechNameTc: 新型高效熔體篩檢程式
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Ettlinger 生產的所有篩檢程式均採用旋轉式多孔濾鼓，可進行自清潔，熔體不斷從外向內流入濾鼓。刮除器清除殘留在表面上的雜質並將其送至排出系統。因此實現了全自動無間斷運轉，有時數周甚至數月無需更換濾網  熔體損失最小，熔體可更好地混合及均化。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: All Ettlinger filters are self-cleaning with a rotating, perforated drum, through which there is a continuous flow of melt from the outside to the inside. A scraper removes the contaminants that are held back on the surface and feeds them to the discharge system. This enables the filter to be used fully automatically and without any disruptions over a period of weeks and months without having to replace the screen. The advantages: ultra-low melt losses and good mixing and homogenizing of the melts.

CompanyNameSc: 裕克施乐塑料制品(太仓)有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 裕克施樂塑料製品(太倉)有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.应用于家用电器开关门控制领域。 2.与触摸、手式，语音等开关模块配合实现自动开门和关门 3.兼顾手动开门模式，可以实现“手自一体”，随时任意切换开门模式
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.應用於家用電器開關門控制領域。 2.與觸摸、手式，語音等開關模組配合實現自動開門和關門 3.兼顧手動開門模式，可以實現“手自一體”，隨時任意切換開門模式
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.Apply to household appliance door control (oven, fridge) 2.Realize automatic door open and close together touch, voice, gesture control module 3.Free switch between manual mode and automatic mode

CompanyNameSc: 德国库纳设备制造公司
CompanyNameTc: 德国库纳设备制造公司
TechNameSc: Cool Bubble? 非PVC医疗液体袋水冷吹膜生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 与空气冷却吹膜生产线比较，我们的水冷Cool Bubble?生产线从上向下挤出。熔体用水急冷生产出无定形聚合物结构，使其产生需要的性能如弹性、透明度、热成型性能、耐刺穿和耐撕裂。
TechNameTc: Cool Bubble? 非PVC医疗液体袋水冷吹膜生产线
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 與空氣冷卻吹膜生產線比較，我們的水冷Cool Bubble?生產線從上向下擠出。熔體用水急冷生產出無定形聚合物結構，使其產生需要的性能如彈性、透明度、熱成型性能、耐刺穿和耐撕裂。
TechNameEn: Cool Bubble? Water Quenched Blown Film Lines for Non-PVC Medical Fluid Bags
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Compared to air cooled blown film lines, our water quenched Cool Bubble? lines extrude from the top down. The shock-like water quenching of the melt produces a film with an amorphous polymer structure, which imparts desirable properties such as elasticity, clarity, thermoformability, puncture and tear resistance.

CompanyNameSc: 马路科技顾问股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 馬路科技顧問股份有限公司
TechNameSc: GOM CT-工业计算机断层扫描技术
TechnologyDescriptionSc: GOM CT是一套用于计量CT系统，提供高精度可重复测量结果数据。即使是极小测量体积，也能得到最高分辨率完整表面网格。 GOM CT可扫描具有内部结构透明部件或非常复杂的注塑件，其应用领域包括首件检验、模具放行和医疗部件检测等,内外部部件几何形状都可于标称-实 际对比、形状和尺寸检查和逆向工程等。
TechNameTc: GOM CT-工業電腦斷層掃描技術
TechnologyDescriptionTc: GOM CT是一套用於計量CT系統，提供高精度可重複測量結果資料。即使是極小測量體積，也能得到最高解析度完整表面網格。 GOM CT可掃描具有內部結構透明部件或非常複雜的注塑件，其應用領域包括首件檢驗、模具放行和醫療部件檢測等,內外部部件幾何形狀都可於標稱-實 際對比、形狀和尺寸檢查和逆向工程等。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The GOM CT digitizes complex parts including the internal geometries at the finest level of detail. You get a complete 3D image for GD&T analyses or nominal-actual comparisons. The metrology CT particularly excels in digitizing small plastic and light metal parts. For producing its precise 3D measuring data, GOM CT applies mathematical intelligence: It combines perfectly interconnected algorithms throughout the measuring sequence with digital modeling of the measuring room. Additionally, the system features optimized mechanical stability of all components that are relevant for performing the measurement. The bottom line: Based on the measuring results, you can evaluate a parts quality in a truly reliable, highly precise way and conduct further analysis.

CompanyNameSc: 马路科技顾问股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 馬路科技顧問股份有限公司
TechNameSc: ATOS 5- 工业级光学量测技术
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 专为工业用途研发的ATOS 5带来高精确性的资料，即使在严苛的环境下依然可以在短时间内完成量测。全域的3D量测资料允许全面性的的处理与质量控制，并将隐藏的错误视觉化，加速产品的制作流程。 ATOS 5所拥有的强力光源带来了高精准的数据资料，可以广泛的用于各种自动化与非自动化的设备，从模具加工设备到塑胶零件、金属零件等皆可使使用。GOM的数据质量卓越，在3D物件的细节呈现上特别出色，象是最细微的加工部位，曲面结构、狭窄的弯曲地带、有摺叠的边缘部位。
TechNameTc: ATOS 5- 工業級光學量測技術
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 專為工業用途研發的ATOS 5帶來高精確性的資料，即使在嚴苛的環境下依然可以在短時間內完成量測。全域的3D量測資料允許全面性的的處理與品質控制，並將隱藏的錯誤視覺化，加速產品的製作流程。 ATOS 5所擁有的強力光源帶來了高精准的資料資料，可以廣泛的用於各種自動化與非自動化的設備，從模具加工設備到塑膠零件、金屬零件等皆可使使用。GOM的資料品質卓越，在3D物件的細節呈現上特別出色，像是最細微的加工部位，曲面結構、狹窄的彎曲地帶、有摺疊的邊緣部位。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Developed for industrial use, ATOS 5 delivers high-precision data in a short measuring time even under harsh conditions.The full-field 3D measuring data allows comprehensive process and quality control, visualizing hidden errors and thus speeding up production processes. With its powerful light source, ATOS 5 delivers high-precision data for a diverse range of manual and automated applications: from tools and molds to plastic and metal parts.The GOM data quality is particularly evident in the detail sharpness of the 3D models, for example, in the precise display of smallest details, rib structures, narrow radii or hemmed edges.

CompanyNameSc: 巨鼎包装机械（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 巨鼎包裝機械（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: 八边封滑块拉链袋内加提手制袋机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 八边封平底拉链袋制袋机，生产八边封平底袋，和传统包装相比，易于运输携带，5面印刷图案更具吸引力，节省成本。袋子上增加滑扣拉链和侧边手提把，滑扣拉链易于多次开启，侧边提手设计便于倒出内容物，包装更人性化。
TechNameTc: 八邊封滑塊拉鍊袋內加提手製袋機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 八邊封平底拉鍊袋製袋機，生產八邊封平底袋，和傳統包裝相比，易於運輸攜帶，5面印刷圖案更具吸引力，節省成本。袋子上增加滑扣拉鍊和側邊手提把，滑扣拉鍊易於多次開啟，側邊提手設計便於倒出內容物，包裝更人性化。
TechNameEn: Flat Bottom Pouch Making Machine with Slider Zipper and inner Plastic Handle
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Flat bottom pouch most stable, easy carry, 5side printable more appealing and self-standing of traditional bags. Flat Bottom bags are extremely efficient for shipping, so you can reduce the total cost by switching from your previous packaging. It add slider zipper and inner tape. This is convenient for user carrying and muti-time open-close.

CompanyNameSc: 上海克劳斯玛菲机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 上海克劳斯玛菲机械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 5毫升注射器是一种常用的医疗耗材，主要使用在临床和医疗实验等领域。 PXA200全电动注塑机以大的容模量，0.1%以下的注射重复精度以及高性能的模板运动为5毫升注射器高效，稳定的生产提供了保证，另外低于国家一级能耗标准的耗能量为用户节省了使用成本。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 5毫升注射器是一種常用的醫療耗材，主要使用在臨床和醫療實驗等領域。 PXA200全電動注塑機以大的容模量，0.1%以下的注射重複精度以及高性能的範本運動為5毫升注射器高效，穩定的生產提供了保證，另外低於國家一級能耗標準的耗能量為用戶節省了使用成本。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 5 ml syringe is a common medical consumable, mainly used in clinical and medical experiments. PXA200 fully electric injection molding machine with large mold space, less than 0.1% injection repeat precision and high-performance platen movement for the 5 ml syringe guarantees efficient and stable production. In addition, the energy it uses is lower than the national level 1 energy consumption standards, thus helps save energy cost for users

CompanyNameSc: 摩丹卡勒多尼塑料机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 摩丹卡勒多尼塑料机械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: METRO SG HOS吸料器让物料被快速洁净的输送到料斗、干燥桶或计量设备。所有吸料器都由电抛光不锈钢制成。在每次吸料后都能自爆清洁。气密式的吸料器保证了输送单元无尘，安全、无污染和无损耗的装料提高了生产率，同时遵守制药和医疗产品制造的严格法规。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: METRO SG HOS吸料器讓物料被快速潔淨的輸送到料斗、乾燥桶或計量設備。所有吸料器都由電拋光不銹鋼製成。在每次吸料後都能自爆清潔。氣密式的吸料器保證了輸送單元無塵，安全、無污染和無損耗的裝料提高了生產率，同時遵守製藥和醫療產品製造的嚴格法規。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: METRO SG HOS let virgin and regrind material to be conveyed quickly and cleanly to the hopper of a processing machine, a drying bin or a dosing and mixing unit. The strong stainless-steel filter is automatically cleaned by implosion after each loading. The material loader is air-tight, the conveying performance remains stable and there is no dust around the unit. Safe, contamination-free and loss-free material loading enhances productivity while complying with the strict regulations governing the manufacture of pharmaceutical and medical products.

TechnologyDescriptionEn: The new generation of the HydroTracer HT3 enables even easier moisture measurement due to the overall change of the design. Measuring residual moisture more safe by using our brand new Test-Pads. Get THE moisture analyzer with most value for money. It leads to quicker results of the moisture level of your polymers before processing and helps to optimize your drying process. Identify possible weaknesses, monitor your process as accompanying standard or use it as relief for your laboratory.

CompanyNameSc: 密其静电消除设备( 上海) 有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 密其靜電消除設備( 上海) 有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Hyperion SmartControl 是密其最新研发的产品，SmartControl允许用户通过手机，平板电脑或远程桌面远程监测和调节连接的Hyperion设备的性能。SmartControl采用触摸屏显示，便于操作。SmartControl可轻松监测离子棒的性能，采用了Meech的离子电流监测技术，使用户可以监测静电棒的性能并记录数据。此外SmartControl还可以调整和控制连接的静电棒，以优化效率。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Hyperion SmartControl 是密其最新研發的產品，SmartControl允許使用者通過手機，平板電腦或遠端桌面遠端監測和調節連接的Hyperion設備的性能。SmartControl採用觸控式螢幕顯示，便於操作。SmartControl可輕鬆監測離子棒的性能，採用了Meech的離子電流監測技術，使用戶可以監測靜電棒的性能並記錄資料。此外SmartControl還可以調整和控制連接的靜電棒，以優化效率。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The Hyperion SmartControl Touch is the latest innovation from Meech. The SmartControl Touch allows the user to remotely monitor and adjust the performance of connected Hyperion equipment, through a mobile phone, tablet or remote desktop. The SmartControl Touch also has the added benefit of an in-built touchscreen for ease of use. The ionising equipments performance is easily tracked by the SmartControl Touch, which uses Meechs Ion Current Monitoring Technology allowing the user to monitor the ionising performance and display data logging. As well as monitoring, the SmartControl Touch also makes it possible to adjust and control connected ionisers in order to optimise efficiency. A single SmartControl Touch has the capacity for up to six devices to be connected at a time (additional devices can be connected using an expansion kit). This means that in an application using multiple ionising bars, they can all be monitored and controlled through one SmartControl unit.

CompanyNameSc: ST吹塑
CompanyNameTc: ST吹塑
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 使用ASPI SeCo版本的分段共挤生成型胚，然后两种不同的塑料材料按照模具配置程序中定义的顺序在此交替，从而生成在轴线上具有不同机械特性的中空吹塑产品。本型设备也是三维罩下导管的理想解决方案，可以减少组装数件并降低后续成本。 ST吹塑公司的最新研发工作聚焦于生产可追溯性、自诊断和自动过程控制。这三点是D-Print（新一代型坯生成器，精度和速度均高出前一标准100倍）、W-Print（直接将数据写入型坯并在中空吹塑件上读取）以及型坯吹胀监测器（监控型坯直径的一种光学传感器）等装置的功能目标。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 使用ASPI SeCo版本的分段共擠生成型胚，然後兩種不同的塑料材料按照模具配置程式中定義的順序在此交替，從而生成在軸線上具有不同機械特性的中空吹塑產品。本型設備也是三維罩下導管的理想解決方案，可以減少組裝數件並降低後續成本。 ST吹塑公司的最新研發工作聚焦於生產可追溯性、自診斷和自動程序控制。這三點是D-Print（新一代型坯生成器，精度和速度均高出前一標準100倍）、W-Print（直接將資料寫入型坯並在中空吹塑件上讀取）以及型坯吹脹監測器（監控型坯直徑的一種光學感測器）等裝置的功能目標。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: ST BlowMoulding is the world-leading manufacturer of extrusion-blow moulding machines with parison suction technique. The sequential co-extrusion versions ASPI SeCo are used to generate a parison where two different plastic materials alternate according to a sequence defined in the mould recipe, and to obtain a blow moulded item with different mechanical characteristics along its axis. This is the ideal solution for 3D under the hood ducts, to cut the number of pieces being assembled and the consequent costs. The latest developments in ST BlowMoulding are aimed at production traceability, self-diagnostics and automatic process control. These are the objectives of devices such as the D-Print (a new generation parison marker, with both precision and speed 100 times above previous standards), the W-Print (to write data directly onto the parison and read it on the blow-moulded item) and the parison swell detector (an optical sensor to monitor the parison diameter).

CompanyNameSc: FIMIC SRL
CompanyNameTc: FIMIC SRL
TechNameSc: FIMIC 过滤换网系统有两种功能：以刮刀清除网面
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 意大利的FIMIC过滤换网系统，我们的设计理念为：简单操作及保养，处理各样污染的塑料废料，极低料损，极低耗材成本，运行成本和人工及可弹性安装于各种不同的回收机上。FIMIC的换网系统只需一片网片，极大的过滤面积，可大幅降低运作过程中的压力温度，生产高质量的塑料颗粒。市面上的换网系统最常遇到的问题是换网系统太过敏感，无法避免的杂质进入换网系统后易造成损坏。FIMIC的设计避免掉这个高敏感度的问题，但同时保留最高的过滤效果。让使用者可以省下更多耗材支出。欢迎各位观众至FIMIC中国展的展台指教 !
TechNameTc: FIMIC 過濾換網系統有兩種功能：以刮刀清除網面
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 義大利的FIMIC過濾換網系統，我們的設計理念為：簡單操作及保養，處理各樣污染的塑料廢料，極低料損，極低耗材成本，運行成本和人工及可彈性安裝於各種不同的回收機上。FIMIC的換網系統只需一片網片，極大的過濾面積，可大幅降低運作過程中的壓力溫度，生產高品質的塑料顆粒。市面上的換網系統最常遇到的問題是換網系統太過敏感，無法避免的雜質進入換網系統後易造成損壞。FIMIC的設計避免掉這個高敏感度的問題，但同時保留最高的過濾效果。讓使用者可以省下更多耗材支出。歡迎各位觀眾至FIMIC中國展的展臺指教 !
TechNameEn: The FIMIC screen changer that allows both scraping and backflushing
TechnologyDescriptionEn: FIMICs design of the filter is an innovation,entirely different from the melt filter in the market.The design of FIMIC filter is basing on below ideas:Easy operation and maintenance,for different types of material and contamination,low operational cost,low melt loss,less worker needed,affordable spare part and flexible to work with different recycling extruders.FIMIC filter uses only one screen,punched or laser.Also,the filtration surface is very large comparing to other filters on the market.The most common issue for the melt filter on the market is too sensitive,the aggressive contamination could damage the parts on the filter and increases spare parts cost to the recyclers.FIMIC filter avoids this sensitivity on the mechanical parts,but to keep the high performance of filtration ability.With very fine filtration by our laser screen, low pressure and temperature during operation, the pellets produced from the machine which is installed with FIMIC filter has much better quality.

CompanyNameSc: ELBA SPA
CompanyNameTc: ELBA SPA
TechnologyDescriptionSc: SA-V高速预制袋制袋机经过精心设计和制造，具有灵活性，技术先进性，易用性以及能够生产多种高质量产品的能力。 SA-V机器完全配备了西门子组件，并且完全由基于Bus Profinet的最新HMI控制。 SA-V提供四种不同的密封宽度：650毫米（25.6），950毫米（37.4），1250毫米（49.2）和1550毫米（61）。 可以生产以下产品（根据所选配置）：2个侧面密封袋； 3个侧面密封袋； 站立式/背包袋; Doypack底部已插入； 侧扣袋; 中心密封袋。 提供各种附件和工具（阀门施加器，滑块施加器，easyopen工具等），以满足不同的客户需求并在不同的市场推广。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: SA-V高速預製袋製袋機經過精心設計和製造，具有靈活性，技術先進性，易用性以及能夠生產多種高品質產品的能力。 SA-V機器完全配備了西門子組件，並且完全由基於Bus Profinet的最新HMI控制。 SA-V提供四種不同的密封寬度：650毫米（25.6），950毫米（37.4），1250毫米（49.2）和1550毫米（61）。 可以生產以下產品（根據所選配置）：2個側面密封袋； 3個側面密封袋； 站立式/背包袋; Doypack底部已插入； 側扣袋; 中心密封袋。 提供各種附件和工具（閥門施加器，滑塊施加器，easyopen工具等），以滿足不同的客戶需求並在不同的市場推廣。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The SA-V high speed pre-made pouch making machine has been designed and engineered to be flexible, technologically advanced, easy to use and capable of producing a wide range of high-quality products. The SA-V machine is fully equipped with Siemens components and it is entirely controlled by a state-of-the-art HMI based on Bus Profinet. The SA-V is offered in four different sealing widths: 650 mm (25.6), 950 mm(37.4), 1250 mm (49.2) and 1550 mm (61). The following products can be manufactured (according to the chosen configuration): 2 side seal pouches; 3 side seal pouches;  Stand-up/Doypack pouches; Doypack with inserted bottom; Side gusset bags; Center seal bags. A wide range of accessories and tools (valve applicator, slider applicator, easyopen tools, etc.) is available to meet different customers' needs and to be promoted in different markets.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 身為塑膠押出專業模具製造商的政鈺機械,大量投入研發製造, 著墨發展更多元應用的模具 1.回收料(可應用在100%回料) 2.軟硬包裝材類模具包含PP/PET真空成形板 3.CPP/PE流涎模具 4.PE/EVOH/PLA淋膜複合模具 5.PC/PMMA/MS等光學板膜以及塗佈模具 從設計,CNC加工,鍍層處理到品管組裝都在廠內完成,可承做35mm到6500mm模具,並且有基礎手動調整模具到自動調整模具,可提供客戶完整的服務,配合多家專業學術機構研究設備或是配合歐洲,日本,中國等機械廠生產線
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The trend covers and influence whole industry chain, for GMA, a professional extrusion die manufacturer, in past many years, focus on design and making various extrusion dies for application of 1.Recycle material (can be applied on 100% recycle material) 2.PP/PET thermoforming sheet for food packing 3.CPP/PE film for flexible packing 4.PE/EVOH/EVA for lamination 5.PC/PMMA/MS sheet for optical sheet and coating etc. From design, CNC machining, chrome plating, quality control and assembling all be finished in-house, GMA also provide completely technique support for customers, die width from 35mm to 6500mm is available, manual and automatic type, GMA dies have stable quality and good performance, are applied on several academic research institution lab machine, and Europe, Japan and China etc., extrusion lines.

CompanyNameSc: 孚蕊哲静电科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 孚蕊哲靜電科技有限公司
TechNameSc: XIFOS 33，市场领先的33KV智能静电消除棒
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 市场领先的智能型XIFOS 33 静电消除棒内置 33 kV 高压，自带感应和输出调节功能，保证最佳的静电消除效果。设置简单，具有5位红/绿LED显示，M12 5芯电缆监控接口。兼容IEC 61131-2 第 1，2， 3 类PLC输入信号。 棒长从600mm, 750mm起步步长250mm直至 6,000mm。作用距离 250mm到1,500mm。非常适合大型卷绕包括分切/收卷，流延，挤出，吹膜和复合OEM机器配套厂商和终端用户。
TechNameTc: XIFOS 33，市場領先的33KV智慧靜電消除棒
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 市場領先的智慧型XIFOS 33 靜電消除棒內置 33 kV 高壓，自帶感應和輸出調節功能，保證最佳的靜電消除效果。設置簡單，具有5位元紅/綠LED顯示，M12 5芯電纜監控介面。相容IEC 61131-2 第 1，2， 3 類PLC輸入信號。 棒長從600mm, 750mm起步步長250mm直至 6,000mm。作用距離 250mm到1,500mm。非常適合大型捲繞包括分切/收卷，流延，擠出，吹膜和複合OEM機器配套廠商和終端使用者。
TechNameEn: XIFOS 33 , Market Leading 33 KV Anti-Static Ionising Power with Built-in Field Polarity Sensing and Adaptive Ionisation
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Offering market-leading performance, the intelligent XIFOS 33 static eliminator delivers 33 kV ionising power with built-in field polarity sensing and adaptive ionisation output to neutralise the actual charge. Ionisation distance and intelligence settings are easy to adjust locally, without the use of any tools. Status of the bar can be monitored easily by viewing the 5 green/red on-board LEDs. The XIFOS 33 is also compatible with IEC 61131-2 Type 1, 2 and 3 PLC inputs. Connectivity is via a standard 5-pin M12 connector, enabling customers to monitor its performance in any environment. Backwards compatible with Frasers NEOS 30 static eliminator, the XIFOS 33 is available in lengths of 600mm, 750mm, then in steps of 250mm to a maximum length of 6,000mm. Configured to neutralise charges at a range of 250mm to 1,500mm, the power of the XIFOS 33 makes it ideally suited to OEMs and end users with large winders, including slitters/rewinders, cast and blown film extruders, and laminators.

The lamination film is used in food packaging, medicine, electronics, industrial and chemical packaging.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 温度对印刷等的影响是无处不在的，智能温控粘度控制器解决了不同纬度，不同国家地区，不同气候条件下，印刷/复合的油墨胶水的温度差造成的色差，刀线，露白，转移不良等质量问题。 帮助印刷企业提高产品品质，降低废品率，减少客户投诉，以达到恒粘印刷的理想生产状态。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 溫度對印刷等的影響是無處不在的，智慧溫控粘度控制器解決了不同緯度，不同國家地區，不同氣候條件下，印刷/複合的油墨膠水的溫度差造成的色差，刀線，露白，轉移不良等品質問題。 説明印刷企業提高產品品質，降低廢品率，減少客戶投訴，以達到恒粘印刷的理想生產狀態。
TechNameEn: Smart Viscosity Controller with Temperature Control
TechnologyDescriptionEn: All of the printing companies would like to get the good printing result for their products, of course you will need to control well your ink or adhesive viscosity, but its not enough, because the ink or adhesive viscosity is influenced by the temperature difference a lot, wherever you are from any area of the world, the hot temperature countries or the cold temperature countries, by different horizontal, different climates of the world. If the viscosity controller is functionally equipped with the smart temperature control system, will help to keep the ink or adhesive in the constant temperature condition, then will be able to avoid the printing defects, such as the Color difference, Doctor line, Dry printing, etc. and will surely to help you to increase the printing quality greatly than before, to save the printing wastage greatly than before, and to own the constant viscosity control and really enjoy the perfect printing by using VISCON smart temperature control viscosity controlle

TechNameSc: 水性油墨打印在凹版印刷的应用
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 博斯特是一个走在行业前沿的独特商业伙伴，多年来通过技术创新和产品质量，不断扩展全球业务，提高客户专注度和优化运营，并且持续投资研发。水性油墨在凹版印刷的好处有：1，降低VOC排放，减少由于溶剂有毒物质对人体的危; 2，对生产加工程序的优化管理，避免溶剂墨水引起的静电及其带来的可燃性; 3，是水性墨水能够减少残留物质并取得更好的印刷质量.
TechNameTc: 水性油墨列印在凹版印刷的應用
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 博斯特是一個走在行業前沿的獨特商業夥伴，多年來通過技術創新和產品品質，不斷擴展全球業務，提高客戶專注度和優化運營，並且持續投資研發。水性油墨在凹版印刷的好處有：1，降低VOC排放，減少由於溶劑有毒物質對人體的危; 2，對生產加工程式的優化管理，避免溶劑墨水引起的靜電及其帶來的可燃性; 3，是水性墨水能夠減少殘留物質並取得更好的印刷品質.
TechNameEn: Water Based inks On Plastic Film and Applicability in Gravure
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Firstly is to reduce VOCs emissions at source, decrease and eliminate the hazards to the human body of organic solvent toxicity exposure, so as to ensure the occupational health of ink makers and printing workers, as well as improving the workplace and the ecological environments; Secondly: a converting company that chooses water-based inks coupled with BOBST technology, can not only simplify optimization of the flexible packaging production process and of the production management processes, it can also can avoid using solvent ink prone to static electricity and inflammable organic solvent; Thirdly, from the perspective of the converters output safety, water-based ink printing prevents the presence of solvent residue on the web or the ink migration that can affect the quality of the packaged product.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: IQ Power靜電消除系統是當今無可比擬的，性能卓越，並配有友好介面的智慧監控性能。主要用於複雜工業環境，並有多項專利技術，IQ Power高效靜電消除系統提供了超級優越的靜電消除性能。可以有效地消除諸如薄膜、紙張、非織造布和 纖維類的卷材和單張材料表面的靜電。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Simco-Ion's IQ Power Static Neutralizing System is an unparalleled lineup engineered with the techinology that brings complete monitoring intelligence within a user friendly interface. Designed for use in rugged industrial applications and leveraging many patented features, IQ Power provides superior ionization performance. This fully integrated system is simple to install. With our "smart addressing" technology, device can be added in a snap.

CompanyNameSc: STONER INC
CompanyNameTc: STONER INC
TechnologyDescriptionSc: StonerE206有机硅脱模剂是一款食品级的脱模剂和防粘润滑剂，可用于模塑的材料包括塑料，橡胶，蜡和类似材料。提供快速，简便的模具脱模和多次的脱模。在许多过程中提高成型效率，包括注塑，模压，转移，真空成型，浇铸，压铸和挤出成型。 E206有机硅脱模剂的优点：E206中的有机硅符合FDA 21 CFR 181.28标准，可作为食品接触材料生产中的脱模剂。无色且不染色。不含I类或II类消耗臭氧层物质，不含CFC或HCFC，不含氯化溶剂。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: StonerE206有機硅脫模劑是一款食品級的脫模劑和防粘潤滑劑，可用於模塑的材料包括塑料，橡膠，蠟和類似材料。提供快速，簡便的模具脫模和多次的脫模。在許多過程中提高成型效率，包括注塑，模壓，轉移，真空成型，澆鑄，壓鑄和擠出成型。 E206有機硅脫模劑的優點：E206中的有機硅符合FDA 21 CFR 181.28標準，可作為食品接觸材料生產中的脫模劑。無色且不染色。不含I類或II類消耗臭氧層物質，不含CFC或HCFC，不含氯化溶劑。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Stoner E206 Silicone Mold Releaseis specially formulated as a food grade release agent and anti-stick lubricant for molded materials such as plastics, rubber, waxes, and similar materials. Provides fast, easy part removal from molds and multiple part releases per application. Improves molding efficiency in many processes including injection, compression, transfer, vacuum form, pour cast, die cast, and extrusion molding. E206 Silicone Mold Release ADVANTAGES: The silicone in E206 meets FDA regulation 21 CFR 181.28 as a release agent in the manufacture of food contacting materials. Colorless and non-staining. Contains no Class I or Class II Ozone depleting substances, no CFC or HCFC, no chlorinated solvents

CompanyNameSc: STONER INC
CompanyNameTc: STONER INC
TechnologyDescriptionSc: TraSys420脱模剂是一种用于滚塑行业的水性脱模剂。当应用于模具时，它具有出色的脱模和防粘性能，并且摩擦系数非常低。它是干净，无油，无污染，化学惰性的，可以在高达260C（500F）的温度下工作。 TraSys 420脱模剂的优点： 水性产品，符合模塑商的生产，环境和安全要求。 每次使用都可以提供一整个星期的持续脱模。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: TraSys420脫模劑是一種用於滾塑行業的水性脫模劑。當應用于模具時，它具有出色的脫模和防粘性能，並且摩擦係數非常低。它是乾淨，無油，無污染，化學惰性的，可以在高達260C（500F）的溫度下工作。 TraSys 420脫模劑的優點： 水性產品，符合模塑商的生產，環境和安全要求。 每次使用都可以提供一整個星期的持續脫模。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: TraSys 420 mold release coating is a translucent water-based dispersion for rotational molding applications. When applied to a mold, it exhibits outstanding release or antistick properties and has a very low coefficient of friction. It is clean, nonoily, nonstaining, chemically inert, and can function in temperatures to 260C (500F) or higher. TraSys 420 mold release ADVANTAGES:Water based product, meet molders production, environmental, and safety requirements. Each application can provide consistence release for entire week.

CompanyNameSc: STONER INC
CompanyNameTc: STONER INC
TechnologyDescriptionSc: TraSys 4000 RotoFlow TM是一种模具涂层，可促进聚烯烃和尼龙树脂流入难以填充的模具的旋转区域。 RotoFlow有助于填充刀片周围的空隙，紧密的半径，螺纹和深腔。 RotoFlowTM可去除聚烯烃，尼龙和接合部分表面的针孔。它减少了桥接，变薄，气孔和静电线。 TraSys 4000 RotoFlowTM 优点：提高滚塑的聚烯烃，尼龙和接合部分的质量和一致性。去除针孔，空隙和爆裂。改善了线程的外观和操作性能。增加刀片的强度。减少废料并提高生产率。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: TraSys 4000 RotoFlow TM是一種模具塗層，可促進聚烯烴和尼龍樹脂流入難以填充的模具的旋轉區域。 RotoFlow有助於填充刀片周圍的空隙，緊密的半徑，螺紋和深腔。 RotoFlowTM可去除聚烯烴，尼龍和接合部分表面的針孔。它減少了橋接，變薄，氣孔和靜電線。 TraSys 4000 RotoFlowTM 優點：提高滾塑的聚烯烴，尼龍和接合部分的品質和一致性。去除針孔，空隙和爆裂。改善了執行緒的外觀和操作性能。增加刀片的強度。減少廢料並提高生產率。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: TraSys 4000 RotoFlowTM is a mold coating that facilitates the flow of polyolefin and nylon resin into hard-to-fill areas of rotational molds. RotoFlow helps fill in voids around inserts, tight radii, threads, and deep cavities. RotoFlowTM removes pinholes on the surface of rotomolded polyolefin and nylon parts. It reduces bridging, thinning, blowholes, and static lines. TraSys 4000 RotoFlowTM ADVANTAGES: Improves the quality and consistency of rotomolded polyolefin and nylon parts. Removes pinholes, voids, and blow outs. Improves the appearance and operational performance of threads. Increases the strength of inserts. Reduces scrap and increases productivity.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 米拉克龙ELEKTRON全电机具有洁净和精密等特性，是医疗行业对于洁净生产环境要求的最佳选择。此设备已经有丰富的医疗应用案例，成功应用于医疗植入物，医疗包装等。

CompanyNameSc: 赫斯基注塑系统
CompanyNameTc: 赫斯基注塑系統
TechNameSc: Ultra Helix?250 T2阀针式浇口喷嘴
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 全新Ultra Helix? 250 T2阀针式浇口喷嘴专为浇口位置不易触及的高精度注塑应用而设计，如翻盖式瓶盖、化妆品瓶盖及其他精细技术件。作为产品家族中最小喷嘴， 喷嘴孔直径仅12毫米。凭此产品，在直接进胶的应用中，注塑数百万次后，几乎测不到浇口残余，如此优异的浇口品质得以实现，并为模具商提供更多设计灵活度。用该喷嘴直接进胶注塑部件，可节省材料，加快生产周期，在更大温度区间内提升注塑性能。喷嘴嘴尖维护极便捷，无需从系统中移出模具。且提供卓越的部件品质、浇口使用寿命和更宽泛的成型窗口。
TechNameTc: Ultra Helix?250 T2閥針式澆口噴嘴
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 全新Ultra Helix? 250 T2閥針式澆口噴嘴專為澆口位置不易觸及的高精度注塑應用而設計，如翻蓋式瓶蓋、化妝品瓶蓋及其他精細技術件。作為產品家族中最小噴嘴， 噴嘴孔直徑僅12毫米。憑此產品，在直接進膠的應用中，注塑數百萬次後，幾乎測不到澆口殘餘，如此優異的澆口品質得以實現，並為模具商提供更多設計靈活度。用該噴嘴直接進膠注塑部件，可節省材料，加快生產週期，在更大溫度區間內提升注塑性能。噴嘴嘴尖維護極便捷，無需從系統中移出模具。且提供卓越的部件品質、澆口使用壽命和更寬泛的成型視窗。
TechNameEn: Ultra Helix? 250 T2 Valve Gate Nozzles
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The new Ultra Helix? 250 T2 valve gate nozzle is designed for small part applications with difficult-to-access gate locations such as flip-top closures, cosmetic closures and other small, technical parts. It's the smallest nozzle in the Ultra Helix? family with only a 12mm diameter bore for gate access. This makes it possible to direct gate parts with gate vestige so clean it is often unmeasurable, lasting for millions of cycles, and offering mold makers more design flexibility. By direct-gating parts with the nozzle, molders can achieve resin savings, faster cycle times and better performance across a wider temperature range. Besides, the technology allows nozzle tip maintenance to be performed with no need to remove mold from injection molding machine. This new offer provides the same superior part quality, gate longevity and wide operating window that customers are used to, while providing more flexibility to mold even smaller, more technical parts with ultimate precision and quality.

CompanyNameSc: 奇石乐精密机械设备（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 奇石樂精密機械設備（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: 在线质量预测系统ComoNeo PREDICT
TechnologyDescriptionSc: ComoNeoPREDICT采用基于模具的质量预测，计算注塑成型部件的特性。这项尖端技术采用了类似神经网络的有监督的机器学习算法。  具备完整的质量记录，可准确分拣废品 用户可直接监控预测质量特性，获取相关专有知识 将伪废品率控制在最小范围轻松界定容差标准和废品标准 自动选定用于计算的相关曲线点 不要求用户具备特别的数学或统计学知识 系统持续训练预测模型，不断提升预测水准
TechNameTc: 線上质量預測系統ComoNeo PREDICT
TechnologyDescriptionTc: ComoNeoPREDICT採用基於模具的品質預測，計算注塑成型部件的特性。這項尖端技術採用了類似神經網路的有監督的機器學習演算法。  具備完整的品質記錄，可準確分揀廢品 用戶可直接監控預測品質特性，獲取相關專有知識 將偽廢品率控制在最小範圍輕鬆界定容差標準和廢品標準 自動選定用於計算的相關曲線點 不要求使用者具備特別的數學或統計學知識 系統持續訓練預測模型，不斷提升預測水準
TechnologyDescriptionEn: ComoNeoPREDICT--The quality predictions are based on models that make it possible to calculate the characteristics of injection-molded parts. This cutting-edge technology makes use of supervised machine learning algorithms based on neural networks.  Accurate scrap separation method thanks to complete quality records Users acquire know-how from direct monitoring of predicted quality characteristics Pseudoscrap is minimized Tolerances and scrap criteria are easily defined Relevant curve points for calculation are selected automatically No special knowledge of math or statistics is needed to operate the software Ongoing training of models results in continuous improvement

TechNameSc: 奥科宁克QC-10：与众不同的模具铝材
TechnologyDescriptionSc: QC-10铝合金基于专利合金而开发，设计可用于生产量产型的注塑和吹塑模具，具有良好的耐磨性、断裂韧性和耐蚀性。QC-10铝合金机加工速度比工具钢要快8倍，可缩短模具制作周期。作为注塑模塑，与P20合金钢类型的钢模相比，注塑生产周期缩短了20%-40%。
TechNameTc: 奧科寧克QC-10：與眾不同的模具鋁材
TechnologyDescriptionTc: QC-10鋁合金基於專利合金而開發，設計可用於生產量產型的注塑和吹塑模具，具有良好的耐磨性、斷裂韌性和耐蝕性。QC-10鋁合金機加工速度比工具鋼要快8倍，可縮短模具製作週期。作為注塑模塑，與P20合金鋼類型的鋼模相比，注塑生產週期縮短了20%-40%。
TechNameEn: ARCONIC QC-10 Advanced Aluminum Molding Plate
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Specially designed from a proprietary alloy, QC-10 had been developed for production volume injection and blow molding applications, where superior wear resistance, fracture hardness and corrosion resistance are required. QC-10 machines up to 8X faster than tool steels, enhancing lead time. As an injection mold tool, cycle time are reduced by 20 to 40% versus P20-type alloys.

CompanyNameEn: UNIQUE INJECTION MOLDING SYSTEMS CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 广州一道注塑机械股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州一道注塑機械股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 动态注射成型是中国工程院院士、华南理工大学聚合物新型成型国家工程研究中心带头人瞿金平院士团队多年潜心研究的具有国际专利的科研成果。动态注射成型是一种完全有别于传统塑化注射过程的理念，简单而言，是指将传统的“稳态”塑化注射成型改变为周期性的动态塑化注射成型，包含动态固体压实、动态熔融塑化和动态熔体注射等基本技术原理。通过应用这一塑化原理，可有效增强流动性，加快注射过程，充模更均匀，大幅提升制品力学性能和质量要求。----------“基于动态塑化注射成型”专利技术的唯一授权生产单位!
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 動態注射成型是中國工程院院士、華南理工大學聚合物新型成型國家工程研究中心帶頭人瞿金平院士團隊多年潛心研究的具有國際專利的科研成果。動態注射成型是一種完全有別于傳統塑化注射過程的理念，簡單而言，是指將傳統的“穩態”塑化注射成型改變為週期性的動態塑化注射成型，包含動態固體壓實、動態熔融塑化和動態熔體注射等基本技術原理。通過應用這一塑化原理，可有效增強流動性，加快注射過程，充模更均勻，大幅提升製品力學性能和品質要求。----------“基於動態塑化注射成型”專利技術的唯一授權生產單位!
TechNameEn: Umim Series Dynamic Injection Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Dynamic plasticizing and molding is the research achievement with international patent of the team of academician QuJinping who is the academician of Chinese Academy of Engineering and pacemaker of National Engineering Research Center of South China University of Technology for Polymer New Type Molding Equipment. Dynamic plasticizing and molding is the idea different from the traditional plasticizing injection process. Simply speaking, it is the technology to change the traditional stable plasticizing injection molding into the periodical dynamic plasticizing injection molding, which covers the basic technical principles such as dynamic solid compaction, dynamic smelting and plasticizing, and dynamic flux injection. The application of this plasticizing principle is capable of effectively increasing the fluidity, accelerating the injection process, providing uniform mold filling and greatly improving the mechanical property and quality of the product.

CompanyNameSc: 应用材料公司
CompanyNameTc: 應用材料公司
TechNameSc: 卷对卷镀膜技术用于柔性电子和窗膜
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 新式卷对卷工艺满足了迅速发展中的市场对柔性电子和先进光学行业的多样化需求。移动设备与“物联网”正在推动柔性电子、射频识别(RFID)、生物医学设备和电池的增长。触摸屏正在从玻璃底玻璃基板转向卷对卷(R2R)塑料基膜，提供真正柔性、可弯曲、可折叠及可卷曲的显示屏。而且，先进的窗膜也正在被应用于建筑物和汽车，以有效降低能源消耗。
TechNameTc: 卷對卷鍍膜技術用於柔性電子和窗膜
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 新式卷對卷工藝滿足了迅速發展中的市場對柔性電子和先進光學行業的多樣化需求。移動設備與“物聯網”正在推動柔性電子、射頻識別(RFID)、生物醫學設備和電池的增長。觸控式螢幕正在從玻璃底玻璃基板轉向卷對卷(R2R)塑料基膜，提供真正柔性、可彎曲、可折疊及可捲曲的顯示幕。而且，先進的窗膜也正在被應用於建築物和汽車，以有效降低能源消耗。
TechNameEn: Roll-to-Roll Coating Technology for Flexible Electronics and Window Films
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Applied Materials focus on high-throughput low-cost manufacturing by enabling advanced Roll-to-Roll processes, while meeting the diverse demands of the industry - shape, size, weight, unbreakability etc. Multi-touch sensor solutions are shifting to double-side roll-to-roll coating on sensitive polymeric substrates.  Truly flexible, bendable, foldable and rollable displays are emerging.  High-uniformity, complex multilayer optical coating for color-sensitive decorative films.  High-quality energy saving window films for the future nearly zero-energy buildings (NZEBs) and electric vehicles (EV).  Batteries, Internet of Things (IoT), wearables, e-Textiles etc driving demand in innovative flexible electronics applications.

CompanyNameTc: 佛山市寶捷精密機械有限公司
TechNameSc: KPET3105-E6 快速瓶坯专用注塑机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.相对传统注塑机，节能效果明显；同吨位机型对比，产能提高30%-40%。 2.同步电动熔胶、传动效率高；提高产能。 3.使用专用的PET螺杆、标配纳米红外线发热圈，显著提高熔胶速度，降低塑化温度与AA值，有效改善产品的收缩问题，提高产品的透明度。 4.生产单克重为10-20g，腔数为48/64腔的水坯产品，或者生产单克重为100g-300g，腔数为24/12/8腔的油坯产品。
TechNameTc: KPET3105-E6 快速瓶坯專用注塑機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.相對傳統注塑機，節能效果明顯；同噸位機型對比，產能提高30%-40%。 2.同步電動熔膠、傳動效率高；提高產能。 3.使用專用的PET螺杆、標配納米紅外線發熱圈，顯著提高熔膠速度，降低塑化溫度與AA值，有效改善產品的收縮問題，提高產品的透明度。 4.生產單克重為10-20g，腔數為48/64腔的水坯產品，或者生產單克重為100g-300g，腔數為24/12/8腔的油坯產品。
TechNameEn: KPET3105-E6 High Speed Injection Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.Compared with traditional injection molding machine, the energy saving is more obvious; the capacity probably increase 30%-40% compared with the same tonnage models. 2.Synchronous electric charging, high transmission efficiency for higher productivity. 3.Using dedicated screw for PET, equipped with infrared heater, increase the charging speed obviously, meanwhile, decrease the plasticizing temperature and AA value, effectively improve product shrinkage,  and increase product transparency. 4.Especially capable for water PET preform of 10-20g with 48 or 64 cavities, or, oil PET preform of 100-300g with 24/12/8 cavities.

CompanyNameSc: 佛山市宝捷精密机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 佛山市寶捷精密機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 宝捷KF398是为了提升客户生产效率，改善品质而造的，全新的三大板设计，优化应力分布，提高刚性。全新的油路设计，进一步降低噪音，相比同类机台射速提升将近20%，从而让客户生产出更加漂亮均匀的产品，。KF398标配比例开合模让机台开合模位置更加精准，适应客户生产高端模内贴标的产品。KF398同时还标配同步溶胶功能，适应市面上带针阀的模具，相比同类产品可以提升25%的生产周期，从而帮助客户提高效率，改善品质和降低成本。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 寶捷KF398是為了提升客戶生產效率，改善品質而造的，全新的三大板設計，優化應力分佈，提高剛性。全新的油路設計，進一步降低噪音，相比同類機台射速提升將近20%，從而讓客戶生產出更加漂亮均勻的產品，。KF398標配比例開合模讓機台開合模位置更加精准，適應客戶生產高端模內貼標的產品。KF398同時還標配同步溶膠功能，適應市面上帶針閥的模具，相比同類產品可以提升25%的生產週期，從而説明客戶提高效率，改善品質和降低成本。
TechNameEn: KF398-S8 High Speed Injection Molding Machine for Thin-wall Prodcuts
TechnologyDescriptionEn: KF398 is devoted to improve customer productivity and quality. The new three-platen design optimizes stress distribution and increases rigidity.The new oil circuit design reduces the noise during production.The injection speed is increased by nearly 20% compared with similar machines, so that customer can produce more beautiful and uniform products.KF398 equipped with proportional mold opening and closing function makes the position of mold opening and closing more precise, which is suitable for customer to produce high class in-mold labeling products. KF398 is also equipped with synchronous charging function, suitable for molds with pin valve. It can shorten the cycle time by 25% compared with similar products, thereby helping customer improve production efficiency, quality and reduce costs.

CompanyNameEn: SHENZHEN YANGSEN INDUSTRIAL ROBOT CORP., LTD
CompanyNameSc: 深圳市杨森工业机器人股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 深圳市楊森工業機器人股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 双面模内贴标，对于国内现有的模内贴标技术，让模内两个方向的标纸分别固定在模具型腔上，同时对接机械手进行全自动生产作业，产品更美观，节省人力，大大提高生产效率。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 雙面模內貼標，對於國內現有的模內貼標技術，讓模內兩個方向的標紙分別固定在模具型腔上，同時對接機械手進行全自動生產作業，產品更美觀，節省人力，大大提高生產效率。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Double sided labeling in mold. For the existing labeling technology in mold in China, the labeling paper in two directions in mold is fixed on mold cavity respectively, and the full-automatic production operation is carried out by docking manipulator at the same time. The product is more beautiful, labor-saving and production efficiency is greatly improved.

CompanyNameSc: 佛山市宝捷精密机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 佛山市寶捷精密機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 特点： 1.全机八个机械动作均以伺服电机精密控制、驱动。相比传统气动/液压挤吹机，全电动挤吹机空循环动作时间快约三份之一。 2.多项专利设计的驱动装置，确保机器高速平稳运行。 3.节能：相比传统气动/液压挤吹机，全电动挤吹机在动作部分节能约70% 4.无污染：杜绝液压油滴漏污染以及维修过程油液溢出风险。 5.静音，消除液压系统固有的噪音和冲击，营造安静的生产环境。 6.智能化：全电机整个工作过程均由中央电胶实时控制，即时参数均可检测、可调整，实现机器智能化控制。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 特點： 1.全機八個機械動作均以伺服電機精密控制、驅動。相比傳統氣動/液壓擠吹機，全電動擠吹機空迴圈動作時間快約三份之一。 2.多項專利設計的驅動裝置，確保機器高速平穩運行。 3.節能：相比傳統氣動/液壓擠吹機，全電動擠吹機在動作部分節能約70% 4.無污染：杜絕液壓油滴漏污染以及維修過程油液溢出風險。 5.靜音，消除液壓系統固有的噪音和衝擊，營造安靜的生產環境。 6.智能化：全電機整個工作過程均由中央電膠即時控制，即時參數均可檢測、可調整，實現機器智慧化控制。
TechNameEn: EB70UE Full Electric Extrusion Blow Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Characteristics: 1.Totally 8 mechanical actions Driven by servo motor for precision control. Compared with the traditional pneumatic/hydraulic extrusion blow molding machine, the idle cycle will be shorter about 1/3. 2.Muti-patented driving device ensures smooth and high-speed operation. 3.Save energy. In respect of actions, it can save about 70% energy comparing with traditional pneumatic/hydraulic extrusion blow molding machine. 4.No hydraulic oil pollution and oil spill risk during maintenance. 5.No noise and impact of hydraulic system, and create a quiet production environment. 6.Intelligent: the whole operation process is timely controlled by the central PLC. The real-time parameters can be detected and adjusted to realize intelligent control. 7.The speed of mould moving and clamping are greatly improved. On the premise of providing sufficient clamping force, no additional load is generated on the driving elements. Patented design for technique optimization.

CompanyNameSc: 上海松井机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 上海松井機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 追求行业内超高性价比的质量式配合装置。1:采用垂直阀，简化结构，低成本，收纳于材料料斗内，便于拆除。2:远程监视和监控功能，通过网络连接， 即可实现对触摸屏画面的监视与远程操作。3:体积小能力大，最大能力达到60kg/h，有效实现在主材，色母材，添加材，粉碎材的各种高精度配比计量。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 追求行業內超高性價比的品質式配合裝置。1:採用垂直閥，簡化結構，低成本，收納於材料料斗內，便於拆除。2:遠端監視和監控功能，通過網路連接， 即可實現對觸控式螢幕畫面的監視與遠端操作。3:體積小能力大，最大能力達到60kg/h，有效實現在主材，色母材，添加材，粉碎材的各種高精度配比計量。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Gravimetric Blender,A peak-work gravimetric blender, pursuing higher cost-performance.1:Using a vertical valve,simplified and low-cost,Valve hidden inside hopper enables it quick un-assembly.2:Remote monitoring and operating function,With a network connection,monitoring and remote operation of the touch panel are enabled.3:The max.output reaches 60kg/hr.

CompanyNameTc: 台州市黄岩西诺模具有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 西诺模具专业提供高精密医疗器械模具，一次性针筒、塑料试管、细胞培养皿、培养瓶、吸头、雾化罐、呼吸面罩模具等。其中针筒活塞模具最大腔数可达128腔。此外还提供全方位的医疗器械注塑成型解决方案，实现各种医疗器械高效、稳定生产，为客户创造更大价值。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 西諾模具專業提供高精密醫療器械模具，一次性針筒、塑料試管、細胞培養皿、培養瓶、吸頭、霧化罐、呼吸面罩模具等。其中針筒活塞模具最大腔數可達128腔。此外還提供全方位的醫療器械注塑成型解決方案，實現各種醫療器械高效、穩定生產，為客戶創造更大價值。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: There are high-sensitive precision medical moulds with at least 5M shots for disposable syringe, blood test tube, petri dish, measuring cup, etc. The cavity number of some medical applications can be up to 128. Moreover, except the quality moulds, the one-stop solution with the comprehensive service would be provided to achieve stable, utmost safety and absolutely precision production of medical parts, to maximize the values to our customers.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 伊之密FF120电动注塑机将携创新技术研发成果—Servo Direct Control伺服直控系统，轻松攻克医疗行业制品“精度苛刻、难稳定”的核心难题，为客户创造高性价比解决方案。重点简介：● 高效：制品生产周期比传统方案优化了5s，产出效率提升37%，合格率提升8%；● 精密：制品尺寸偏差0.03mm；● 节能：节能省电，为客户减少50%的经济成本；● 环境友好：机器不会出现漏油、漏水带来的环境污染，符合无尘车间要求; 噪音低于60db。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 伊之密FF120電動注塑機將攜創新技術研發成果—Servo Direct Control伺服直控系統，輕鬆攻克醫療行業製品“精度苛刻、難穩定”的核心難題，為客戶創造高性價比解決方案。重點簡介：● 高效：製品生產週期比傳統方案優化了5s，產出效率提升37%，合格率提升8%；● 精密：製品尺寸偏差0.03mm；● 節能：節能省電，為客戶減少50%的經濟成本；● 環境友好：機器不會出現漏油、漏水帶來的環境污染，符合無塵車間要求; 噪音低於60db。
TechNameEn: FF Series Electric Injection Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Yizumi FF Series is equipped with Servo Direct Control, a latest R&D achievement by Yizumi; it showcases the technique of how to easily overcome the issues of “severe precision and difficulty of stability” in the medical industry and create an excellent cost-effective solution for the customers.● Efficient: cycle time is 5s shorter, production efficiency is increased by 37%, and the pass rate is increased by 8%;● Precision: product dimensional deviation within 0.03mm;● Energy-saving: saving 50% of the economic cost;● Environmentally friendly: avoid environmental pollution, in line with the requirements of dust-free workshop; the noise level of the machine is below 60db.

CompanyNameEn: YUDO(SUZHOU) HOT RUNNER SYSTEM CO., LTD
CompanyNameSc: 柳道万和（苏州）热流道系统有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 柳道萬和（蘇州）熱流道系統有限公司
TechNameSc: 96腔深孔板、PCR板热流道解决方案
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 针对96腔产品采用全热进胶，热流道系统采用24支精密热嘴，每支热嘴分成4个进胶口进胶；分流板采用ISO真空扩散焊接技术，可以使流道设计自由空间加大，实现流道平衡设计，确保产品的96个腔体同时进胶。
TechNameTc: 96腔深孔板、PCR板熱流道解決方案
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 針對96腔產品採用全熱進膠，熱流道系統採用24支精密熱嘴，每支熱嘴分成4個進膠口進膠；分流板採用ISO真空擴散焊接技術，可以使流道設計自由空間加大，實現流道平衡設計，確保產品的96個腔體同時進膠。
TechNameEn: Hot Runner Solutions for 96-Cavity Deep-Well Multiwell Plate & Pcr Plate
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Hot runner feeding for all 96-cavity products, the system applies 24 precision nozzles and includes 4 multi-gate on each nozzle. For manifold, it applies ISO diffusion bonding technology with flexible flow channel layout which could achieve runner balancing and ensure simultaneous flowing to 96-cavity.

At the same time,  we integrates the carriage, ejector and core pillers into the integrated servo power station, in the configuration cost savings, but also can adapt more molds with core pullers, will be practical and cost-effective to the best. in Chinaplas2020, we will conduct a demonstration of the production of high-gloss steam parts.

CompanyNameEn: NINGBO YONGHUA PLASTIC MACHINERY MANUFACTURING CO.,LTD.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 甬華YE全電動系列機型是第一款自主研發的全電動注塑機。適用于高技術高要求的塑料加工行業。 集結當今最先進驅動傳動技術，結合豐富的成型專業技術需求，融合簡單易用的人性化設計理念，採用現代化數位加工工藝，具備了節能環保、高速高效、控制精密、運行可靠、操作便捷等優秀性能，最大限度的滿足著客戶對機器穩定性、生產效率、環保性能的各種要求。
TechNameEn: YE All Electric Injection Molding Machine

It is suitable for plastic processing industry with high technology and high requirements. With the combination of the most advanced drive technology, the rich demand of molding technology, the simple and easy-to-use humanized design concept, and the adoption of modern digital processing technology, the company has the excellent performance of energy conservation, environmental protection, high-speed and high efficiency, precise control, reliable operation, convenient operation, etc., which can meet the customers' requirements for machine stability, production efficiency, and environmental protection Species requirements.

CompanyNameSc: 恩玛机械（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 恩瑪機械（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: - 新型撕碎-粉碎二合一一体机 - 这款新型的撕碎+粉碎一体机是2011年由法国ENMA设计师Vincent和中国ENMA设计师Ou li fei共同设计一款高效节能的撕碎-粉碎一体,为了节约客户的占地面积和更加节能高效，该机型将ENMA现有的EMS单轴撕碎机和GE系列粉碎机结合一起，诞生了这款名叫PERFECTSHRED二合一撕碎+粉碎一体机，PERFECTSHREDTM  系列共有4个型号分别为：600 800 1000 1300，完全满足工厂工厂内和工厂外的回收。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: - 新型撕碎-粉碎二合一一體機 - 這款新型的撕碎+粉碎一體機是2011年由法國ENMA設計師Vincent和中國ENMA設計師Ou li fei共同設計一款高效節能的撕碎-粉碎一體,為了節約客戶的占地面積和更加節能高效，該機型將ENMA現有的EMS單軸撕碎機和GE系列粉碎機結合一起，誕生了這款名叫PERFECTSHRED二合一撕碎+粉碎一體機，PERFECTSHREDTM  系列共有4個型號分別為：600 800 1000 1300，完全滿足工廠工廠內和工廠外的回收。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: - New Model two-in-one shredding-granulator - One machine for shredding to granulating solution for big bulk materials - The new shredding + granulating machine designed by ENMA French designer Vincent and ENMA Chinese designer Ou li fei together in 2011, with advantage of high efficiency, energy and space saving. This new model machine combines ENMA EMS single shaft shredder and GE series granulator, and then to give birth to this PERFECTSHRED series shredding - granulating two-in-one machine + crushing machine. PERFECTSHREDTM series is with totally four models: 600 800 1000 1300, fully satisfies both in-plant and off-plant recycling.

CompanyNameSc: 恩玛机械（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 恩瑪機械（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Rduire600系列大型粉碎机在所有类型的塑料应用中是非常出色的，大型工厂的废弃物回收和薄膜，型材，管材，板材，都是理想的选择。 在原来G系列的基础上设计师结合全球所有客户使用的经验，设计全新适合所有场合使用的粉碎机，起名为Rduire（法语的意思是：尺寸减小），中文名叫：乐减小。 该机型可以加装静音壳体，抬高机架，带水粉碎，更换箱体结构，刀具尺寸统一的模块化设计，可以在不同粉碎领域中应用，也可以和其他设备组合使用。 Rduire600系列有四种宽度：600，900，1200，1500mm。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Rduire600系列大型粉碎機在所有類型的塑料應用中是非常出色的，大型工廠的廢棄物回收和薄膜，型材，管材，板材，都是理想的選擇。 在原來G系列的基礎上設計師結合全球所有客戶使用的經驗，設計全新適合所有場合使用的粉碎機，起名為Rduire（法語的意思是：尺寸減小），中文名叫：樂減小。 該機型可以加裝靜音殼體，抬高機架，帶水粉碎，更換箱體結構，刀具尺寸統一的模組化設計，可以在不同粉碎領域中應用，也可以和其他設備組合使用。 Rduire600系列有四種寬度：600，900，1200，1500mm。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Rduire600 series granulators are excellent for all types of plastics and are ideal for waste recycling, films, profiles, tubes and plates in large factories. On the basis of the original G series, the designer combined the experience of all customers all over the world and designed a new granulator suitable for all occasions and named it Rduire, which has the meaning of size reduction in French. Chinese name is Le Jian Xiao. This machine can be equipped with soundproof cover, raised support frame, with water cooling, be replaced housing structure, with modular design in uniform knife size. It can be used in different granulating fields, or can be used in combination with other equipment, such as feed conveyor, discharge screw, air transportation. The Rduire600 series is in four widths, 600, 900, 1200, and 1500mm. - Opening housing design; - Structure for quick replacement of knife; - Scissors cutting technology; - Easy in cleaning, maintaining.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.高強規格PPS纖維：高斷裂強度、微開松，可用於製備改性PPS纖維。 2.細旦規格PPS纖維：纖度低，比表面積大，可用於混紡提高濾料的過濾精度； 3.紡紗級PPS纖維：捲曲率高、幹熱收縮低，適用於PPS紗線領域。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.High-strength PPS fiber: high breaking strength, slightly opening; Application: modified PPS fiber. 2.Fine denier PPS fiber: low fineness, High Specific Surface Area; Application: high filtration accuracy of the filter material; 3.Spinning grade PPS fiber: high crimp rate, low dry heat shrinkage; Application: PPS yarn field.

CompanyNameSc: 恩玛机械（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 恩瑪機械（上海）有限公司
TechNameSc: ENMA EBS系列大型高效单轴撕碎机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: EBS系列撕碎机的设计可满足各种行业对于较难粉碎的废料回收及高产能要求，可用于撕碎各种塑料制品、废旧木料、废纸及厚纸板、电子产品、生活废品、橡胶制品等，代表性回收产品有冰箱外壳、机头料、轮胎、托盘、 打包废品、中空桶、汽油桶以及管材和薄膜，化纤物等。EBS的转子直径为600mm，入料宽度分别为1200，1600，2000，2500mm。
TechNameTc: ENMA EBS系列大型高效單軸撕碎機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: EBS系列撕碎機的設計可滿足各種行業對於較難粉碎的廢料回收及高產能要求，可用於撕碎各種塑料製品、廢舊木料、廢紙及厚紙板、電子產品、生活廢品、橡膠製品等，代表性回收產品有冰箱外殼、機頭料、輪胎、託盤、 打包廢品、中空桶、汽油桶以及管材和薄膜，化纖物等。EBS的轉子直徑為600mm，入料寬度分別為1200，1600，2000，2500mm。
TechNameEn: Enma EBS Series Big Sized Efficiency Single Shaft Shredder
TechnologyDescriptionEn: EBS series shredder has been designed for the most difficult demanding and high throughput applications in recycling industries. The input materials can be all kinds of plastics, including wood, paper, cardboard, e-waste, post consumer waste, rubber, etc. in various shapes and sizes. Typical inputting materials are: fridge cover, purges, tires, pallets, bales, drums, barrels, pipes, films and fibers, and so on. EBS shaft diameter is 600mm and widths are 1200mm, 1600mm, 2000mm, 2500mm.

CompanyNameSc: 震雄集团
CompanyNameTc: 震雄集團
TechNameSc: 星火系列重新定义全电机标准的超级旗舰注塑机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: SPARK星火系列全电机优胜之处包括： 1. 兼顾了高射速与高射压，能同时满足薄壁和厚壁制品的工艺需求，全面适用不同产品； 2. 配以高敏动态操控[Agile Boost Control (ABC) technology]，令其较传统的注塑机控制反应快10倍以上； 3. 通过精巧的机械结构设计和供电系统，配合智能锁模力修整和智慧锁模力匹配等控制技术，是目前市场上最具能源效益及环保的全电动注塑机之一；
TechNameTc: 星火系列重新定義全電機標準的超級旗艦注塑機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: SPARK星火系列全電機優勝之處包括： 1. 兼顧了高射速與高射壓，能同時滿足薄壁和厚壁製品的工藝需求，全面適用不同產品； 2. 配以高敏動態操控[Agile Boost Control (ABC) technology]，令其較傳統的注塑機控制反應快10倍以上； 3. 通過精巧的機械結構設計和供電系統，配合智慧鎖模力修整和智慧鎖模力匹配等控制技術，是目前市場上最具能源效益及環保的全電動注塑機之一；
TechNameEn: The Spark Series All-Electric Injection Moulding Machine: Redefining The Common All-Electric
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The key advantages of SPARK are:  1.From ultra-thin-walled packaging, which requires high injection speed and very short cycle times, to thick-walled optical parts requiring low injection speed, sustainable high pressure and fine-grained pressure control, one machine takes care of all. 2.Armed with Agile Boost Control (ABC) technology, making the responses of the mechanical system of its traditional all-electric injection moulding machines more than 10 times faster. 3.Intelligent controls technology regulates power flow to necessary system modules and eliminates wastage, making SPARK one of the most energy-efficient and green all-electric injection moulding machines in the market today.

TechNameSc: 1000T二板式水平转盘对射成型机

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 泰瑞夢想系列1000T水準轉盤對射成型機，針對汽配產品的多物料、高精密、高標準要求專項設計。水準轉盤可承載超大重量的模具，且水準回轉的特性也能適應更多大型模具，可實現對定制化、多樣化、高端化的汽配模具的完美適配。兩個射台對向注塑，雙物料塑化成型，我們將在展會現場進行雙色車燈的生產演示，完美體現汽配專用機的優勢所在。

Set up with two opposite injection platform, we'll be able to achieve precision injection molding of dual-material high end auto parts lights etc. Large two-platen multi-component IMM, would be your perfect partner for the dual-color auto parts production.

CompanyNameSc: 广州市申发机电有限公司
