TechnologyDescriptionSc: “数码喷墨直印”工艺现在已经成为现实：这将如何影响产品装饰产业? 数码喷墨直接在产品表面装饰，无印刷制版工序; 可实现一物一图案，脱离印刷厂直接到产品工厂; 小批量，可变数据，即印即好，更深远的战略意义; 同时可用于喷涂市场产品; 复杂形状产品的装饰有独特优势; 可实现丝印、数码联机喷墨处理.
TechnologyDescriptionTc: “數碼噴墨直印”工藝現在已經成為現實：這將如何影響產品裝飾產業? 數碼噴墨直接在產品表面裝飾，無印刷製版工序; 可實現一物一圖案，脫離印刷廠直接到產品工廠; 小批量，可變資料，即印即好，更深遠的戰略意義; 同時可用於噴塗市場產品; 複雜形狀產品的裝飾有獨特優勢; 可實現絲印、數碼連線噴墨處理.
TechNameEn: Automatic Six Color Tube Digital ink-Jet Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Digital Ink-jet Printing is a Reality, How will this Affect the Product Decoration Industry? Digital Printing Machine Features: High-efficient: One-pass one-way printing, pattern printing completed in one stroke. Flexible: Using digital technology to control. Can import and print various images without additional preparation. Suitable for small batch rapid production. Economic: No stencil is needed. Accurate ink point control to avoid extra ink consumption. Property: High-speed bus connection. High-performance computer control. Advanced image control system for printing. Safety: Always design on the basis of ensuring the safety of operator and equipment. No risk of electric shock or mechanical injury in the places where operators are exposed to. Other features: non-contact, low energy consumption loss, low noise, wide range materials for processing, etc.

TechNameEn: 1.2083 Series and 1.4123 Series Steel for Mould
TechnologyDescriptionEn: BGH, originated from Germany, manufactures steel of 1.2083 and 1.4123 series which are with high corrosion resistance, and high mirror polished characteristics. By providing conventional melted materials, electroslag remelting (ESR) or vacuum arc remelting (VAR), BGH can meet different requirements on mould polishing of medical equipment according to customer needs. BGH is also capable of improving and developing newly patented grades to meet customer demands.

CompanyNameSc: 昆山市斯坦福机电科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 昆山市斯坦福機電科技有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: KODA热流道专用感温线 具有耐弯曲、耐高温、热响应快、测温精度高、坚固耐用等特点。 铠装丝为全套德国进口，测温精度达到美国SPECIAL精度等级，为1.1℃以内，允许偏差值在0.4%，品质的保证。 中间连接块分金属型和树脂型： 金属型，航空级耐温材料外包不锈钢套管，耐温可达700~800℃，且耐腐蚀，性状极其稳定，保证耐久性和测温精确性。 树脂型，全树脂结构，采用特殊耐温材料，耐温可达350℃，高绝缘，具有良好的用户体验。 导线采用高温导线，绝缘层铁氟龙材质，外包聚酰亚胺，多股导线。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: KODA熱流道專用感溫線 具有耐彎曲、耐高溫、熱回應快、測溫精度高、堅固耐用等特點。 鎧裝絲為全套德國進口，測溫精度達到美國SPECIAL精度等級，為1.1℃以內，允許偏差值在0.4%，品質的保證。 中間連接塊分金屬型和樹脂型： 金屬型，航空級耐溫材料外包不銹鋼套管，耐溫可達700~800℃，且耐腐蝕，性狀極其穩定，保證耐久性和測溫精確性。 樹脂型，全樹脂結構，採用特殊耐溫材料，耐溫可達350℃，高絕緣，具有良好的用戶體驗。 導線採用高溫導線，絕緣層鐵氟龍材質，外包聚醯亞胺，多股導線。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: KODA Temperature sensing wire (thermocouple), Dedicated to hot runner. It has the characteristics of bending resistance, high temperature resistance, fast thermal response, high temperature measurement accuracy, firmness and durability. The armour wire is a complete set of imported from Germany, the temperature measurement accuracy reaches the American special accuracy level, which is within 1.1 ℃, the allowable deviation value is 0.4%, and the quality is guaranteed. The intermediate connecting block is divided into metal type and resin type: Metal type, aviation grade temperature resistant material wrapped with stainless steel sleeve, with temperature resistance up to 700 ~ 800 ℃, corrosion resistance, extremely stable performance, ensuring durability and temperature measurement accuracy. Resin type, all resin structure, special temperature resistant material, temperature resistance up to 350 ℃, high insulation, good user experience. High temperature conductor.

CompanyNameSc: 一胜百模具技术（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 一胜百模具技术（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: TiN, TiAlN, AlTiN, ZrN 和 TiCN涂层可以涂在医疗手术器械上，实现不同的目的，如耐磨、提高润滑、深度标志、色标、美学装饰、减少粘着、降低器械刃口工作温度、防反光刺眼及提高手术器械寿命。我们集团的EIFELER涂层技术多年来在全球服务于器械OEMs及其供应商。一胜百涂层中心通过ISO13485认证。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: TiN, TiAlN, AlTiN, ZrN 和 TiCN塗層可以塗在醫療手術器械上，實現不同的目的，如耐磨、提高潤滑、深度標誌、色標、美學裝飾、減少粘著、降低器械刃口工作溫度、防反光刺眼及提高手術器械壽命。我們集團的EIFELER塗層技術多年來在全球服務於器械OEMs及其供應商。一勝百塗層中心通過ISO13485認證。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: TiN , TiAlN, AlTiN, ZrN, and TiCN coatings can be used on medical devices for different purposes. For many years, voestalpine eifeler Coatings has been an industry leader in successfully coating medical instrumentation for the orthopaedic industry. Assab coating center in Shanghai are ISO 9001 and 13485 certified.

CompanyNameSc: 苏州好特斯模具有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 蘇州好特斯模具有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 医用器具生产用热流道系统采用针阀系列进胶形式，使得胶口小，胶口产品表面漂亮。我公司针对透明PET塑料产品所出现的各种黄化，拉丝，流诞等问题有相当好的技术参数应对。对产品出现在的脆化，雾化在结构和加工精度上做出针对工艺的改变。在产品出现雾化和脆化上使用3D水路模拟分析，确保系统再生产时胶口周边的温度控制在产品原料的安全参数范围。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 醫用器具生產用熱流道系統採用針閥系列進膠形式，使得膠口小，膠口產品表面漂亮。我公司針對透明PET塑料產品所出現的各種黃化，拉絲，流誕等問題有相當好的技術參數應對。對產品出現在的脆化，霧化在結構和加工精度上做出針對工藝的改變。在產品出現霧化和脆化上使用3D水路類比分析，確保系統再生產時膠口周邊的溫度控制在產品原料的安全參數範圍。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The hot runner system for the medical appliances adopts the valve series of small gate to guarantee the fine appearance .Our company has special technical and sufficient experience to deal with all kinds of yellowing, drawing and drooling problems in transparent PET plastic products. 3D simulation analyses on the cooling as well as changes on the structure and machining precision for the atomizing and embrittling products to ensure that during reproduction the temperature around gate is accurately controlled within the range of safety parameter

CompanyNameSc: 马斯特模具（昆山）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 馬斯特模具（昆山）有限公司
TechNameSc: SeVG+—卓越的过程控制， 适用于要求严苛的应用
TechnologyDescriptionSc: SeVG+（伺服电动阀浇口）是一款伺服驱动系统，可对单个阀针的打开和关闭曲线提供绝对控制和精确性。它能够完全调节阀针的位置、加速度、速度、行程、时间和顺序。通过流动前端速度稳定、平衡控制、保压控制关键功能极大提高成型产品的质量，满足苛刻的要求。适用于所有成型应用，包括大型汽车部件和A级表面处理的光学透视镜。
TechNameTc: SeVG+—卓越的程序控制， 適用于要求嚴苛的應用
TechnologyDescriptionTc: SeVG+（伺服電動閥澆口）是一款伺服驅動系統，可對單個閥針的打開和關閉曲線提供絕對控制和精確性。它能夠完全調節閥針的位置、加速度、速度、行程、時間和順序。通過流動前端速度穩定、平衡控制、保壓控制關鍵功能極大提高成型產品的品質，滿足苛刻的要求。適用于所有成型應用，包括大型汽車部件和A級表面處理的光學透視鏡。
TechNameEn: Sevg+------Superior Process Control for Demanding Applications
TechnologyDescriptionEn: SeVG+ (Sequential electric Valve Gate) is a servo driven actuation system that provides absolute control and precision over individual valve pin opening and closing profiles. Fully adjust pin position, acceleration, velocity, stroke, timing and sequence. Critical capabilities that greatly enhances molded part quality by controlling Flow front speed stabilization,Balance control and Packing control.Available for all molding applications including large automotive and optical lenses requiring Class A surface finishes.

CompanyNameSc: 马斯特模具（昆山）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 馬斯特模具（昆山）有限公司
TechNameSc: ThinPAK系列-——新型薄壁包装热流道系统.
TechnologyDescriptionSc: ThinPAK系列是业界最新的热流道系统，专门为生产高品质薄壁包装产品而设计。ThinPAK系列采用全新的MasterSHIELD技术，具有高强度和耐久性，可在高达2800 Bar的高压应用环境中完全可靠地实现模塑成型。它能与PP、PS等树脂兼容。 创新的采用新型ThinPAK系列喷嘴、分流板、新型MasterSHIELD技术和钎焊加热丝技术,维修便捷、高效节能的同时，其精确的过程控制和可靠的防漏胶保护，精确的加热平衡和超高的压力极限，在高压薄壁的产品应用时表现出色的性能。
TechNameTc: ThinPAK系列-——新型薄壁包裝熱流道系統.
TechnologyDescriptionTc: ThinPAK系列是業界最新的熱流道系統，專門為生產高品質薄壁包裝產品而設計。ThinPAK系列採用全新的MasterSHIELD技術，具有高強度和耐久性，可在高達2800 Bar的高壓應用環境中完全可靠地實現模塑成型。它能與PP、PS等樹脂相容。 創新的採用新型ThinPAK系列噴嘴、分流板、新型MasterSHIELD技術和釺焊加熱絲技術,維修便捷、高效節能的同時，其精確的程序控制和可靠的防漏膠保護，精確的加熱平衡和超高的壓力極限，在高壓薄壁的產品應用時表現出色的性能。
TechNameEn: Thinpak-Series------The New Thin Wall Packaging Hot Runner System
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Introducing the industrys newest hot runner system specifically engineered for producing exceptional high quality thin wall packaging products. Incorporating new MasterSHIELD Technology, ThinPAK-Series has the strength and durability to mold with complete reliability in high pressure applications up to 2,800 Bar. Compatible with PP, PS and other resins. Using the new ThinPAK-Series Nozzles and Manifold,new MasterSHIELD technology,Brazed Heater technology.While convenient maintenance and energy efficient,ThinPAK-Series Hot Runner has excellent process control,reliable leakage protection,precise thermal balance  and 40% higher pressure limit than our standard manifold designs,so excellent performance for high pressure thin wall applications.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: Quantum FaroArm 和 ScanArm  8 轴三维测量臂解决方案，具有非接触式激光扫描功能。来自航空、汽车、金属制造、模具及装配制造等众多行业的专业人士使用 FaroArm 测量臂进行各种应用中的尺寸分析、检测和质量控制。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Quantum FaroArm 和 ScanArm  8 軸三維測量臂解決方案，具有非接觸式鐳射掃描功能。來自航空、汽車、金屬製造、模具及裝配製造等眾多行業的專業人士使用 FaroArm 測量臂進行各種應用中的尺寸分析、檢測和品質控制。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The 8-Axis Quantum FaroArm V2 and ScanArm V2 deliver the best in class, as the worlds only 8-Axis 3D measuring arm solution, with available non-contact laser scanning capabilities. Professionals from numerous industries such as aerospace, automotive, metal fabrication, tool & die, and assembly manufacturing use the FaroArm for dimensional analysis, inspection, and quality control in diverse applications.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 配备双激光、双振镜的高效配置，稳定精准的铺粉系统，高效精准的激光光路及管理系统，配合设备智能传感与监控，全方位反馈。可满足高效率、高强度、持续性生产需求，适用于模具、医疗器械、教育科研、汽车零部件制造等领域。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 配備雙鐳射、雙振鏡的高效配置，穩定精准的鋪粉系統，高效精准的鐳射光路及管理系統，配合設備智慧傳感與監控，全方位回饋。可滿足高效率、高強度、持續性生產需求，適用於模具、醫療器械、教育科研、汽車零部件製造等領域。

TechnologyDescriptionSc: PET专用微波干燥系统，将PET干燥时间缩短至1小时以内、每小时耗电量降低80%。同时，占用空间仅为传统干燥系统的五分之一，改善生产环境，提高环保水平。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: PET專用微波乾燥系統，將PET乾燥時間縮短至1小時以內、每小時耗電量降低80%。同時，佔用空間僅為傳統乾燥系統的五分之一，改善生產環境，提高環保水準。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: PET special microwave drying system, reduce PET drying time to less than 1 hour and reduce power consumption per hour by 80%. At the same time, the occupied space is only one fifth of the traditional drying system, improving the production environment and environmental protection level.

At present, it has been applied to the drying of PA, PC, PET, PETG, COP, PEEK and other raw materials ,the application effect is remarkable.

TechNameSc: 光学无尘镜头专用微波干燥机(1-5KG/H)
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 手机光学镜头、军工产品等高附加值产品领域，特别是未来随着5G技术的成熟和应用，莱沃推出的无尘光学干燥机，能够极大的提升手机镜头和VR镜头领域的产品质量及合格率，并实现快速节能的功效，突破行业瓶颈，助力干燥设备转型升级。

TechNameEn: Special Dryer for Optical Dust-Free Lens(1-5KG/H)

CompanyNameSc: 美锴机械亚洲私人有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 美锴机械亚洲私人有限公司
TechNameSc: Maguire超低能源真空式除湿干燥机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 干燥机的革新 Maguire真空式干燥机干燥塑料原料的速度是传统干燥机的六倍，并且最多能减少85%的能耗。低物料性状减损 长时间高温干燥，会使物料因为热、化学以及物理反应而降低品质。真空式干燥机缩短了干燥时间，从而大幅降低物料的性能减损。真空式干燥机从加热物料到完成干燥工作的热循环只需二十到三十分钟。
TechNameTc: Maguire超低能源真空式除湿干燥机
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 乾燥機的革新 Maguire真空式乾燥機乾燥塑料原料的速度是傳統乾燥機的六倍，並且最多能減少85%的能耗。低物料性狀減損 長時間高溫乾燥，會使物料因為熱、化學以及物理反應而降低品質。真空式乾燥機縮短了乾燥時間，從而大幅降低物料的性能減損。真空式乾燥機從加熱物料到完成乾燥工作的熱迴圈只需二十到三十分鐘。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: A revolution in dryers. Introducing the First ULTRA Low Energy Dryers by Maguire.Low Material StressLong drying times at elevated temperatures can cause thermal, chemical and physical material degradation. The reduced drying time required with the vacuum dryer dramatically reduces the risk of material degradation. The heating cycle is only 20 to 30 minutes.

CompanyNameSc: 威讯科技（集团）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 威訊科技（集團）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 我们的新型紧凑型LCF-400 CO-E吹膜机是我们常规的共挤吹膜机的可行性低成本替代品，具有以下特点：1、经过优化的智能，紧凑型设计，可最大限度地减少占地面积，从而为工作空间分配提供更多可能性。2、标配振荡牵引辊。 3、5层共挤吹膜试验线整体安装在坚固的钢制底座上，配有脚轮和调平螺栓，便于定位。 4、吹膜塔整体安装在低摩擦滑轨上，可以轻松移动，易于接近模头。 5、吹膜塔夹辊组件高度可电动调节，带有人字板，可实现最佳的吹胀比和灵活的膜泡冷却速率。 6、模块化叠加式模头。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 我們的新型緊湊型LCF-400 CO-E吹膜機是我們常規的共擠吹膜機的可行性低成本替代品，具有以下特點：1、經過優化的智慧，緊湊型設計，可最大限度地減少占地面積，從而為工作空間分配提供更多可能性。2、標配振盪牽引輥。 3、5層共擠吹膜試驗線整體安裝在堅固的鋼制底座上，配有腳輪和調平螺栓，便於定位。 4、吹膜塔整體安裝在低摩擦滑軌上，可以輕鬆移動，易於接近模頭。 5、吹膜塔夾輥組件高度可電動調節，帶有人字板，可實現最佳的吹脹比和靈活的膜泡冷卻速率。 6、模組化疊加式模頭。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Our new Compact LCF-400 CO-EX film blowing line is a viable low cost alternative to our regular co-extrusion film blowing lines and has the following features: 1.Smart, compact design optimized for minimum floor space consumption allowing for more possibilities in workspace allocation 2.Oscillating Nip-Rolls as standard 3.The entire 5-layer co-ex film blowing line is mounted on a sturdy steel foundation, which is equipped with casters and leveling bolts for easy positioning. 4.Entire film tower is mounted on low friction slides so it can easily be moved to give full access to the die 5.Motorized height adjustment of the tower nip gap with collapsing frame enabling optimum flexibility of blow up ratio and bubble cooling rate. 6.Modular pancake die which will be designed for your specific applications where we use our Canadian expert to design the die following specifications of the resin types you will use.

CompanyNameSc: 好塑热流道
CompanyNameTc: 好塑熱流道
TechNameSc: 针对家族模的FLEXflow伺服针阀热流道解决方案
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 家族模可一次注塑成型不同的产品，能够降低成本，提高生产效率，但也常存在一些问题，这些问题多与传统的阀针控制方法有关，比如平衡性差会导致翘曲等产品缺陷。 HRSflow好塑热流道的FLEXflow伺服针阀热流道技术可以独立控制每一阀针的行程、时间和力，能够克服在产品尺寸、重量、壁厚、体积等方面的受限，使料流同时充满各个型腔，防止出现过饱或飞边。 FLEXflow技术在提高产品质量、减少工艺调整成本、扩大工艺窗口、延长模具使用寿命等方面具有广阔的应用潜力。
TechNameTc: 針對家族模的FLEXflow伺服針閥熱流道解決方案
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 家族模可一次注塑成型不同的產品，能夠降低成本，提高生產效率，但也常存在一些問題，這些問題多與傳統的閥針控制方法有關，比如平衡性差會導致翹曲等產品缺陷。 HRSflow好塑熱流道的FLEXflow伺服針閥熱流道技術可以獨立控制每一閥針的行程、時間和力，能夠克服在產品尺寸、重量、壁厚、體積等方面的受限，使料流同時充滿各個型腔，防止出現過飽或飛邊。 FLEXflow技術在提高產品品質、減少工藝調整成本、擴大工藝視窗、延長模具使用壽命等方面具有廣闊的應用潛力。
TechNameEn: Flexflow for Family Mold: Different Parts in A Single Shot and Aesthetic Performance At The Same Time. Efficiency and High Quality: No Longer Need to Choose Between The Two!
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Family molds for the cost and time efficient production of different parts in a single shot, have traditionally been associated with problems caused by traditional pin control methods, including poor balancing causing e. g. warpage issues.  FLEXflow - HRSflow's servo driven valve gate hot runner technology, provides a broad potential to improve the quality of the parts, to avoid cost for additional process tuning, to broaden the process window and to extend lifetime of the tool. Using FLEXflow servo driven valve gate technology to independently control stroke, timing and force of each individual pin, can overcome existing limitations in terms of close similarity in size, weight, wall section and volume, whilst ensuring all cavities are being filled simultaneously, preventing from overfeeding and flash formation.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 高效的最新回收解决方案，由于前端的真空技术，末端的SSP增粘技术，配合艾斯瑞特PET特制的造粒挤出机可使得最终成品的IV数值达到要求，并且将这个数值能够稳定的保持下去。即使在前端的喂料过程中，有出现原料参差不齐的IV值、含水率等，经过我们的可靠机器也可以使最终成品保持在合理的、设定区间内的合格IV数值，质量稳定，产能稳定，安全可靠。可保持稳定的IV值输出，用于进一步的下游加工成型，例如拉伸吹塑制品，在新瓶中最高可达到100%瓶到瓶的技术。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 高效的最新回收解決方案，由於前端的真空技術，末端的SSP增粘技術，配合艾斯瑞特PET特製的造粒擠出機可使得最終成品的IV數值達到要求，並且將這個數值能夠穩定的保持下去。即使在前端的餵料過程中，有出現原料參差不齊的IV值、含水率等，經過我們的可靠機器也可以使最終成品保持在合理的、設定區間內的合格IV數值，品質穩定，產能穩定，安全可靠。可保持穩定的IV值輸出，用於進一步的下游加工成型，例如拉伸吹塑製品，在新瓶中最高可達到100%瓶到瓶的技術。
TechNameEn: Pet Bottle to Bottle Recycling Pelletizing System
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The latest efficient recycling solution. Thanks to the vacuum technology, the SSP IV increasing technology, and the pelletizing extruder specially made by Aceretech, the IV value of the final PET granules can meet the requirements, and this value can be stably maintained. Even there are uneven IV values and moisture content of the raw materials, the final pellets can be maintained at a reasonable, qualified IV value within a set interval, meanwhile the quality and the output are always stable. It can maintain a stable IV value output for further downstream processing and molding, such as stretch blow molding, up to 100% bottle-to-bottle technology in new bottles.

CompanyNameSc: 江苏艾斯瑞特机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 江蘇艾斯瑞特機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 单螺杆高效过滤造粒装备
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 在一台挤出机上实现双重过滤系统，针对杂质含量比较高的回收料，具有完美的过滤效果，例如可以使最终LDPE成品颗粒达到可吹膜级别甚至更高级别的应用。这一台挤出机上，第一道艾斯瑞特自主研发的自清洁过滤器，免除繁琐的人工换网，自动清洁排渣；第二道超大面积双柱式换网器，延长换网时间，并且可以更换不同精度的过滤网来实现不同的应用要求。这两道过滤可充分发挥排气段效率，制品会有明显的改善。操作系统可远程互联，实现数字化智能车间，进入数字化生产时代。
TechNameTc: 單螺杆高效過濾造粒裝備
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 在一台擠出機上實現雙重過濾系統，針對雜質含量比較高的回收料，具有完美的過濾效果，例如可以使最終LDPE成品顆粒達到可吹膜級別甚至更高級別的應用。這一台擠出機上，第一道艾斯瑞特自主研發的自清潔篩檢程式，免除繁瑣的人工換網，自動清潔排渣；第二道超大面積雙柱式換網器，延長換網時間，並且可以更換不同精度的過濾網來實現不同的應用要求。這兩道過濾可充分發揮排氣段效率，製品會有明顯的改善。作業系統可遠端互聯，實現數位化智慧車間，進入數位化生產時代。
TechNameEn: High Efficiency Filtration integrated Single Screw Recycling Pelletizing System
TechnologyDescriptionEn: A dual filtering system is implemented on an extruder, which has perfect filtering effects for recycled materials with relatively high impurity content. For example, the final LDPE pellets can reach the application of blown film level or higher. On this extruder, the first self-developed self-cleaning filter developed by Aceretech eliminates the tedious manual screen change and automatically cleaning and slagging; the second super-large area double-column screen changer extends the screen change time and reduce the changing frequency, also can be replaced with different precision filters to achieve different application requirements. These two filters can give full play to the efficiency of the exhaust section, and the plastic pellets will be significantly improved. The operating system can be remotely interconnected to realize the digital intelligent workshop and enter the digital production era.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: XB-3063单轴撕碎机的料仓整体循环运动，喂料无限制，撕碎效率高，不卡料；主轴特殊定制大旋转直径，保障撕碎接触面，提高产能；电控系统为PLC自主编程，配备启动、停止、正转、反转和过载自动保护等功能。撕碎机主要用于PE,PP,BOPP,PET薄膜，编织袋；PET化纤；工业废布以及生活垃圾等。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: XB-3063單軸撕碎機的料倉整體循環運動，餵料無限制，撕碎效率高，不卡料；主軸特殊定制大旋轉直徑，保障撕碎接觸面，提高產能；電控系統為PLC自主程式設計，配備啟動、停止、正轉、反轉和超載自動保護等功能。撕碎機主要用於PE,PP,BOPP,PET薄膜，編織袋；PET化纖；工業廢布以及生活垃圾等。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: XB-3063 single-shaft shredder consists of a motor, a reducer with rigid gears, a rotary shaft, imported rotary knife, fixed knife, frame, working platform, hydraulic ram and an independent electrical control cabinet. Fixed knives are installed on the frame behind the solid rotary shaft where the moving knives are bolted. Moving knives are specially designed into four-angel shape, when blunt customers could change the angel for recycling using. Moving knives are installed by screws, which is convenient for future maintenance. A hydraulic cylinder drove by hydraulic ram continually pushes the material chamber moving back and forward to get the material multi-angel shredding. Two travel switches are fitted near the side jampans to control the movement. A screen mesh is needed sometimes to ensure materials shredded even further. Single-shaft shredder is controlled by an independent electrical cabinet equipped with PLC system. The machine features start, stop, reverse functions. Also it is fitted with automatic overload return mechanism to prevent damage to working parts.

TechnologyDescriptionEn: By using the design of spiral channel distributor and CAE finite element simulation analysis, the spiral layered structure of pipe and the uniformity of thickness is ensured.Simple mould structure, easy to assemble, disassemble and maintain.Low die back pressure, very low energy consumption.Reasonable flow channel volume and smaller mould body, reduced melt residence time, faster color change time, rapid mould temperature rise and less heat preservation energy consumption.It is equipped with the internal cooling function, the production cooling length is reduced, and the same cooling length can obtain higher output.Mould design adapts to large specification range, stackable die and core die design, reduces investment, and changes specification faster.

TechNameSc: 精密医疗导管挤出生产线

TechnologyDescriptionEn: Baodie a professional manufacturer specializing in high speed single/multi-layer medical tube/pipe (including Perfusion tube, Kidney dialysate tube, Central venous catheter, Contrast tube, Multi-cavity tube, etc.) extrusion line.As a result of many years of research and development, the third generation “SXG” Series tube extrusion line features high efficiency and low consumption rate, stable extrusion quality, high degree of automatic control system and humanization control setting. Our equipment is widely used by well-know medical tube/pipe manufacturers.

CompanyNameSc: 广州鑫思创科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州鑫思創科技有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.针对食品医药产品上加工的卫生级别要求上，对设备实行全封闭式设计，减少外界物质与物料接触的机会，防止污染； 2.密封设计大大减少外界对秤体的干扰，提高精度，动态精度可达0.3% 3.适用于颗粒料、回收料、粉料、纤维。得益于采用模块化的设计，适用于各种不同计量混合要求。 流量都可以进行持续的监控、调节。持续的高精度计量，保证了产品的稳定性，这对于连续生产工艺是至关重要的。 4.自动校正功能：无须手动取样称量或校正。 5.模块化设计：整套失重喂料系统由多个独立的模块单元拼合组成。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.針對食品醫藥產品上加工的衛生級別要求上，對設備實行全封閉式設計，減少外界物質與物料接觸的機會，防止污染； 2.密封設計大大減少外界對秤體的干擾，提高精度，動態精度可達0.3% 3.適用於顆粒料、回收料、粉料、纖維。得益於採用模組化的設計，適用於各種不同計量混合要求。 流量都可以進行持續的監控、調節。持續的高精度計量，保證了產品的穩定性，這對於連續生產工藝是至關重要的。 4.自動校正功能：無須手動取樣稱量或校正。 5.模組化設計：整套失重餵料系統由多個獨立的模組單元拼合組成。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. According to the requirements of the sanitary level of food and medical products, implement a fully enclosed design for the equipment to reduce the chance of external materials and materials contacting and prevent pollution 2. Sealed design greatly reduces external interference to the feeder, improves accuracy, and dynamic accuracy can reach 0.3% 3. It is suitable for granular materials, recycled materials, powder materials and fibers. Thanks to the modular design, it is suitable for a variety of different metering requirements. The flow can be continuously monitored and adjusted. Continuous high-precision metering guarantees product stability, which is essential for continuous production processes. 4. Automatic calibration function: no manual sampling, weighing or calibration is required. 5. Modular design: The entire feeding system is composed of multiple independent module units.

CompanyNameSc: 广州鑫思创科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州鑫思創科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 微型双螺杆失重式计量秤
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 结合多年的技术喂料经验，鑫思创设计多种符合不同物料属性的失重式计量秤，此款微型失重式计量秤设计特点在于采用双AC马达独立驱动技术， 独立驱动更容易保证运行稳定度 和维护。整个结构为不锈钢结 构。防腐蚀耐高温。喂料部分采 用半圆球状，使物料更不易架 桥。变比范围1:10，模拟量传感器，内置 WAVESAVER数字滤波芯片技 术。具有eCAL电子校正专利(无 需砝码)。分辨率可达 1/1,000,000。数据刷新率为100 个每秒。连续喂料过程中保证精度可达+- 0.3~0.5%范围内。
TechNameTc: 微型雙螺杆失重式計量秤
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 結合多年的技術餵料經驗，鑫思創設計多種符合不同物料屬性的失重式計量秤，此款微型失重式計量秤設計特點在於採用雙AC馬達獨立驅動技術， 獨立驅動更容易保證運行穩定度 和維護。整個結構為不銹鋼結 構。防腐蝕耐高溫。餵料部分采 用半圓球狀，使物料更不易架 橋。變比範圍1:10，類比量感測器，內置 WAVESAVER數位濾波晶片技 術。具有eCAL電子校正專利(無 需砝碼)。解析度可達 1/1,000,000。資料刷新率為100 個每秒。連續餵料過程中保證精度可達+- 0.3~0.5%範圍內。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: With more than two decades feeding experience, Mastertech designed many types of feeders that fits different materials, This micro loss-in-weight feeder is designed with dual AC motor independent drive technology. Independent drive makes it easier to ensure stability And maintenance. The entire structure is a stainless steel structure. Corrosion resistant and high temperature resistant. The feeding part adopts a semi-spherical shape, which makes the material more difficult to bridge. Variable ratio range 1:10, analog sensor, built-in WAVESAVER digital filter chip technology. Patented eCAL electronic calibration (no weight required). The resolution can reach 1 / 1,000,000. The data refresh rate is 100 per second. During the continuous feeding process, the accuracy can be guaranteed within the range of +-0.3 ~ 0.5%.

TechNameSc: 连续碳纤维（玻璃、芳纶纤维）增强热塑性单向带生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 连续碳纤维（玻璃纤维、芳纶纤维等）增强热塑性预浸渍单向带，采用融熔浸渍工艺通过加热，使热塑性树脂基材熔融在纤维表面，通过辊筒热压加工、冷却后成片材。该系列产品具有高强度、高模量、高抗冲、耐疲劳、热稳定性好、耐腐蚀、低翘曲及环保可回收等优越性能。广泛应用于航空航天、集装箱、冷藏车箱、汽车轻量化的结构件、高压石油复合管道等。

TechNameSc: 高温蒸煮型无溶剂软包装复合聚氨酯胶黏剂
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 高适应性：适用于各种软包装材质复合。高产能：高温熟成特性，提升生产效率、降低生产成本。独特性：通过美国FDA食品级安全法规认证，市面上唯一可耐受135℃之高温蒸煮而不脱层之食品软包装复合胶黏剂。无毒环保：无溶剂，100%固成份，制程环保。质量优异：高初黏度、高透明度、柔软性佳、阻隔气味、耐热耐老化，对薄膜湿润性佳。
TechNameTc: 高溫蒸煮型無溶劑軟包裝複合聚氨酯膠黏劑
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 高適應性：適用於各種軟包裝材質複合。高產能：高溫熟成特性，提升生產效率、降低生產成本。獨特性：通過美國FDA食品級安全法規認證，市面上唯一可耐受135℃之高溫蒸煮而不脫層之食品軟包裝複合膠黏劑。無毒環保：無溶劑，100%固成份，製程環保。品質優異：高初黏度、高透明度、柔軟性佳、阻隔氣味、耐熱耐老化，對薄膜濕潤性佳。
TechNameEn: Solvent-Free Polyurethane Adhesive for Flexible Packaging Lamination
TechnologyDescriptionEn: High Adaptability: Designed for various types of flexible packaging materials laminating.High Capacity: High-temperature maturation improves production efficiency and reduces production costs.Uniqueness: Approved by the FDA food-grade safety regulations, the only adhesive used in composite structures of flexible food packaging withstand 135℃ retort condition without delamination.Non-toxic and Environmental Protection: Solvent-free, 100% solid content, environmentally friendly production process.High Quality: High initial bond, excellent transparency, softness, high gas and flavor barrier, heat resistance and anti-aging, good film wettability.

CompanyNameSc: 安徽雄亚塑胶科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 安徽雄亚塑胶科技有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 雄亚塑胶以强大的技术力量为后盾，以高端TPV市场为目标，研发出挤出低VOC（五苯三醛）低气味（过SGS2.5级）TPV，广泛应用于汽车密封条、汽车玻璃导槽、汽车防尘罩、汽车波纹管等。 雄亚塑胶研发出低气味、高弹性、高强度TPE，广泛应用于汽车内饰、建筑交通、体育用品、食品医疗等领域。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 雄亞塑膠以強大的技術力量為後盾，以高端TPV市場為目標，研發出擠出低VOC（五苯三醛）低氣味（過SGS2.5級）TPV，廣泛應用於汽車密封條、汽車玻璃導槽、汽車防塵罩、汽車波紋管等。 雄亞塑膠研發出低氣味、高彈性、高強度TPE，廣泛應用於汽車內飾、建築交通、體育用品、食品醫療等領域。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: With strong technological force support and aimed to the high level market, the extrusion low VOC and low odor TPVwhich is developed by Heroprene, is widely used in automotive sealing strip, automotive windowpane run channel, automotive dust cover, automotive bellows, etc. And also Heroprene developed the low odor, high elasticity and high tensile TPE materials, which is widely used in automotive interior, construction and transportation, sports goods and food and medicine, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 台橡股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 台橡股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 台橡开发中之医疗级SEBS产品包含VECTOR 8101与DP-6245。VECTOR 8101为中高苯乙烯含量与中高分子量的分子结构，通过细胞毒性测试且生产符合GMP标准，适用一般医疗用品的塑料改性。DP-6245为高乙烯基SEBS，为中分子量与低苯乙烯含量的分子结构，与聚丙烯类的聚烯烃有高兼容性，具高透明与高柔软特性，适用医疗薄膜的塑料改性。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 台橡開發中之醫療級SEBS產品包含VECTOR 8101與DP-6245。VECTOR 8101為中高苯乙烯含量與中高分子量的分子結構，通過細胞毒性測試且生產符合GMP標準，適用一般醫療用品的塑料改性。DP-6245為高乙烯基SEBS，為中分子量與低苯乙烯含量的分子結構，與聚丙烯類的聚烯烴有高相容性，具高透明與高柔軟特性，適用醫療薄膜的塑料改性。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: TSRC announces the development of medical SEBS polymers, including VECTOR 8101 and DP-6245. 8101 is a SEBS with medium-to-high styrene content and medium-to-high MW SEBS. It passed the test for cytotoxicity and comply with GMP production. 8101 is suitable for general plastic modification of articles for medical application. DP-6245 is a high vinyl SEBS with medium MW and with low styrene content. It has excellent miscibility with polyolefins (polypropylene especially), and can make highly transparent and much softer articles including film for medical applications.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 苏州润佳开发的不含滑石粉填充的聚丙烯树脂，具有较好的刚性和韧性，较低的材料收缩比，配合微发泡注塑工艺，在满足塑件产品技术要求的同时，具有良好的外观，适用于汽车门内饰板、尾门饰板等表观要求高的产品，相比于传统的注塑产品，能够实现40%的减重幅度。 产品特点： 1、减重：可实现40%的减重。 2、大幅减轻塑件缩壁。 3、良好的外观。 4、材料耐划伤效果优良。 5、制件成型周期缩短10%-30%。

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 蘇州潤佳開發的不含滑石粉填充的聚丙烯樹脂，具有較好的剛性和韌性，較低的材料收縮比，配合微發泡注塑工藝，在滿足塑件產品技術要求的同時，具有良好的外觀，適用於汽車門內飾板、尾門飾板等表觀要求高的產品，相比于傳統的注塑產品，能夠實現40%的減重幅度。 產品特點： 1、減重：可實現40%的減重。 2、大幅減輕塑件縮壁。 3、良好的外觀。 4、材料耐劃傷效果優良。 5、製件成型週期縮短10%-30%。

It has good appearance and good mechanic properties when use micro-foaming process. It can be used in door trim, rear trim. The weight reduction can be 30%.  Product features 1.Light weight: 30%. 2.Less sink. 3.Good appearance. 4.Good scratch-resistance property 5.Shorten injection molding cycle time about 10-30%.

CompanyNameSc: 台湾聚合化学品股份有限公司?
CompanyNameTc: 台湾聚合化学品股份有限公司?
TechnologyDescriptionSc: ViviOn? (CBC) 具有高洁净度、稳定的热氧化性、耐化性和能使用电子束及伽码射线灭菌的优势，使ViviOn?成为安全可靠的医疗材料，其高UV穿透率、低自体荧光值，可降低荧光讯号的干扰，提高分析准确性，适用于预充填针筒、小药瓶、比色皿、微孔盘、微流控芯片等生医检测耗材。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: ViviOn? (CBC) 具有高潔淨度、穩定的熱氧化性、耐化性和能使用電子束及伽碼射線滅菌的優勢，使ViviOn?成為安全可靠的醫療材料，其高UV穿透率、低自體螢光值，可降低螢光訊號的幹擾，提高分析準確性，適用於預充填針筒、小藥瓶、比色皿、微孔盤、微流控晶片等生醫檢測耗材。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: ViviOn?(CBC) has extreme purity, good thermal stability, superb chemical resistance, gamma sterilization applicable which makes ViviOn? a safe, reliable and durable material for medical applications. Furthermore, ViviOn?’s high UV transmittance and low auto-fluorescence properties could increase the accuracy and reliability of the diagnostic analysis. Applications include: prefilled syringe, vial, cuvette, microplate, mircrofluidic chip.

CompanyNameEn: LUBRIZOL SPECIALTY CHEMICALS MANUFACTURING (SHANGHAI) CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 路博润特种化工制造(上海)有限公司

TechNameSc: 创新的热塑性聚氨酯(TPU)聚合物解决方案
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 路博润创新的热塑性聚氨酯解决方案可被应用于各种行业：用于汽车、建筑和消费品的表面保护膜应用；高耐久性，高柔韧和耐磨性，以及阻燃性的电动汽车充电线应用；一体化鞋材解决方案，实现高性能同时简化加工流程；各类消费电子设备及附件应用，实现产品的美观、保护性及设计自由；3D打印解决方案实现个性化和复杂的设计。
TechNameTc: 创新的热塑性聚氨酯(TPU)聚合物解决方案
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 路博潤創新的熱塑性聚氨酯解決方案可被應用於各種行業：用於汽車、建築和消費品的表面保護膜應用；高耐久性，高柔韌和耐磨性，以及阻燃性的電動汽車充電線應用；一體化鞋材解決方案，實現高性能同時簡化加工流程；各類消費電子設備及附件應用，實現產品的美觀、保護性及設計自由；3D列印解決方案實現個性化和複雜的設計。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Lubrizol will showcase the most innovative polymer solutions with its ESTANE Thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) portfolios in diverse applications: - Surface protection film applications in automotive/transportation, flooring, outdoor equipment, renewable energy, architectural, consumer applications. - Automotive interiors as synthetic leather seats and IP skin with good durability, low VOC, excellent abrasion resistance, and a comfortable feel. - Electric vehicle charging cables with durability, high flexibility and abrasion resistance, and flame-retardant capability. - Extensive footwear application capabilities that can form almost every component of the shoe, with meeting high-performance demands meanwhile simplifying production process. - Electronics accessories and components, flexible electronics, and wearables with superior aesthetic, protection and design flexibility. - Latest TPU 3D printing solutions which bring new freedom even in custom and complex final parts.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 新一代Topilene HB242P是一种先进的高模量PP抗冲共聚物。采用HYOSUNG创新的PP聚合技术生产，并符合2018年7月发布的新国家标准“GB/T 35451.1-2017 埋地排水排污用聚丙烯(PP)结构壁管道系统-第1部分: 聚丙烯双壁波纹管材”。新一代Topilene HB242P具有出色的弯曲模量，抗拉强度，并提供更加完善的加工特性。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 新一代Topilene HB242P是一種先進的高模量PP抗沖共聚物。採用HYOSUNG創新的PP聚合技術生產，並符合2018年7月發佈的新國家標準“GB/T 35451.1-2017 埋地排水排汙用聚丙烯(PP)結構壁管道系統-第1部分: 聚丙烯雙壁波紋管材”。新一代Topilene HB242P具有出色的彎曲模量，抗拉強度，並提供更加完善的加工特性。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The next-generation Topilene HB242P is an advanced High Modulus PP Impact Copolymer produced with HYOSUNG's innovative PP polymerization technology that meets the new GB/T standards for PP structure-wall piping systems published in July 2018 "GB / T 35451.1-2017 Polypropylene (PP) structure-wall piping system for underground drainage and sewerage-Part 1: Polypropylene double wall corrugated pipes." The next-generation Topilene HB242P has excellent flexural modulus, tensile strength and provides enhanced processing characteristics.

TechnologyDescriptionEn: Low gloss ASA compares to ABS, ASA can improve ABS's defects of easily oxidated by ultraviolet ray and heat, promote outdoor usability. CompanyNameSc: 浙江松华新材股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江松華新材股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 聚四氟乙烯板材特点：耐高低温（-180℃~+260℃）、耐腐蚀（强酸、强碱、王水等）、耐气候、高绝缘、高润滑、无毒害等优良特性。 聚四氟乙烯板材用途：在各种腐蚀性介质中工作的密封衬垫润滑材料、在各种频率下的电绝缘零件耐腐耐磨材料、用作轴承、阀门、化工管道、衬里等在电器、化工、航空、机械等领域、用作支撑滑块等。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 聚四氟乙烯板材特點：耐高低溫（-180℃~+260℃）、耐腐蝕（強酸、強鹼、王水等）、耐氣候、高絕緣、高潤滑、無毒害等優良特性。 聚四氟乙烯板材用途：在各種腐蝕性介質中工作的密封襯墊潤滑材料、在各種頻率下的電絕緣零件耐腐耐磨材料、用作軸承、閥門、化工管道、襯裡等在電器、化工、航空、機械等領域、用作支撐滑塊等。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: PTFE SHEET CHaracteristics:High and low temperature resistance(-180℃~+260℃),Corrosion resistance(strong acid,strong alkali and aqua regia,etc.),Weaeher resistance,High insulation,High lubrication,Non adhesion,Non toxic etc. PTFE SHEET Application:Widely used as sealing gasket and lubricating materials in corrosive media,Electrical insulation parts,corrosion resistant materials under various frequencies,Bearings,valves,chemical piping,lining in the electrical,chemical,aerospace,machinery fields,Supporting silder,etc.

CompanyNameSc: 涌奇材料技术（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 湧奇材料技術（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: FR6067是苯基有机硅树脂材质，与聚碳酸酯（PC）有良好的相容性，并由于折射率相近，添加量下很少影响PC的透明性，与磺酸盐以及苯基膦共用可以达到1毫米UL94-V0等级阻燃的同时保持PC的透明性以及机械性能。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: FR6067是苯基有機硅樹脂材質，與聚碳酸酯（PC）有良好的相容性，並由於折射率相近，添加量下很少影響PC的透明性，與磺酸鹽以及苯基膦共用可以達到1毫米UL94-V0等級阻燃的同時保持PC的透明性以及機械性能。
TechNameEn: PC Transparent Halogen-Free Flame Retardant FR6067
TechnologyDescriptionEn: FR6067 is phenyl silicone resin based polymer, which has good compatibility with polycarbonate (PC). Due to its similar refractive index, the addition of FR6067 has little effect on the transparency of PC. when FR6067 is used with sulfonate and phenyl phosphine, it can achieve 1 mm UL94-V0 flame retardant property and maintain the mechanical properties of PC.

CompanyNameSc: 涌奇材料技术（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 涌奇材料技术（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 本产品主要成分是有机硅弹性体，通过降低摩擦系数的方式提高聚合物的耐磨性能，在1%左右微小的添加量下，使PVC、TPU等软质聚合物的表面触感更出色的同时显著提升耐磨性能。同时制品表面不油腻，不发亮。对比PTFE类型产品手感更出色，与聚合物的相容性更好。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 本產品主要成分是有機硅彈性體，通過降低摩擦係數的方式提高聚合物的耐磨性能，在1%左右微小的添加量下，使PVC、TPU等軟質聚合物的表面觸感更出色的同時顯著提升耐磨性能。同時製品表面不油膩，不發亮。對比PTFE類型產品手感更出色，與聚合物的相容性更好。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The main component of this product is silicone elastomer, which can improve the wear resistance of the polymer by reducing the friction coefficient. With a small addition of about 1%, the surface touch of soft polymers such as PVC and TPU is better and the wear resistance is significantly improved. At the same time, the surface of the product is not greasy and shiny. Compared with the PTFE type products, both the hand feel and the compatibility with the polymer is better.

CompanyNameSc: MEK 有限公司
CompanyNameTc: MEK 有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: WEB 上必备的设备, 在线测厚仪 MEK 在线测厚仪，可以使(WEB)的产品达到更优厚度的测量设备在生产过程中，实时间对产品进行测量分析，并对厚度进行控制，从而达到品质向上，工艺最优化，降低成本等作用. 在二次电池及涂布厚度，膈膜base及涂布厚度生产工艺上，精密地在线测量，为产品达到最优化，提供了优质的服务。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: WEB 上必備的設備, 線上測厚儀 MEK 線上測厚儀，可以使(WEB)的產品達到更優厚度的測量設備在生產過程中，即時間對產品進行測量分析，並對厚度進行控制，從而達到品質向上，工藝最優化，降低成本等作用. 在二次電池及塗布厚度，膈膜base及塗布厚度生產工藝上，精密地線上測量，為產品達到最優化，提供了優質的服務。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: MEK online gauging system analyzes thickness of WEB in production and automatically controls thickness and evenness with scanned data. That improves product quality and optimizes the production process.Troubles due to eddy-current sensor, thermal deformation were cleared, Troubles from vibration is solved by the High speed synchronized measurement. Precise measurement from enhanced resolution.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江乐能科技股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江樂能科技股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 单流道旋转式中心排渣不换网过滤器
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 单流道旋转式中心排渣不换网过滤器，其核心设计是直进直出，螺杆旋转直接中心排渣无波动，对各种产品的挤出机都可以配套使用，螺纹式盖板密封，简单好用又拆装方便，是经对塑料拉丝、打包带、滴灌带、造粒拉条的伟大发明。
TechNameTc: 單流道旋轉式中心排渣不換網篩檢程式
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 單流道旋轉式中心排渣不換網篩檢程式，其核心設計是直進直出，螺杆旋轉直接中心排渣無波動，對各種產品的擠出機都可以配套使用，螺紋式蓋板密封，簡單好用又拆裝方便，是經對塑料拉絲、打包帶、滴灌帶、造粒拉條的偉大發明。
TechNameEn: The Single-Flow Rotary Center Slag Scer without Mesh
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The single-flow rotary center slag scer without mesh.The core design is polymer melaight flow into and out in same line. The screw rotates directly to the center,so there is no  fluctuationg. It can be used for extruder of various products. The ded cover is sealed,which is easy to use, and easy to disassemble.that is  great invention for packing belts, dropper belts,and granulation strips.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江宏华机械塑胶有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江宏華機械塑膠有限公司
TechNameSc: 多功能全自动模内切塑料气压热成型机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: HSC-720型多功能热成型机是集机、电、气一体化设计，采用微电脑可编程控制器（PLC）控制，人机界面操作，链条式传动送片，隧道式分段漫辐射加热，凸轮式驱动上下模成型，模内激光刀剪，即送片、加热、拉伸、成型、打孔、切边、堆垛一次性完成的全自动高效塑料片材成型设备
TechNameTc: 多功能全自動模內切塑料氣壓熱成型機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: HSC-720型多功能熱成型機是集機、電、氣一體化設計，採用微電腦可程式設計控制器（PLC）控制，人機界面操作，鏈條式傳動送片，隧道式分段漫輻射加熱，凸輪式驅動上下模成型，模內鐳射刀剪，即送片、加熱、拉伸、成型、打孔、切邊、堆垛一次性完成的全自動高效塑料片材成型設備
TechnologyDescriptionEn: HSC-720 multi-function thermoforming machine is designed with most advanced Pressure &vacuum forming technology, a combination of mechanical, electrical and pneumatic components, and the whole system was controlled by PLC. The machine has man-interface operation, feed sheet by chain, mold running by cam, press by servo-motor, Thermoforming and vacuum forming working together. It combines the material-feeding, heating, forming, cutting and stacking into one process.

CompanyNameEn: GUANGZHOU SCANTECH ELECTRONIC MEASURING EQUIPMENT CO.LTD
CompanyNameSc: 广州思肯德电子测量设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州思肯德電子測量設備有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: XT11 Series：不仅可测量轻质材料，如塑料薄膜，片材等克重及厚度；更能实现对填充料的测量。如在材料中添加了碳酸钙，二氧化钛，硫酸钡，思肯德XT11系列探头可以发挥有效的作用。在添加了该类填充料后，不但可以测量材料整体克重及厚度，也可对填充料的克重，以及在该材料中所占的比重进行针对性测量。就目前市场情况来看，该功能有较好发展前景。 该系列探头多用于：复合膜生产线，双向拉伸膜生产线，以及电池隔膜或者陶瓷涂布生产线。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: XT11 Series：不僅可測量輕質材料，如塑料薄膜，片材等克重及厚度；更能實現對填充料的測量。如在材料中添加了碳酸鈣，二氧化鈦，硫酸鋇，思肯德XT11系列探頭可以發揮有效的作用。在添加了該類填充料後，不但可以測量材料整體克重及厚度，也可對填充料的克重，以及在該材料中所占的比重進行針對性測量。就目前市場情況來看，該功能有較好發展前景。 該系列探頭多用於：複合膜生產線，雙向拉伸膜生產線，以及電池隔膜或者陶瓷塗布生產線。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Sensor for not only basis weight and thickness measurement of light materials, such as plastic films and plastic sheet, but also filler measurement. Specifically, XT11 Series is designed for materials with CaCO3, TiO2 and BaSO4 filler. By measuring basis weight and thickness of the material, as well as basis weight of the filler, it can detect the proportion of filler in the total material. This feature has great prospects in the current market.  The series is suitable for converting lines, biax film lines, such as battery separator film lines or ceramic coating lines.

CompanyNameSc: 赛奥机械（广州）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 賽奧機械（廣州）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 应用：芳纶，PBO纤维，超高分子量聚乙烯纤维，聚酰亚胺纤维，高性能陶瓷纤维 该卷绕机针对高性能纤维的收卷而设计，结构新颖，能最大程度减小纤维在卷绕过程中的摩擦，避免损伤纤维；机器更可靠、维护保养更少。 1. 高品质的纱锭 2. 直接进丝口无需通过压辊转向避免伤丝 3. 压辊压力和纱线张力可调可控（机械） 4. 电子输入存贮所有卷绕参数，快速有效切换纱线品种 5. 报警系统（断纱、纱锭直径） 6. 最少维护保养费用
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 應用：芳綸，PBO纖維，超高分子量聚乙烯纖維，聚醯亞胺纖維，高性能陶瓷纖維 該捲繞機針對高性能纖維的收卷而設計，結構新穎，能最大程度減小纖維在捲繞過程中的摩擦，避免損傷纖維；機器更可靠、維護保養更少。 1. 高品質的紗錠 2. 直接進絲口無需通過壓輥轉向避免傷絲 3. 壓輥壓力和紗線張力可調可控（機械） 4. 電子輸入存貯所有捲繞參數，快速有效切換紗線品種 5. 報警系統（斷紗、紗錠直徑） 6. 最少維護保養費用
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Applications: Aramid fiber, PBO fiber, UHMWPE fiber, PI fiber, High performance ceramic fiber This winder is designed for winding high-performance fibers, with novel structure which can minimize the friction of fiber during the winding process to avoid fiber damage. The machine is more reliable and needs less maintenance. 1.Excellent package quality 2.Direct yarn feed entrance, not through bail roller to avoid yarn damage 3.Adjustable and controlled to bail roller and yarn tension(mechanical 4.Quick and efficient product changes by HMI input of all winding parameters 5.Alarm management (yarn break, package diameter 6.Minimum maintenance costs

CompanyNameSc: 青岛威尔塑料机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 青島威爾塑料機械有限公司
TechNameSc: SHJ-75/44平行双螺杆PET片材生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 新型平行双螺杆PET片材挤出生产线，具备以下优势： -采用新型加热装置，较传统加热方式节能10%； -主机选用平行双螺杆设计，生产效率大大提高； -原料处理不需要结晶干燥系统，而采用高效节能的罗茨真空干燥装置； -原料可采用100%全回收PET瓶片料 -三辊装置采用油气混合压力装置，三辊运行稳定，生产环境更加清洁 -收卷系统采用三工位设计，节省人工，提高效率
TechNameTc: SHJ-75/44平行雙螺杆PET片材生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 新型平行雙螺杆PET片材擠出生產線，具備以下優勢： -採用新型加熱裝置，較傳統加熱方式節能10%； -主機選用平行雙螺杆設計，生產效率大大提高； -原料處理不需要結晶乾燥系統，而採用高效節能的羅茨真空乾燥裝置； -原料可採用100%全回收PET瓶片料 -三輥裝置採用油氣混合壓力裝置，三輥運行穩定，生產環境更加清潔 -收卷系統採用三工位元設計，節省人工，提高效率
TechNameEn: SHJ-75/44-75/44 Parallel Twin Screws PET Sheet Production Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Qingdao Weier Plastic Machinery Co., Ltd. Will show the new designed SHJ-75/44 Parallel Twin Screws PET Sheet Production Line, it has the below advantages: -New heating system could save more than 10% energy compared with the traditional technology -The main extruder is parallel twin screws extruder, the efficiency could be higher -Adapt energy-saving effective vacuum drying device, not the crystallizing and drying system -The raw material could be 100% recycled PET bottle flakes -Three-rollers calendar adapts combination of hydraulic and pneumatic system, three-rollers running stably and production environment could be cleaner -Winder is three working positions. The PET sheet could be used for plastic package, electric device package, vacuum forming cups and cans, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 张家港市沃尔特精密机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 張家港市沃爾特精密機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 新型节能高效多级除湿干燥系统
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 除湿干燥的新革命，新的多级除湿系统将干燥时间缩短了一半，并将装机功率降低了百分之40-60，该系统主要用于PET，PC，PA，TUP，PLA等，它具有很强的除湿性能，即使原料的水分含量超过15000PPM，干燥后也能迅速达到50PPM，使制品或造粒效果更好。 （发明专利号：CN109458833A）
TechNameTc: 新型節能高效多級除濕乾燥系統
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 除濕乾燥的新革命，新的多級除濕系統將乾燥時間縮短了一半，並將裝機功率降低了百分之40-60，該系統主要用於PET，PC，PA，TUP，PLA等，它具有很強的除濕性能，即使原料的水分含量超過15000PPM，乾燥後也能迅速達到50PPM，使製品或造粒效果更好。 （發明專利號：CN109458833A）
TechnologyDescriptionEn: A new revolution in dehumidification and drying. The new multi-stage dehumidification system cuts the drying time in half and reduces installed power by 40% -60%. This system is mainly used for PET, PC, PA, TUP, PLA, etc. It has strong dehumidification performance. Even if the moisture content of the raw material exceeds 15000PPM, it can quickly reach the moisture content of 50PPM after drying, making the product or granulation effect better. (Invention patent number: CN109458833A)

CompanyNameSc: 兰蒂奇工程塑料（苏州）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 蘭蒂奇工程塑料（蘇州）有限公司
TechNameSc: 不含DPPD耐热稳定和电中性尼龙材料及其应用
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 聚酰胺（尼龙）材料以其优异的机械强度和长期耐热性能被广泛使用汽车工业中，与传统的尼龙材料配方中的耐热稳定剂包括以含金属类盐(如:碘化铜/卤化铜,金属硬脂酸盐等)和芳香胺类(如:苯胺类物质等)相比，兰蒂奇新开发的新KB不含DPPD以及KN不含DPPD且电中性系列牌号产品，能够符合欧盟法规对DPPD管控的要求，同时能够避免由电化学腐蚀引起的塑料零件功能失效，确保其使用的安全性；这也成为越来越多的主机厂和Tier1客户关注的重点。
TechNameTc: 不含DPPD耐熱穩定和電中性尼龍材料及其應用
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 聚醯胺（尼龍）材料以其優異的機械強度和長期耐熱性能被廣泛使用汽車工業中，與傳統的尼龍材料配方中的耐熱穩定劑包括以含金屬類鹽(如:碘化銅/鹵化銅,金屬硬脂酸鹽等)和芳香胺類(如:苯胺類物質等)相比，蘭蒂奇新開發的新KB不含DPPD以及KN不含DPPD且電中性系列牌號產品，能夠符合歐盟法規對DPPD管控的要求，同時能夠避免由電化學腐蝕引起的塑料零件功能失效，確保其使用的安全性；這也成為越來越多的主機廠和Tier1客戶關注的重點。
TechNameEn: Heat Stabilized, DPPD Free and Electrical Neutrality Nylon Material and Application
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Due to the excellent mechanical strength and long term heat stabilized polyamide(Nylon) has been widely used in automotive industry, compare to the heat stabilized agent of the traditional nylon formulation which mainly contain metal salt and aromatic amine, Radici developed new KB version DPPD free and KN DPPD free and electrical neutrality which can conform to EU regulation and avoid plastic function failure caused by electrochemical corrosion, guarantee the safety for using.

CompanyNameSc: 昆山卡帝德塑料制品有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 昆山卡帝德塑料製品有限公司
TechNameSc: 应用于挤出旅行箱包的新型环保高性能改性塑料
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 该材料与传统应用的ABS、PC箱包材料比，具有更低的成本，更好的柔韧度、强度、耐应力开裂性能，材料完全由回收材料生产，更具环保概念。
TechNameTc: 應用于擠出旅行箱包的新型環保高性能改性塑料

CompanyNameSc: 兰蒂奇工程塑料（苏州）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 蘭蒂奇工程塑料（蘇州）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 兰蒂奇集团发布多项最新的专用解决方案 - Radilon NeXTreme。Radilon NeXTreme是一种适用于高温应用领域的理想材料。面向汽车领域的Radilon NeXTreme系列由两个型号的新产品组成：35%玻璃纤维填料(RV350HHR 3800 BK)增强型和50%玻璃填料(RV500HHR 3800 BK)增强型。  另外一种型号 - Radilon NeXTreme HSW 100 NT，这一产品可用于单根高性能纤维的挤出制造，需要更佳高温表现的挤出流程和实物应用。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 蘭蒂奇集團發佈多項最新的專用解決方案 - Radilon NeXTreme。Radilon NeXTreme是一種適用于高溫應用領域的理想材料。面向汽車領域的Radilon NeXTreme系列由兩個型號的新產品組成：35%玻璃纖維填料(RV350HHR 3800 BK)增強型和50%玻璃填料(RV500HHR 3800 BK)增強型。  另外一種型號 - Radilon NeXTreme HSW 100 NT，這一產品可用于單根高性能纖維的擠出製造，需要更佳高溫表現的擠出流程和實物應用。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Radilon NeXTreme was initially developed for automotive applications, for which it is well suited as it features exceptional heat ageing resistance in air at 230C, said Erico Spini, global marketing manager of RadiciGroup High Performance Polymers. After that, we developed a grade on the same polymer base for extrusion of technical filaments for industrial applications under very severe use conditions.Two grades of Radilon NeXTreme are offered for the automotive sector: 35% glass-fibre reinforced (RV350HHR 3800 BK) and 50% glass-fibre filled (RV500HHR 3800 BK). Typical applications for these materials are air suction system components requiring considerable heat resistance.Our third grade, Radilon NeXTreme HSW 100 NT, for the extrusion of technical onofilament, Mr. Spini added, has already been successfully tested both in the extrusion process and in specific applications where high heat resistance is required (professional brushes for industrial use, brushes for metal clean.

TechNameEn: Yunding DaofM Biobased Natural Fiber Reinforced Composites
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Yunding DaoFM NATURAL FIBER COMPOSITES is one such proficient material which replaces the synthetic materials and its related products for the less weight and energy conservation applications. The application of natural fiber reinforced polymer composites and biobased resins for replacing existing synthetic polymer or glass fiber reinforced materials in huge.  Natural Fiber Composites solutions from YunDing address markets such as automobile, building material, furniture, daily chemicals and household appliance. Weve already created the first biomaterials Yunding Natural Fiber Composite Flooring Series, and are making important steps forward with our lightweight solution for automobile.  In parallel to generating such Natural Fibers, dispersion is a key challenge. YUNDING DaoFM unique manufacturing process allows us to effectively disperse the NATURAL FIBERS while maintaining proper morphology and properties. This is due to a combination of mixing technology and chemical process aids.

CompanyNameEn: NANO AND ADVANCED MATERIALS INSTITUTE LIMITED

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 纳米的植入式斥菌塑料通过阻止细菌的吸附来抑制细菌在塑料表面生长。微仓贴片是一种微创并且无痛感的药物传输系统。它拥有独特的针尖载药结构，可高效运输药物进入皮肤。透明纳米TBF膜是一种无孔结构，具有高透水汽性并能阻挡液态水和有害粒子细菌穿透。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 納米的植入式斥菌塑料通過阻止細菌的吸附來抑制細菌在塑料表面生長。微倉貼片是一種微創並且無痛感的藥物傳輸系統。它擁有獨特的針尖載藥結構，可高效運輸藥物進入皮膚。透明納米TBF膜是一種無孔結構，具有高透水汽性並能阻擋液態水和有害粒子細菌穿透。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: NAMI’s built-in germ-repellent plastics stop bacterial attachment and prevent bacterial growth on the plastic surfaces. Microdepot patch (MD) is a minimally invasive and painless drug delivery system, delivering drugs into the skin efficiently with high insertion rate.NAMI’s TBF is a transparent and breathable film without pores, which has water vapor transmission capability, meanwhile preventing liquid water, harmful particles and bacteria from passing through.

CompanyNameSc: 东曹株式会社
CompanyNameTc: 東曹株式會社
TechNameSc: 超高韧性聚苯硫醚塑胶粒子
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 东曹株式会社 开发了高性能特种工程塑胶PPS（注册商标SUSTEEL），具有优异的机械强度，同时和模具的兼容性良好。  特性如下： 1）高熔接强度 2）非常优异的耐冷热循环冲击。 3）低废气排放、低模具污染。  通过定制PPS树脂成分、调整配料以及工艺改良，东曹PPS的机械强度得以大幅提升；在耐冷热循环冲击性能这个指标上，东曹开发的PPS的强度是传统牌号的两倍。我们设想这样的特性有利于要求高性能耐冷热循环冲击的应用。特别有利于嵌入成型产品的注塑。同时我们有意控制并做到了更少的废气排放。
TechNameTc: 超高韌性聚苯硫醚塑膠粒子
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 東曹株式會社 開發了高性能特種工程塑膠PPS（注冊商標SUSTEEL），具有優異的機械強度，同時和模具的相容性良好。  特性如下： 1）高熔接強度 2）非常優異的耐冷熱迴圈衝擊。 3）低廢氣排放、低模具污染。  通過定制PPS樹脂成分、調整配料以及工藝改良，東曹PPS的機械強度得以大幅提升；在耐冷熱迴圈衝擊性能這個指標上，東曹開發的PPS的強度是傳統牌號的兩倍。我們設想這樣的特性有利於要求高性能耐冷熱迴圈衝擊的應用。特別有利於嵌入成型產品的注塑。同時我們有意控制並做到了更少的廢氣排放。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Tosoh has developed the high performance PPS (SUSTEEL) which shows outstanding strength and moldability.  Characteristics 1)High weld strength 2)Excellent thermal shock resistance 3)Low gas, mold staining  By optimizing PPS polymer, other compounding ingredients and compounding process, it has become possible to achieve improvement of above strength; one of our developed materials is twice better than conventional product in thermal shock resistance. This would be useful in the insert molding. On the other hand, we also accomplished decreasing gas and mold staining, which help customers reduce the frequency of mold maintenance and the trouble of voids or poor appearance.  We hope that our high performance PPS contributes to the development of automotive, water section, electric and electronic fields.

CompanyNameSc: 三菱工程塑料株式会社

TechNameSc: 血液透析器、输血套装，人工肺等
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 此类规格可用于血液透析器，输血管连接器等，抑制由蒸汽灭菌、EOG灭菌以及放射线照射所导致的变色，亦可对应γ线灭菌、电子线灭菌。该规格在保有聚碳酸酯所具有的强度高、透明度高的优点外，改善了因照射放射线而变黄的缺点，在医疗器具领域具有多年的临床经验。
TechNameTc: 血液透析器、输血套装，人工肺等

TechNameEn: Dialyze, Transfusion Set, Artificial Lung, etc.
TechnologyDescriptionEn: These specifications can be used in hemodialyzers, infusion connector, etc., to suppress the discoloration caused by steam sterilization, EOG sterilization and radiation irradiation, and can also support γ-ray sterilization and electronic wire sterilization. In addition to the advantages of high strength and high transparency of polycarbonate, this model improves the shortcomings of yellowing due to radiation and has many years of clinical experience in the field of medical devices.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 中广核俊尔的连续纤维增强热塑性复合材料具有密度小、强度高、与油漆的附着力强等特点，能够制造具有高亮表面的零件。客户可选择适用于零件应用要求的特定板材（包括不同的铺层层数与角度），通过烘箱预热后，进行模压成型，成型后的零件边缘进行激光，即可喷漆或者其他表面修饰。应用于对强度、表面要求较高的汽车引擎盖、翼子板等部件。
TechNameTc: 連續纖維增強熱塑複合材料製作高亮表面製件的解決方案
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 中廣核俊爾的連續纖維增強熱塑性複合材料具有密度小、強度高、與油漆的附著力強等特點，能夠製造具有高亮表面的零件。客戶可選擇適用于零件應用要求的特定板材（包括不同的鋪層層數與角度），通過烘箱預熱後，進行模壓成型，成型後的零件邊緣進行鐳射，即可噴漆或者其他表面修飾。應用於對強度、表面要求較高的汽車引擎蓋、翼子板等部件。
TechNameEn: The Solution of Organo Sheet(Cfrt) to High-Gloss Surface Parts
TechnologyDescriptionEn: CGN Juner's continuous fiber-reinforced thermoplastic composite has the characteristics of low density, high strength, and strong adhesion to paint, and can manufacture parts with high-gloss surfaces. Customers can choose specific plates (including different number of layers and angles) suitable for the application of parts. After preheating in the oven, they can be compression-molded, and the edges of the molded parts can be sprayed with paint or other surface modification. Used in automotive hoods, fenders and other components that require high strength and surface requirements.

CompanyNameSc: 宝理塑料
CompanyNameTc: 寶理塑料
TechNameSc: 薄型化小型化的电子元件和连接器市场的LCP材料
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 近年来IOT的使用和5G的实际运行，在汽车领域，家电OA领域对LCP的研讨和采用也日渐增多。在研讨和采用的过程中，使用LCP材料会出现气泡则成为问题的焦 。LAPEROS LCP开发等级(E463, E463i)，与原来的材料相比，已证实其具有显着的抑制气泡的作用，并且是可以提高生产率的材料。在LCP被大量采用于连接器那样的厚度有变化的部件中，阶梯式不稳定界面的形成决定了扩张流动的大小，这对材料的膨胀特性(膨胀现象) 有很大的影响。本公司基于该知识，开发出了能抑制因厚度突变而产生气泡的等级。
TechNameTc: 薄型化小型化的電子元件和連接器市場的LCP材料
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 近年來IOT的使用和5G的實際運行，在汽車領域，家電OA領域對LCP的研討和採用也日漸增多。在研討和採用的過程中，使用LCP材料會出現氣泡則成為問題的焦 。LAPEROS LCP開發等級(E463, E463i)，與原來的材料相比，已證實其具有顯著的抑制氣泡的作用，並且是可以提高生產率的材料。在LCP被大量採用於連接器那樣的厚度有變化的部件中，階梯式不穩定介面的形成決定了擴張流動的大小，這對材料的膨脹特性(膨脹現象) 有很大的影響。本公司基於該知識，開發出了能抑制因厚度突變而產生氣泡的等級。
TechNameEn: New Laperos? Liquid Crystal Polymer (LCP) Grades with Improved Blister Resistance
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Blistering is a common flaw for LCP which takes the form of bulges that appear on the surface of molded articles due to heat. The potential causes including decomposition gases that get entrapped during molding, and separation between the skin and core layers. LAPEROS? LCP grades, such as E436i, E473i, to accommodate the needs of ultra-high heat-resistant grades. It has also conducted studies on nozzle and sprue optimization with the aim of offering solutions to blistering. In addition to high flowability and dimensional accuracy, LCP exhibits high heat resistance and is widely used in connector applications in devices such as smartphones which are becoming more compact and trending toward SMT. The automotive, home electronics, and office automation have also increasingly implemented LCP in recent years.

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 本次設備運行速度達到600M/MIN,相容了較小成品與較大產品的生產需求，無需頻繁製作模具，提高了收縮膜標籤生產效率
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The running speed of the equipment reaches 600m / min, which is compatible with the production demand of small finished products and large products. It does not need to make mold frequently, which improves the production efficiency of shrink film label.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江佳华精化股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江佳華精化股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 佳华精化高性能聚酯改性有机硅，特别适用于PC/ABS、PMMA等基材，赋予材料优异长效的耐刮擦性能，改善日常使用中的刮擦、划痕现象，提升装配/接插便捷性。提高表面光滑性，消除表面缺陷，可使制品表面长久保持光亮质感，提高家电、汽车内饰、消费电子等产品的外观辨识度。 佳华精化高性能聚酯改性有机硅基于特殊的产品结构，与基材相容性好，不迁移、无析出，对喷涂、印刷、电镀等无影响，可以用于改善制品表面性能和机械性能，广泛应用于免喷涂高光材料。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 佳華精化高性能聚酯改性有機硅，特別適用於PC/ABS、PMMA等基材，賦予材料優異長效的耐刮擦性能，改善日常使用中的刮擦、劃痕現象，提升裝配/接插便捷性。提高表面光滑性，消除表面缺陷，可使製品表面長久保持光亮質感，提高家電、汽車內飾、消費電子等產品的外觀辨識度。 佳華精化高性能聚酯改性有機硅基於特殊的產品結構，與基材相容性好，不遷移、無析出，對噴塗、印刷、電鍍等無影響，可以用於改善製品表面性能和機械性能，廣泛應用于免噴塗高光材料。
TechNameEn: Anti-scratch Solution to PC/ABS and PMMA Materials
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Javachemhigh-performance polyester modified silicone is developed for polyesters such as PC/ABS and PMMA, which gives the material long-lasting scratch resistance, improves scratches in daily use, and enhances assembly and plug convenience. It eliminates surface defects and keeps the product glossy and smooth for a long time, delivering good appearance recognition to the products such as home appliances, automotive interiors, and consumer electronics. It has good compatibility with base materials due to the unique polymer structure. With characteristics of non-migration and non-blooming, it does not affect post-treatments such as spraying, printing and electroplating processes. It  improves the surface properties and mechanical performances, and is widely used in spray-free high gloss materials.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江佳华精化股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江佳華精化股份有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 佳华精化氟硅聚合物加工助剂具有极低的表面能，在塑料加工中能减少加工树脂分子间的内摩擦，同时它在加工树脂中的溶解度极低、和基体树脂不相容，在加工过程中从熔体中渗出到熔体表面，在加工设备金属表面形成一个隔离层，降低熔体与机体、模口金属表面的粘着力，减少熔体在运动过程中与器壁产生的摩擦，改善加工过程中熔体运动不均匀状态，从而对树脂加工性能、产品质量、能源消耗、生产效率、机械磨损都有较大程度的改善。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 佳華精化氟硅聚合物加工助劑具有極低的表面能，在塑料加工中能減少加工樹脂分子間的內摩擦，同時它在加工樹脂中的溶解度極低、和基體樹脂不相容，在加工過程中從熔體中滲出到熔體表面，在加工設備金屬表面形成一個隔離層，降低熔體與機體、模口金屬表面的粘著力，減少熔體在運動過程中與器壁產生的摩擦，改善加工過程中熔體運動不均勻狀態，從而對樹脂加工性能、產品品質、能源消耗、生產效率、機械磨損都有較大程度的改善。
TechNameEn: The Processing Aid of Fluorosilicone Polymer
TechnologyDescriptionEn: With extremely low surface energy, Javachem SF reduces the internal friction between resin molecules, and because of the extremely low solubility in the processed resin and the incompatibility with the base polymer, it will exudate to the melt surface during processing and form an isolation layer on the metal surface of the processing equipment, reduce the adhesive force between melt, engine and metal surface of die, reduce the friction between melt and wall, and improve the non-uniform melt motion during processing .It provides not just a single function but a comprehensive processing solution, its comprehensive functions in plastic processing are specifically performed

CompanyNameTc: 阿科玛（中国）投资有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Kynar? MED PVDF树脂满足USP VI级别和ISO 10993-4，-5生物相容性要求。Kynar? 720 MED，作为Kynar?系列首个医用规格，具有优秀的耐化学和抗UV特性，能使用Gamma射线、蒸汽和环氧乙烷消毒，是医用挤出管材、柔性注塑部品和特殊医用包装的绝佳选择。

The first resin to be added to the range is Kynar? 720 MED. With excellent resistance to chemicals, UV radiation, and gamma, steam, and ethylene oxide sterilization. This product is a material of choice for the extrusion of medical tubes, injection of flexible parts, and specialized medical packaging.

CompanyNameSc: HP CHEMICALS JOINT STOCK COMPANY
CompanyNameTc: HP CHEMICALS JOINT STOCK COMPANY
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 我们的产品是用于PE和PP应用的CaCO3填充母料。 我们服务于广泛的过程，例如纱线穿线，注射成型，压缩成型，热成型，吹膜，泡沫制造。 我们使用世界上最好的CaCO3粉末来源的超细，高白度CaCO3粉末作为我们的产品。 我们的填料母料具有超分散能力，可以解决任何塑料制造商必须处理的最大问题。 我们的填料还使最终产品具有光滑的表面，高的拉伸强度和高的白度。 支持高使用率，我们的填充物使制造商能够大幅降低生产成本，同时仍将最终产品保持在预期的等级
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 我們的產品是用於PE和PP應用的CaCO3填充母料。 我們服務於廣泛的過程，例如紗線穿線，注射成型，壓縮成型，熱成型，吹膜，泡沫製造。 我們使用世界上最好的CaCO3粉末來源的超細，高白度CaCO3粉末作為我們的產品。 我們的填料母料具有超分散能力，可以解決任何塑料製造商必須處理的最大問題。 我們的填料還使最終產品具有光滑的表面，高的拉伸強度和高的白度。 支援高使用率，我們的填充物使製造商能夠大幅降低生產成本，同時仍將最終產品保持在預期的等級
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Our products are CaCO3 Filler Masterbatch for PE and PP application. We serve a wide range of process such as yarn threading, injection moulding, compression moulding, thermo-forming, film blowing, foam manufacturing. We use ultra-fine, high whiteness CaCO3 powder from the best CaCO3 powder source in the world for our products. Our filler masterbatch possess a super-dispersion ability that resolve the biggest issue any plastics manufacturer has to deal with. Our fillers also gives the final products smooth surface, high tensile strength and high whiteness. Supporting high usage rate, our fillers enables manufacturers to reduce production cost hugely while still keeping final products at expected grade

TechnologyDescriptionEn: RTP Company has introduced a series of compounds formulated for surgical robotic systems, including moving parts, monitors, single or reusable instruments, and staplers. Our compounds can provide mechanical performance, durability, and wear resistance while at the same time meeting demands for reusable sterilization, chemical resistance, aesthetics, and lighter weight. RTP Company thermoplastic compounds are available globally, and are used in many famous brands in the medical industry.

CompanyNameSc: 凯柏胶宝
CompanyNameTc: 凯柏胶宝
TechNameSc: 汽车市场及消费品市场适用的最新TPE
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 凯柏胶宝全新的 TPE 系列有望为汽车设计师和制造商带来更优良的车内空气质量，帮助提升汽车内饰制造标准。 TPE常用于汽车内饰例如车内控制元件，防滑垫，门槛，密封件，置杯架等等。 我们正在努力开发电动汽车解决方案，以满足两轮车到商用和越野车轻量化设计的需求。 凯柏胶宝也将在橡塑展上推出符合中国新国标（GB）的特定TPE材料，这些食品安全级产品可用于消费品、食品包装和玩具行业等各种应用。
TechNameTc: 汽车市场及消费品市场适用的最新TPE
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 凱柏膠寶全新的 TPE 系列有望為汽車設計師和製造商帶來更優良的車內空氣品質，説明提升汽車內飾製造標準。 TPE常用於汽車內飾例如車內控制元件，防滑墊，門檻，密封件，置杯架等等。 我們正在努力開發電動汽車解決方案，以滿足兩輪車到商用和越野車輕量化設計的需求。 凱柏膠寶也將在橡塑展上推出符合中國新國標（GB）的特定TPE材料，這些食品安全級產品可用於消費品、食品包裝和玩具行業等各種應用。
TechNameEn: Automotive Low Odor and Emission innovation TPE, E-Mobility Solutions, Food Grade TPE and Also Bio-Based TPE.
TechnologyDescriptionEn: KRAIBURG new TPE series is expected to bring a breath of fresh air to automotive designers and manufacturers and elevate automotive manufacturing standards. TPE compounds are used in vehicle interior applications such as control elements, anti-slip mats, window trims, seals, cup holders and many more applications.  We are venturing into the e-mobility solutions to cater to the requirements for lightweight design. Typical examples can be found in a range of e-mobility solutions, from two-wheelers to commercial and off-the-road vehicles.  Besides that, KRAIBURG TPE will also introduce its specific TPE compounds that adhere to the China GuoBiao (GB) and are food-safe for various applications in the consumer, food packaging and toy industries. This is an exceptional achievement to meet Chinas stringent local regulations and standards.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 稳定的红外线加温系统，红外线灯管实现无级调压；瓶胚节距小，加热效率高；降低加温能量消耗20-40%。伺服驱动间距变化系统，取胚速度快，分胚节距精准。配置高压回收系统，降低高压气体消耗量20-30%。伺服驱动合模和拉伸，底模和开合模联动，双侧气动增压补偿,减少运行振动和噪音，实现高速精准开合模，提高吹瓶的高效性和稳定性。单腔产能2000BPH。

TechNameEn: Linear Auto High-Speed Bottle Blow Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Stable infrared heating system, infrared lamp to achieve stepless voltage regulation; The pitch of embryo is small and the heating efficiency is high. Reduce heating energy consumption by 20-40%. Servo drive spacing change system, the speed of embryo extraction, embryo separation pitch accurate. Equipped with high pressure recovery system to reduce high pressure gas consumption by 20-30% Servo drive closing and stretching, bottom mould and opening and closing mould linkage, two-side pneumatic pressurization compensation, reduce running vibration and noise, achieve high-speed accurate opening and closing mould, improve the efficiency and stability of blowing bottle. Single chamber capacity 2000BPH

TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.Multi laver co-extrusion is optional and special shaped flow runner inside the die head gets uniform thickness of each layer and thickness of EVOH layer can be controlled within 0.03mm.  2.Toggle clamping structure without pull-rod design has even and strong clamping force and big mould-fixing plate.  3.Machine can be added with hydraulic servo system, visible line design, robot arm, conveyor, leak tester, packaging machine and so on.  4.This model can be upgraded into "Hybrid Type" , the carriage moving part of which is designed with servo motor to achieve no noise, easy operation, precise position and swift center-focus on mould.

CompanyNameEn: SUZHOU BESTAR BLOW MOLDING MACHINERY CO., LTD
CompanyNameSc: 苏州星贝尔中空成型设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 蘇州星貝爾中空成型設備有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 星贝尔中空吹塑机主要用于HDPE(高密度聚乙烯)和PP(聚丙烯)制品的生产，广泛应用于各类液体包装分装行业，其中最常见的是汽车润滑油，日化品容器，化工原料堆码桶，和食品医药容器。 多层技术可以在不影响制品美观和质量的同时显著降低生产成本，并且广泛应用于农药瓶等需要EVOH隔离层的特殊化学品容器。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 星貝爾中空吹塑機主要用於HDPE(高密度聚乙烯)和PP(聚丙烯)製品的生產，廣泛應用於各類液體包裝分裝行業，其中最常見的是汽車潤滑油，日化品容器，化工原料堆碼桶，和食品醫藥容器。 多層技術可以在不影響製品美觀和品質的同時顯著降低生產成本，並且廣泛應用於農藥瓶等需要EVOH隔離層的特殊化學品容器。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Bestar blow molding machines are designed do produce HDPE and PP articles, which are widely used in liquid packaging industry. The most common applications are food and beverage packaging, daily chemical products packaging, chemical liquid stacking barrel packaging, and automobile engine oil packaging. The multiple layers technology is able to reduce each articles production cost without compromising articles quality or appearance. And multiple layers technology is core technology for EVOH articles such as pesticide bottles and essence barrels.

CompanyNameSc: 瑞安市昶泓印刷机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 里安市昶泓印刷機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 机器特点：1.调整贴板和套准后，不再需要套准 2.更换一条新版辊，卸6支旧版辊，新装6支新版辊后紧固，仅需20分钟便可进行套准印刷，3.本机组初次装版，机速在50m/min.运行时采用电动定量定位快速套版系统，在5分钟内完成纵横向对版套准 4.最高机械速度可达200m/min.套准精度正负0.10mm,5.运行升降速过程套印精度不会变化，6.停机时，基材张力能够保持，基材不会跑偏移位 7.整个生产线从卷筒到成品，实现不机连续生产，最大化产品产量 具有结构精密、操作容易，维护方便、自动化程度高
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 機器特點：1.調整貼板和套准後，不再需要套准 2.更換一條新版輥，卸6支舊版輥，新裝6支新版輥後緊固，僅需20分鐘便可進行套准印刷，3.本機組初次裝版，機速在50m/min.運行時採用電動定量定位快速套版系統，在5分鐘內完成縱橫向對版套准 4.最高機械速度可達200m/min.套准精度正負0.10mm,5.運行升降速過程套印精度不會變化，6.停機時，基材張力能夠保持，基材不會跑偏移位 7.整個生產線從捲筒到成品，實現不機連續生產，最大化產品產量 具有結構精密、操作容易，維護方便、自動化程度高
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Major Features 1.After mounting the plate and registration, no longer need registration, improve yield; 2.Replacing 1 set of Plate Roller (unloaded old roller, installed six new roller after tightening), only 20 Minute registration can be done by printing; 3.The machine first mount plate, Machine will be finished longitudinal and vertical registration within 5 minutes at speed 50m/min.Adopt motor-driven,quantify,registration and high speed plate making system; 4.Maximum production machine speed up 200m/min, registration accuracy plus or minus 0.10mm; 5.The overlay accuracy does not change during lifting running speed up or down; 6.When machine stop, Tension can be maintained, the substrate is not deviation shift; 7.The whole production line from the reel to put the finished product to achieve non-stop continuous production, maximize product yield; 8.With precision structural, easy operation, easy maintenance, high degree of automation and so on, only one person can operate.

CompanyNameSc: 青木固（佛山）塑料研发有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 青木固（佛山）塑料研發有限公司
TechNameSc: 青木固直接调温方式一步法三工位注拉吹塑成形机AL系
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 青木革新技术开发的AL系列机，采用高速脱模方式成形，实现了快速成形周期效率。即使是相同的模腔数，通过注塑冷却吹塑时间的缩短，提高可塑化，实现生产量大幅度提高。机器模具的体积优化，降低了生产成本与设备占地面积。同时机器模具的首次投资成本与生产中的投资成本大幅降低。
TechNameTc: 青木固直接調溫方式一步法三工位注拉吹塑成形機AL系
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 青木革新技術開發的AL系列機，採用高速脫模方式成形，實現了快速成形週期效率。即使是相同的模腔數，通過注塑冷卻吹塑時間的縮短，提高可塑化，實現生產量大幅度提高。機器模具的體積優化，降低了生產成本與設備占地面積。同時機器模具的首次投資成本與生產中的投資成本大幅降低。
TechNameEn: Aoki  Direct Heation Injection Stretch-Blow Molding Machines?-Al Seriers
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The AL series machine developed by Aoki innovation technology adopts high-speed demoulding method to mold and realize the cycle efficiency of rapid molding. The production will greatly increase by shortening injection, cooling and blow molding time, and the improving plasticization, even if the number of cavity is the same. The optimization of the volume of the machine and mould bring down the production cost and the area occupied by the equipment. At the same time, the first investment cost of the machine and mould and the investment cost in the production are greatly reduced.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江宏音机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江宏音機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 正负压(模内切)塑料热成型机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: HY-3021是一款配有伺服马达助力拉伸系统的正负压塑料热成型机，一套多区域的红外线上下加热系统，并拥有一部双码垛系统的机械臂，保证了制品能够被平稳、可靠地堆叠。同时搭载故障诊断系统以及先进的模内切割技术，有效地保证了产品切边零误差。适用于BOPS、PP、PET、PVC、PS、HIPS和其他热塑性材料成型，可以生产各种高透明、高拉伸的翻边及平边制品，例如食品盒、碗、碟、盖、托盘、日用品类、医药类等吸塑托盘。
TechNameTc: 正負壓(模內切)塑料熱成型機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: HY-3021是一款配有伺服馬達助力拉伸系統的正負壓塑料熱成型機，一套多區域的紅外線上下加熱系統，並擁有一部雙碼垛系統的機械臂，保證了製品能夠被平穩、可靠地堆疊。同時搭載故障診斷系統以及先進的模內切割技術，有效地保證了產品切邊零誤差。適用於BOPS、PP、PET、PVC、PS、HIPS和其他熱塑性材料成型，可以生產各種高透明、高拉伸的翻邊及平邊製品，例如食品盒、碗、碟、蓋、託盤、日用品類、醫藥類等吸塑託盤。
TechNameEn: Plastic Positive and Negative Multi-Station Thermoforming Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: HY-3021 is a high-performance machine with multi-zone infrared double-heating ovens and positive and negative thermoforming system. Equipped with servo-motor driven plug assist and double robotic palletizing system ,which ensure the products can be stacked steadily and accurately. It also has advanced fault diagnosis system and in-mold cutting ensuring consistent and accurate trim. And it is suitable for BOPS, PP, PET, PVC, PS, HIPS sheet materials to produce all kinds of high transparent, high tensile turn-up and flat products ,such as food boxes bowl, plate,lid, tray for daily necessities, medicine and drug, wine, electrical parts and etc.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江宏音机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江宏音機械有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: HY-51/62 54/76全自动（BOPS）气压成型机是集机、电、气一体化设计，由PLC控制，伺服电机拉片，人机界面操作，以及送片、加热、成型、切边、码垛一次性完成的全自动高效塑料片材成型设备。具有手动、半自动、全自动三种运行功能，附有记忆存储功能。适用于BOPS、HIPS、PS、PVC、PET等塑料片材成型，生产各种盒、碟、托盘、盖等包装制品，如食品盒、糕点托盘、超市托盘、医药针剂托盘、口服液托盘等。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: HY-51/62 54/76全自動（BOPS）氣壓成型機是集機、電、氣一體化設計，由PLC控制，伺服電機拉片，人機界面操作，以及送片、加熱、成型、切邊、碼垛一次性完成的全自動高效塑料片材成型設備。具有手動、半自動、全自動三種運行功能，附有記憶存儲功能。適用於BOPS、HIPS、PS、PVC、PET等塑料片材成型，生產各種盒、碟、託盤、蓋等包裝製品，如食品盒、糕點託盤、超市託盤、醫藥針劑託盤、口服液託盤等。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: HY-51/62 54/76 fully-automatic plastic thermoforming machine is a combination of mechanical, electrical and pneumatic components, and the whole system is controlled by a micro PLC, fed by servo motor, which can be operated in man-intefface. It combines the material feeding, heating, forming, cutting and stacking into one process. It owns manual, semi-automatic and automatic operation models with memory reserve functions. It's available for BOPS,HIPS,PS,PVC,PET plastic sheet roll forming into various of containers, boxes, dishes, trays and lids etc.

CompanyNameSc: 苏州三彩机械设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 蘇州三彩機械設備有限公司
TechNameSc: 稳定精确对版，高速印刷CPI稳定达到120线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 三彩印杯机在塑料包装印刷领域中，卓越的色站结构设计及高精密的零件如印刷大齿轮跳动0.02MM，色站铝辊跳动0.01MM，杯模达到0.02MM的精度。确保设备在400-600只杯每分钟运行，印刷效果稳定达到120线以上，代表着国内行业的最高标准。稳定精确对版功能对版结束后稳定不变对于使用方在24小时生产过程中无需频繁停机检查印刷质量，从而提高生产效率。以上技术亮点使三彩印杯机可直接与IML产品对比，印刷精美的同时提高生产效率，降低最终产品酸奶杯，奶茶杯，咖啡杯，冰淇淋杯等各类圆形包装容器的成本。
TechNameTc: 穩定精確對版，高速印刷CPI穩定達到120線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 三彩印杯機在塑料包裝印刷領域中，卓越的色站結構設計及高精密的零件如印刷大齒輪跳動0.02MM，色站鋁輥跳動0.01MM，杯模達到0.02MM的精度。確保設備在400-600只杯每分鐘運行，印刷效果穩定達到120線以上，代表著國內行業的最高標準。穩定精確對版功能對版結束後穩定不變對於使用方在24小時生產過程中無需頻繁停機檢查印刷品質，從而提高生產效率。以上技術亮點使三彩印杯機可直接與IML產品對比，印刷精美的同時提高生產效率，降低最終產品優酪乳杯，奶茶杯，咖啡杯，霜淇淋杯等各類圓形包裝容器的成本。
TechNameEn: Stable and Accurate Registration, High-Speed Printing CPI Reaches 120 Lines
TechnologyDescriptionEn: In the field of plastic container packaging and printing, CAI cup printing machine has excellent color station structure design and high-precision parts such as offset cylinder runout with 0.02mm., Plate cylinder runout within 0.01mm, cup mandrel runout within 0.02mm etc.  ensure that when the equipment runs at 400-600 cups per minute, the printing result keep 120 lines stably, which represents the highest standard in the domestic market. The stable and accurate registration function allows the user to check the printing quality without frequent shutdown during the 24-hour production and adjust the registration to improve production efficiency. Above highlights technical enable the CAI cup printing machine to compare with IML products directly, improve the production efficiency and reduce the cost of various types of round packaging containers such as yogurt cups, milk tea cups, beverage cups, coffee cups, ice cream cups and so on.

CompanyNameSc: 广州益普包装技术有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州益普包裝技術有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 本方案包含输送排瓶单元，封切单元，热风收缩单元三部分组成。 工作流程：产品进入排瓶工位完成排列，上下卷膜自动装袋封切。包装好的产品进入热风收缩工位完成。后续可根据生产需求配套自动装箱或自动码垛机。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 本方案包含輸送排瓶單元，封切單元，熱風收縮單元三部分組成。 工作流程：產品進入排瓶工位元完成排列，上下卷膜自動裝袋封切。包裝好的產品進入熱風收縮工位元完成。後續可根據生產需求配套自動裝箱或自動碼垛機。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Automatic Bagging machine, with self-made bag from rolls of thermo shrinkable film, is flexible to work with different bottles formats. It is usually installed after blower and leak tester. Our standard equipment allows making bags with sizes: 600*1000, 600*800, other sizes are available under discussion with EP team.

CompanyNameSc: 瑞史博（上海）贸易有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 瑞史博（上海）貿易有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.性能优势：粘度测量精度达到1%，无易损易耗件，后期维护成本几乎为零。 2.技术突破: 无需移动部件，测得流体粘度;完工后，清洁油墨系统同时清洁探测器; 回转泵或循环泵给料; 气动阀调节溶剂量。 3.外观及质量提升: 同一个显示屏控制所有色彩的显现，选择粘度参考值，设置粘度值报错信号装置(无墨,无溶剂或粘度太高）；探测器安装在油墨箱附近的危险区域。 4.粘度控制系统应用于凹版印刷，柔印机，油墨，冷封，粘合剂及清漆等领域。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.性能優勢：粘度測量精度達到1%，無易損易耗件，後期維護成本幾乎為零。 2.技術突破: 無需移動部件，測得流體粘度;完工後，清潔油墨系統同時清潔探測器; 回轉泵或迴圈泵給料; 氣動閥調節溶劑量。 3.外觀及品質提升: 同一個顯示幕控制所有色彩的顯現，選擇粘度參考值，設置粘度值報錯信號裝置(無墨,無溶劑或粘度太高）；探測器安裝在油墨箱附近的危險區域。 4.粘度控制系統應用於凹版印刷，柔印機，油墨，冷封，粘合劑及清漆等領域。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.The advantages of the exhibit in terms of functionality: Viscosity is measured with 1% accuracy,no mechanical and consumable parts. 2.The technological breakthroughs: Measure viscosity without moving parts; At the end of the job, the clearing of the detector is made together the ink system; Feeding by rotary or alternative pumps; Solvent correction through pneumatic valve. 3.Improving the end-products appearance / quality: Visualization of all colors controlled, on the same screen;Choice of the reference cup, set of the viscosity reference;Error signalization (no ink, no solvent or viscosity over tolerance);Detector to install in danger zone near the ink tank. 4. Viscosity Control System  apply to rotogravure, flexo machine,Ink, cold seal, glow and varnishes.

CompanyNameSc: 台州市乔博机械模具有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 台州市喬博機械模具有限公司
TechNameSc: 全新液压型塑料瓶盖模压机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 液压型塑料瓶盖模压机是将颗粒状的塑料原料经高温塑化后从料口挤出，均匀分配到每个模腔内，压塑制成各种瓶盖。我司发明的端面配流液压分配器，它的液压系统为高、低压综合配置，采用端面配流方案来实现油液的输送，目的在于塑料瓶盖成形的压力与油缸上下的压力完全分开，互不影响，确保瓶盖的成形质量和整机高速运转。模压机操作简单、节电、节水、节人工，与相等能耗的注塑机传统制盖工艺相比产量可提高3-4倍，且不产生流道废料，大大降低了制盖成本。瓶盖模压机可用于碳酸饮料瓶盖、矿泉水瓶盖、药盖等生产，适用非常广泛。
TechNameTc: 全新液壓型塑料瓶蓋模壓機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 液壓型塑料瓶蓋模壓機是將顆粒狀的塑料原料經高溫塑化後從料口擠出，均勻分配到每個模腔內，壓塑製成各種瓶蓋。我司發明的端面配流液壓分配器，它的液壓系統為高、低壓綜合配置，採用端面配流方案來實現油液的輸送，目的在於塑料瓶蓋成形的壓力與油缸上下的壓力完全分開，互不影響，確保瓶蓋的成形品質和整機高速運轉。模壓機操作簡單、節電、節水、節人工，與相等能耗的注塑機傳統制蓋工藝相比產量可提高3-4倍，且不產生流道廢料，大大降低了制蓋成本。瓶蓋模壓機可用於碳酸飲料瓶蓋、礦泉水瓶蓋、藥蓋等生產，適用非常廣泛。
TechNameEn: New Superfast Plastic Cap Compression Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Different with the widespread-used hydraulic system design in the market, our company invented the end surface hydraulic pressure allocator , which provides a high and low pressure comprehensive configuration, the assignment scheme to achieve the purpose of conveying oil, the pressure of plastic cap forming and cylinder moving completely separate, so that the cap quality and the hi-speed of the machine can be guaranteed.This machine is easy to operate,saving electricity,water and labor cost.Compared with the same energy consumption injection machine,the production can be growth to three or four times.Besides,there is no any wasted material.So it decreases the cost of cap making greatly.

CompanyNameEn: KAI PING AKEI PLASTIC-MACHINE AND MOULD FACTORY
CompanyNameSc: 开平雅琪塑胶机械模具厂
CompanyNameTc: 開平雅琪塑膠機械模具廠
TechNameSc: 六层六模头全电动系列吹瓶机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 国内首创6层6模头全电动吹瓶机，考虑到食品包装的安全性，阻隔材料EVOH不和包装内容物直接接触，内外层全部用PE原料，其中还增加了一层水口料回收层，充分消化挤吹瓶产生的水口料，特别适合食品行业的使用。电动吹瓶机的低噪音，无油污，维保养方便的特点就非常适合洁净车间的使用。机器动作稳定精准，效率高为高速高产带来保证，同时也是产品质量稳定的关键所在。节能是电动吹瓶机一贯的优点，几年下来节约的电费成本也是非常可观的数字。
TechNameTc: 六層六模頭全電動系列吹瓶機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 國內首創6層6模頭全電動吹瓶機，考慮到食品包裝的安全性，阻隔材料EVOH不和包裝內容物直接接觸，內外層全部用PE原料，其中還增加了一層水口料回收層，充分消化擠吹瓶產生的水口料，特別適合食品行業的使用。電動吹瓶機的低噪音，無油污，維保養方便的特點就非常適合潔淨車間的使用。機器動作穩定精准，效率高為高速高產帶來保證，同時也是產品品質穩定的關鍵所在。節能是電動吹瓶機一貫的優點，幾年下來節約的電費成本也是非常可觀的數字。
TechNameEn: Six-Layer Six-Way Head All Electric Blow Molding Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: All Electric, six-way head blow molding machine with six-layer co-extrusion is the very first model in China built to cater food package needs, where barrier material such as EVOH shall not be in direct contact with the content. In Akei All Electric series you will experience the excellence of efficiency, cleanness, noise reduction, longevity and consistency, all resulting in significant saving in terms of production and maintenance costs. We are confident that Akei All Electric EBM in multi-head and multi-layer solution will make great contributions to food packaging industry in the near future.

CompanyNameSc: 雅琪集团
CompanyNameTc: 雅琪集团
TechNameSc: 吹瓶机 ，可应用于吹塑类医用耗材、制品、医药包装等产品的生产
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 雅琪吹瓶机可应用于吹塑类医用耗材、制品、医药包装等产品的生产。如医用PVC球囊及指示泡、眼药水瓶、开塞露瓶、小药瓶等使用的“小神童吹瓶机”，其体积小，操作灵活，速度快，能耗低，运行稳定，温控精准，自动化程度高。为医疗包装行业提供更好的设备和服务解决方案。
TechNameTc: 吹瓶机 ，可应用于吹塑类医用耗材、制品、医药包装等产品的生产
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 雅琪吹瓶機可應用於吹塑類醫用耗材、製品、醫藥包裝等產品的生產。如醫用PVC球囊及指示泡、眼藥水瓶、開塞露瓶、小藥瓶等使用的“小神童吹瓶機”，其體積小，操作靈活，速度快，能耗低，運行穩定，溫控精准，自動化程度高。為醫療包裝行業提供更好的設備和服務解決方案。
TechNameEn: Extrusion Blow Molding Machine Suitable for Production of Medical Consumables, Products and Packaging
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Akei Extrusion Blow Molding Machines can be used in production of medical consumables, products and packaging. Akei SB-40-TS is suitable for producing medical parts such as PVC balloons, indicator bulbs, and eye drop bottles. This model is compact, swift, stable, precise and highly automatic, well known to be an excellent production and service solution to medical packaging industry.

CompanyNameSc: 日精ASB机械株式会社
CompanyNameTc: 日精ASB機械株式會社
TechNameSc: 日精ASB 四工位 ? 一步法拉伸吹塑成型机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 无论市场重点是可持续的100可回收材料来保护地球、先进的物理特性、多样的形状和应用，还是极高的质量和效率的追求　-　ASB一步法四工位注拉吹塑成型方法配合Zero Cooling (零冷却) 技术都可满足每个要求。 ASB系列可生产小口或广口瓶以及除了PET之外也能使用20多种不同的塑料。同时在容器设计上提供了极大的灵活性，包括可携式，非圆瓶口，偏中心和倾斜瓶口，优质的“仿玻璃”化妆品或节省空间的可堆叠容器。 特别定制型号还配备特殊专用技术，例如双层或多层成型，提供优越美观或先进功能的品质。
TechNameTc: 日精ASB 四工位 ? 一步法拉伸吹塑成型機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 無論市場重點是可持續的100可回收材料來保護地球、先進的物理特性、多樣的形狀和應用，還是極高的品質和效率的追求　-　ASB一步法四工位注拉吹塑成型方法配合Zero Cooling (零冷卻) 技術都可滿足每個要求。 ASB系列可生產小口或廣口瓶以及除了PET之外也能使用20多種不同的塑料。同時在容器設計上提供了極大的靈活性，包括可攜式，非圓瓶口，偏中心和傾斜瓶口，優質的“仿玻璃”化妝品或節省空間的可堆疊容器。 特別定制型號還配備特殊專用技術，例如雙層或多層成型，提供優越美觀或先進功能的品質。
TechNameEn: Nissei ASB 4-Station 1-Step Stretch Blow Molding Machines
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Whether the market priorities are sustainable 100% recyclable materials to protect our planet, advanced physical properties, diverse shapes and applications, or simply extreme high quality and efficiency - ASBs 1-Step 4-Station injection stretch blow molding method together with Zero Cooling technology answers every need. The ASB Series can mold bottles or jars in PET plus more than 20 different plastic materials while providing extreme flexibility on container design including handless, non-round necks, off-center and tilted necks, premium glass-like cosmetic or space-saving stackable containers. Customized models can also provide specialized techniques such as double-layer or multi-layer molding to provide advanced aesthetic or technical qualities. All models feature dedicated energy saving features that Further protects earths resources while contributing to enhanced profitability for the user.

CompanyNameSc: 株式会社浅野研究所
CompanyNameTc: 株式會社淺野研究所
TechnologyDescriptionSc: FJ压空真空成形机，搭载了我司的快速反应加热器，从常温加热到600℃只需10秒钟，通过对加热体表面温度的检测来控制加热器的温度，比以往提高加热精度实现更省电更稳定的成形。另外，成型工位的轨道扩大装置，可以满足悬垂量大的材料。FJ采用触摸屏式数字设计和AC伺服电机驱动，可实现高速稳定的生产。成形和裁切面积也适合中国的挤出机模头宽度，适用于多种类小批量生产。因为成形和裁切是分体式，有效的防止了收缩大的材料的切偏问题。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: FJ壓空真空成形機，搭載了我司的快速反應加熱器，從常溫加熱到600℃只需10秒鐘，通過對加熱體表面溫度的檢測來控制加熱器的溫度，比以往提高加熱精度實現更省電更穩定的成形。另外，成型工位元的軌道擴大裝置，可以滿足懸垂量大的材料。FJ採用觸控式螢幕式數位設計和AC伺服電機驅動，可實現高速穩定的生產。成形和裁切面積也適合中國的擠出機模頭寬度，適用於多種類小批量生產。因為成形和裁切是分體式，有效的防止了收縮大的材料的切偏問題。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The pressure&vacuum forming machine "FJ" equips Quick response Heater, which realize the echo and stable production with precise sheet temperature control and quick heating speed.This heater can heat up to 600℃ by 10 seconds.Also FJ has chain rail expanding function, which will prevent the draw-down.It equips digital touch panel for operation and AC servomotor to realize the high speed and stable production.The forming and trimming area is designed to correspond the chinese sheet extruder.Having forming  machine and trimming machine separately will efficiently prevent the trmming lag from material shrinking.

CompanyNameSc: 优缔贸易（上海）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 優締貿易（上海）有限公司
TechnologyDescriptionSc: NA-11系一种高效率的结晶核剂，它主要可以应用于一些结晶性的产品，如聚烯类(Polyolefins)PE、PP及PBT、PET、Polyamide类等。.1提升热变形温度(HDT)，抗折模数及高分子的耐冲击强度。2.在低浓度计量时，可以提供明显的透明性。3.提升产品的结晶温度。
TechnologyDescriptionTc: NA-11系一種高效率的結晶核劑，它主要可以應用於一些結晶性的產品，如聚烯類(Polyolefins)PE、PP及PBT、PET、Polyamide類等。.1提升熱變形溫度(HDT)，抗折模數及高分子的耐衝擊強度。2.在低濃度計量時，可以提供明顯的透明性。3.提升產品的結晶溫度。
TechnologyDescriptionEn: As a highly efficient nucleating agent for polypropylene, PET, PBT and polyamide.

CompanyNameSc: 株式会社浅野研究所
